ātma anyātma manasoḥ saṃyoga piśeṣāt ātmā pratyakṣaḥ iti
agniḥ āpta upadeśāt pratīyate amutra agniḥ iti
pratyāsīdatā dhūma darśanena anumīyate
pratyāsannena
ca pratyakṣatas upalabhyate
vyavasthā punar
agnihotram juhuyāt svarga kāmaḥ iti
laukikasya svarge na liṅga darśanam
na pratyakṣam
stanayitnu śabde śrūyamāṇe śabda hetoḥ anumānam
tatra na pratyakṣam na āgamaḥ

original: pāṇau ca pratyakṣata upalabhyamāne nānumānaṃ nāgama iti//
analyzed: pāṇau ca pratyakṣatas upalabhyamāne na anumānam na āgamaḥ iti
sā ca iyam pramitiḥ pratyakṣa parā
jijñāsitam artham āpta upadeśāt pratipadyamānaḥ liṅga darśanena api bubhutsate
liṅga darśanena anumitam ca pratyakṣataḥ didṛkṣate
pratyakṣatas upalabdhe rthe jijñāsā nivartate
pūrva uktam udāharaṇam agniḥ iti
pramātuḥ pramātavye rthe pramāṇānām saṃkaraḥ bhi saṃplavaḥ
asakaraḥ vyavasthā iti
atha vibhaktānām lakṣaṇa vacanam iti
indriya ārya sannikarṣa utpannu jñānam avyapadeśyam avyabhicāri vyavasāya ātmakam pratyakṣam
indriyasya arthena sannikarṣāt utpadyate yat jñānam tat pratyakṣam

original: na tarhi idānīmidaṃ bhavati ātmā manasā saṃyujyate,
analyzed: na tarhi idānīm idam bhavati ātmā manasā saṃyujyate
manaḥ indriyeṇa
indriyam arthena iti
na idam kāraṇa avadhāraṇam etāvat pratyakṣe kāraṇam iti
kim tu viśiṣṭa kāraṇa vacanam iti
yat pratyakṣa jñānasya viśiṣṭa kāraṇam tat ucyate
yat tu samānam anumāna ādi jñānasya
na tat nivartyate iti
manasaḥ tarhi indriyeṇa saṃyogaḥ vaktavyaḥ

original: bhidyamānasya pratyakṣaśrajñānasya nāyaṃ bhidyata iti samānatvānnokta iti//
analyzed: bhidyamānasya pratyakṣa śrajñānasya na ayam bhidyate iti samāna tvāt na uktaḥ iti
yāvadartham vai nāmadheya śabdāḥ taiḥ artha sampratyayaḥ
artha saṃpratyayāt ca vyavahāraḥ
tatra idam indriya artha sannikarṣāt utpannam artha jñāna rūpam iti vā
rasaḥ iti eva vā bhavati
rūpa rasa śabdāḥ ca viṣaya nāmadheyam
tena vyapadiśyate jñānam rūpam iti jānīte
rasaḥ iti jānīte
nāmagheya śabdena vyapadiśyamānam sat śābdam prasajyate
atas āha avyapadeśyam iti
yat idam anupayukte śabda artha sambandhe artha jñānam
na tat nāmadheya śabdena vyapadiśyate

original: gṛhīte 'pi ca śabdārthasambandhe asyārthasyāyaṃ śabdo nāmadheyamiti/
analyzed: gṛhīte pi ca śabda artha sambandhe asya arthasya ayam śabdaḥ nāmadheyam iti
yadā tu saḥ rthaḥ gṛhyate
tadā tad pūrvasmāt artha jñānāt
na viśiṣyate
tat artha vijñānam tādṛś eva bhavati
tasya tu artha jñānasya anyaḥ samākhyā śabdaḥ na asti
yena pratīyamānam
vyavahārāya kalpet
na ca apratīyamānena vyavahāraḥ
tasmāt jñeyasya arthasya saṃjñā śabdena itikaraṇa yuktena nirddhi śyate rūpam iti jñānam
rasaḥ iti vā jñānam iti
tat evam artha jñāna kāle sa na samākhyā śabdaḥ vyāpriyate
vyavahāra kāle tu vyāpriyate
tasmāt aśa abdam artha jñānam indriya artha sannikarṣa utpannam iti

original: grīṣme marīcayo bhaumenoṣmaṇā saṃsṛṣṭāḥ spandamānā dūrasthasya cakṣuṣā sannikṛṣyante/
analyzed: grīṣme marīcayaḥ bhaumena ūṣmaṇā saṃsṛṣṭāḥ spandamānāḥ dūra sthasya cakṣuṣā sannikṛṣyante
tatra indriya artha sannikarṣāt udakam iti jñānam utpadyate

original: tacca pratyakṣaṃ prasajyate ityata āha avyabhicārīti yadetasmiṃstadati
analyzed: tat ca pratyakṣam prasajyate iti atas āha avyabhicāri iti yat etasmin tat ati
tat vyabhicāri
yat tu tasmin tat iti tat avyabhicāri pratyakṣam iti

original: dūrāccakṣuṣā hyayamarthaṃ paśyannāvadhārayati dhūma iti vā reṇuriti vā/
analyzed: dūrāt cakṣuṣā hi ayam artham paśyan na avadhārayati dhūmaḥ iti vā reṇuḥ iti vā
tat etat indriya artha sannikarṣa utpannam anavadhāraṇa jñānam pratyakṣam prasajyate iti atas āha vyavasāya ātmakam iti
na ca etat mantavyam ātma manaḥ sannikarṣa jam eva anavadhāraṇa jñānam iti
kim tarhi cakṣuṣā hi ayam artham paśyan na avadhārayati
yathā ca indriyeṇa upalabdham artha manasā upalabhate
evam indriyeṇa an avadhārayan manasā na avadhārayati

original: yacca tadindriyānavadhāraṇapūrvakaṃ manasānavadhāraṇaṃ tadviśeṣāpekṣaṃ vimarśemātraṃ saṃśayaḥ,
analyzed: yat ca tat indriya anavadhāraṇa pūrvakam manasā anavadhāraṇam tad viśeṣa apekṣam vimarśemātram saṃśayaḥ
na pūrvam iti
sarvatra ca pratyakṣa viṣaye jñātuḥ indriyeṇa vyavasāyaḥ
paścāt manasā anuvyavasāyaḥ
upahata indriyāṇām anuvyavasāya abhāvāt iti
ātma ādiṣu sukha ādiṣu ca pratyakṣa lakṣaṇam vaktavyam
an indriya artha sannikarṣa jam hi tat iti

original: indriyasya vai sato manasa indriyebhyaḥ pṛthagupadeśo dharmaṃbhedāt/
analyzed: indriyasya vai sataḥ manasaḥ indriyebhyaḥ pṛthak upadeśaḥ dharmaṃbhedāt
bhautikāni indriyāṇi niyata viṣayāṇi
sa guṇānām ca eṣām indriya bhāvaḥ iti
manaḥ tu abhautikam
sarva viṣayam ca
na asya sa guṇasya indriya bhāvaḥ iti

original: sati cendriyārthasannikarṣe sannidhimasannidhi cāsya yugapajjñānānutpattikāraṇaṃ vakṣyāmaḥ(1/1/16) iti/
analyzed: sati ca indriya artha sannikarṣe sannidhim asannidhi ca asya yugapad jñāna anutpatti kāraṇam iti
manasaḥ ca indriya abhāvāt na vācyam lakṣaṇa antaram iti
tantra antara samācārāt ca etat pratyetavyam iti
para matam apratiṣiddham anumatam iti hi tantra yuktiḥ
vyākhyātam pratyakṣam

original: NyS_1,1.5: atha tatpūrvakaṃ trividham anumānaṃ pūrvavaccheṣavatsāmānyato dṛṣṭaṃ ca //
analyzed: atha tad pūrvakam trividham anumānam pūrvavat śeṣavat sāmānyatas dṛṣṭam ca
tad pūrvakam iti anena liṅga liṅginoḥ sambandha darśanam
liṅga darśanam ca abhisaṃbadhyate
liṅga liṅginoḥ saṃbaddhayoḥ darśanena liṅga smṛtiḥ abhisaṃbadhyate
smṛtyā liṅga darśanena ca apratyakṣaḥ rthaḥ numīyate
pūrvavat iti yatra kāraṇena kāryam anumīyate
yathā medha unnatyā bhaviṣyati vṛṣṭiḥ iti
śeṣavat tat iti atra kāryeṇa kāraṇam anumīyate

original: pūrvodakaviparītamudakaṃ nādyāḥ pūrṇatvaṃ śīghratvaṃ dṛṣṭhvā strotaso 'numīyate bhūtā vṛṣṭiriti/
analyzed: pūrva udaka viparītam udakam na adyāḥ pūrṇa tvam śīghra tvam dṛṣṭhvā strotasaḥ numīyate bhūtā vṛṣṭiḥ iti
sāmānyatodṛṣṭam vrajyā pūrvakam anyatra dṛṣṭasya anyatra darśanam iti
tathā ca ādityasya
tasmāt asti apratyakṣā api ādityasya vrajyā iti
atha vā pūrvavat iti yatra yathāpūrva pratyakṣa bhūtayoḥ anyatara darśanena anyatarasya apratyakṣasya anumānam yathā
dhūmena agniḥ iti
śeṣavat nāma pariśaṣaḥ
sa ca prasakta pratiṣedhe nyatra aprasaṅgāt śiṣyamāṇe saṃpratyayaḥ

original: yathā sadanityamevamādinā dravyaguṇakarmaṇāmaviśeṣeṇa sāmānyaviśeṣasamavāyebhyo nirbhaktasya śabdasya,
analyzed: yathā sat anityam evamādinā dravya guṇa karmaṇām aviśeṣeṇa sāmānya viśeṣa samavāyebhyaḥ nirbhaktasya śabdasya
tasmin dravya guṇa karma saṃśaye
na dravyam
eka dravya tvāt
na karma
śabda antara hetu tvāt
yaḥ tu śiṣyate saḥ yam iti śabdasya guṇa tva pratipattiḥ

original: sāmānyatodṛṣṭaṃ nāma--yatrāpratyakṣe liṅgaliṅginoḥ sambandhe kenacidarthena liṅgasya sāmānyādapratyakṣo liṅgī gamyate,
analyzed: sāmānyatodṛṣṭam nāma yatra apratyakṣe liṅga liṅginoḥ sambandhe kenacid arthena liṅgasya sāmānyāt apratyakṣaḥ liṅgī gamyate
yathā icchā ādibhiḥ ātmā
icchā ādayaḥ guṇāḥ
guṇāḥ ca dravya saṃsthānāḥ
tat yat eṣām sthānam saḥ ātmā iti

original: vibhāgavacanādeva trividhamiti siddhe trividhavacanaṃ mahato mahāviṣayasya nyāyasya laghīyasā sūtreṇopadeśāt paraṃ
analyzed: vibhāga vacanāt eva trividham iti siddhe trividha vacanam mahataḥ mahā viṣayasya nyāyasya laghīyasā sūtreṇa upadeśāt param
vākya lāghavam manyamānasya anyasmin vākya lāghave na ādaraḥ

original: tathā cāyamasyetthambhūtena vākyavikalpena pravṛttaḥ siddhānte chale śabdādiṣu ca bahulaṃ samācāraḥ śāstra iti//
analyzed: tathā ca ayam asya ittham bhūtena vākya vikalpena pravṛttaḥ siddhānte chale śabda ādiṣu ca bahulam samācāraḥ śāstre iti
sat viṣayam ca pratyakṣam sat asat viṣayam ca anumānam
kasmāt traikālya grahaṇāt tri kāla yuktāḥ arthāḥ anumānena gṛhyante
bhaviṣyati iti anumīyate bhavati iti ca abhūt iti ca
asat ca khlu atītam anāgatam ca iti
atha upamānam
prasiddha sādharmyāt sādhya sādhanam upamānam
prajñātena sāmānyāt prajñāpanīyasya prajñāpanam upamānam iti
yathā gauḥ evam gavayaḥ iti
kim punar atra upamānena kriyate
yadā khalu ayam gavā samāna dharmam pratidyate
tadā pratyakṣatas tam artham pratipadyate iti
samākhyā sambandha pratipattiḥ upamāna arthaḥ iti āha

original: yathā gaurevaṃ gavaya ityupamāne prayukte gavā samānadharmāṇam arthamindriyārthasaṃnikarṣādupalabhamāno 'sya gavayaśabdaḥ saṃjñeti saṃjñāsajñisambandhaṃ  #
analyzed: yathā gauḥ evam gavayaḥ iti upamāne prayukte gavā samāna dharmāṇam artham indriya artha saṃnikarṣāt upalabhamānaḥ sya gavaya śabdaḥ saṃjñā iti saṃjñā sajñi sambandham
pratipadyate iti

original: yathā mudgastathā mūdgaparṇī yathā bhāṣastathā māṣapaṇītyupamāne prayukte upamānātsaṃjñāsaṃjñisambandhaṃ pratipadyamānastāmoṣadhī bhaiṣajyāya
analyzed: yathā mudgaḥ tathā mūdgaparṇī yathā bhāṣaḥ tathā māṣapaṇī iti upamāne prayukte upamānāt saṃjñā saṃjñi sambandham pratipadyamānaḥ tām oṣadhī bhaiṣajyāya
evam anyaḥ pi upamānasya loke viṣayaḥ bubhutsitavyaḥ iti
atha śabdaḥ
āpta upadeśaḥ śabdaḥ

original: āptaḥ khalu sākṣātkṛtadharmā yathādṛṣṭasyārthasya cikhyāpayiṣayā prayukta upadeṣṭā/
analyzed: āptaḥ khalu sākṣātkṛta dharmā yathā dṛṣṭasya arthasya cikhyāpayiṣayā prayuktaḥ upadeṣṭā
sākṣāt karaṇam arthasya āptiḥ
tayā pravartate iti āptaḥ
ṛṣi ārya mlecchānām samānam lakṣaṇam

original: tathā ca sarveṣāṃ vyavahārāḥ pravartanta iti/
analyzed: tathā ca sarveṣām vyavahārāḥ pravartante iti
evam ebhiḥ pramāṇaiḥ deva manuṣya tiraścām vyavahārāḥ prakalpante
na atas nyathā iti
sa dvividhaḥ dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭa artha tvāt
yasya iha dṛśyate rthaḥ sa dṛṣṭārthaḥ
yasya amutra pratīyata saḥ dṛṣṭārthaḥ
evam ṛṣi laukika vākyānām vibhāgaḥ iti
kimartham punar idam ucyate

original: sa na manyeta dṛṣṭārthaṃ evāptopadeśaḥ pramāṇam,
analyzed: sa na manyeta dṛṣṭa artham eva āpta upadeśaḥ pramāṇam
arthasya avadhāraṇāt itas
adṛṣṭa arthaḥ pi
pramāṇam arthasya anumānāt iti
iti pramāṇa bhāṣyam
kim punar anena pramāṇena artha jātam pramātavyam iti tat ucyate
ātma aśarīra indriya artha buddhi manaḥ vṛtti doṣa pretyabhāva phala duḥkha apavargāḥ asatu prameyam

original: tatrātmā sarvasya draṣṭā sarvasya bhoktā sarvajñaḥ sarvānubhāvī/
analyzed: tatra ātmā sarvasya draṣṭā sarvasya bhoktā sarvajñaḥ sarva anubhāvī
tasya bhoga āyatanam śarīram
bhoga sādhanāni indriyāṇi
bhoktavyāḥ indriya arthāḥ
bhogaḥ buddhiḥ
sarva artha upalabdhau na indriyāṇi prabhavanti iti sarva viṣayam antaḥkaraṇa manaḥ
śarīra indriya artha buddhi sukha duḥkha saṃvedanānām nirvṛtti kāraṇam pravṛttiḥ doṣaḥ ca
na asya idam śarīram apūrvam anuttaram ca
pūrva śarīrāṇām ādiḥ na asti
uttareṣām apavargaḥ ntaḥ iti pretyabhāvaḥ
samādhana sukha duḥkha upabhogaḥ phalam
duḥkham iti na idam anukūla vedanīyasya sukhasya pratīteḥ pratyākhyānam

original: kiṃ tarhi? janmana evedaṃ sasukhasādhanasya duḥkhānuṣaṅgāt duḥkhenāviprayogādvividhabādhanāyogād duḥkhamiti samādhibhāvanamupadiśyate/
analyzed: kim tarhi janmanaḥ evā idam sa sukha sādhanasya duḥkha anuṣaṅgāt duḥkhena a viprayogāt vividha bādhanā yogāt duḥkham iti samādhi bhāvanam upadiśyate
samāhitaḥ bhāvayati
bhāvayan nirvidyate
nirviṇṇasya vairāgyam
viraktasya apavargaḥ iti
janma maraṇa prabandha ucchedaḥ sarva duḥkha prahāṇam apavargaḥ iti
asti anyat api dravya guṇa karma sāmānya viśeṣa samavāyāḥ prameyam
tad bhedena ca aparisaḍkhyeyam

original: asya tu tattvajñānādapavargo mithyājñānātsaṃsāra ityata etadupadiṣṭaṃ viśeṣeṇeti //9//
analyzed: asya tu tattva jñānāt apavargaḥ mithyā jñānāt saṃsāraḥ iti atas etat upadiṣṭam viśeṣeṇa iti
tatra ātmā tāvat pratyakṣatas na gṛhyate
sa kim āpta upadeśa mātrāt eva pratipadyate iti na iti ucte
anumānāt ca pratipattavyaḥ iti
katham
icchā dveṣa prayatna sukha duḥkha jñānāni ātmanaḥ liṅgam
yad jātīyasya arthasya sannikarṣāt sukham ātmā apalabdhavān
tad jātīyam eva artham paśyan upādātum icchati
sā iyam ādātum icchā ekasya aneka artha darśinaḥ darśana pratisandhānāt bhavati liṅgam ātmanaḥ
niyata viṣaye hi buddhi bheda mātre na saṃbhavati
deha antara vat iti
ekam ekasya aneka artha darśinaḥ darśana pratisandhānāt duḥkha hetau dveṣaḥ

original: yajjātīyo 'syārthaḥ sukhahetuḥ prasiddhastajjātīyamartha paśyan ādātuṃ prayatate/
analyzed: yad jātīyaḥ sya arthaḥ sukha hetuḥ prasiddhaḥ tad jātīyam artha paśyan ādātum prayatate

original: so 'yaṃ prayatna ekamanekārthadarśinaṃ darśanapratisandhātāram anteraṇa na syāt/
analyzed: saḥ yam prayatnaḥ ekam aneka artha darśinam darśana pratisandhātāram na syāt
niyata viṣaye hi buddhi bheda amātre na saṃbhavati
deha antara vat iti
etena duḥkha hetau prayatnaḥ vyākhyātaḥ
sukha duḥkha smṛtyā ca ayam tat sādhanam ādadānaḥ sukham upalabhate duḥkham upalabhate
suḥkha duḥkhe vedayate
pūrva uktaḥ eva hetuḥ
bubhutsamānaḥ khalu ayam vimṛśati kim svid iti
vimṛśan ca jānīte idam iti
tat idam jñānam bubhutsā vimarśābhyām abhinna kartṛkam gṛhyamāṇam ātmanaḥ liṅgam
pūrva uktaḥ eva hetuḥ iti
tatra deha antara vat iti vibhajyate

original: yathā anātmavādino dehāntareṣu niyataviṣayā buddhibhedā na pratisandhīyante,
analyzed: yathā anātma vādinaḥ deha antareṣu niyata viṣayāḥ buddhi bhedāḥ na pratisandhīyante
tathā eka deha viṣayāḥ api na pratisandhīyeran aviśeṣāt
saḥ yam eka sattvasya samācāraḥ svayam dṛṣṭasya smaraṇam
na anya dṛṣṭasya
na a dṛṣṭasya iti

original: evaṃ khalu nānāsattvānāṃ samācāro 'nyadṛṣṭamanyo na smaratīti/
analyzed: evam khalu nānā sattvānām samācāraḥ nyadṛṣṭam anyaḥ na smarati iti
tat etat ubhayam aśakyam anātma vādinā vyavasthāpayitum iti evam upapannam asti ātmā iti
tasya bhoga adhiṣṭhānam
ceṣṭā indriya artha āśrayaḥ śarīram
katham ceṣṭā āśrayaḥ

original: īpsitaṃ jihāsitaṃ vārthamadhikṛtyepsājihāsāprayuktasya tadupāyānuṣṭhānalakṣaṇā samīhā ceṣṭā, sa yatra
analyzed: īpsitam jihāsitam vā artham adhikṛtya īpsā jihāsā prayuktasya tad upāya anuṣṭhāna lakṣaṇā samīhā ca iṣṭā sa yatra
vartate tat śarīram
katham indriya āśrayaḥ

original: yasyānugraheṇānugṛhītāni upaghāte na copahatāni svaviṣayeṣu sādhvasādhuṣu pravartante,
analyzed: yasya anugraheṇa anugṛhītāni upaghāte na ca upahatāni sva viṣayeṣu sādhu asādhuṣu pravartante
saḥ eṣām āśrayaḥ tat śarīram
katham artha āśrayaḥ
yasmin āyatane indriya artha sannikarṣāt utpannayoḥ sukha duḥkhayoḥ pratisaṃvedanam pravartate
saḥ eṣām āśrayaḥ tat śarīram iti
bhoga sādhanāni punar
ghrāṇa rasana cakṣuḥ tvac śrotrāṇi indriyāṇi bhūtebhyaḥ
jighrati anena iti ghrāṇam gandham gṛhṇāti iti
rasayati anena iti rasanam rasam gṛhṇāti iti
caṣṭe nena iti cakṣuḥ rūpam paśyati iti
tvac sthānam indriyam tvac
tad upacāraḥ sthānāt iti
śṛṇoti anena iti śrotram śabdam gṛhṇāti iti
evam samākhyā nirvacana sāmarthyāt bodhyam sva viṣaya grahaṇa lakṣaṇāni indriyāṇi iti
bhūtebhyaḥ iti
nānā prakṛtīnām eṣām satām viṣaya niyamaḥ
na eka prakṛtīnām
sati ca viṣaya niyame bhavati iti
kāni punar indriya kāraṇāni
pṛthivī āpaḥ tejaḥ vāyuḥ ākāśam iti bhūtāni

original: saṃjñāśabdaiḥ pṛthagupadeśo bhūtānāṃ vibhaktānāṃ suvacaṃ kāryaṃ bhaviṣyatīti //13//
analyzed: saṃjñā śabdaiḥ pṛthak upadeśaḥ bhūtānām vibhaktānām suvacam kāryam bhaviṣyati iti
ime tu khalu
gandha rasa rūpa sparśa śabdāḥ pṛthivī ādi guṇāḥ tad arthāḥ

original: pṛthivyādīnāṃ yathāviniyogaṃ guṇā indriyāṇāṃ yathākramamarthā viṣayā iti //14//
analyzed: pṛthivī ādīnām yathā viniyogam guṇāḥ indriyāṇām yathākramam arthāḥ viṣayāḥ iti
acetanasya karaṇasya buddheḥ jānam vṛttiḥ
cetanasya akartuḥ ūpalabdhiḥ iti yukti viruddham artham pratyācakṣāṇakaḥ iva idam āha
buddhiḥ rūpa labdhiḥ jñānam iti anarthāntaram
na acetanasya karaṇasya buddheḥ jñānam bhavitum arhati
tat hi cetanam syāt
ekaḥ ca ayam cetanaḥ deha indriya saṅghāta vyatiriktaḥ iti
prameya lakṣaṇa arthasya vākyasya anya artha prakāśanam upapatti sāmarthyāt iti
smṛti anumāna āgama saṃśaya pratibhā svapna jñāna ūhāḥ sukha ādi pratyakṣam icchā ādayaḥ ca manasaḥ liṅgāni
teṣu satsu iyam api
yugapad jñāna anutpattiḥ manasaḥ liṅgam
an indriya nimittāḥ smṛti ādayaḥ karaṇa antara nimittāḥ bhavitum arhanti iti

original: yugapacca khalu ghrāṇādīnāṃ gandhādīnāṃ ca sannikarṣeṣu satsu yugapajjñānāni notpadyante/
analyzed: yugapad ca khalu ghrāṇa ādīnām gandha ādīnām ca sannikarṣeṣu satsu yugapad jñānāni na utpadyante
tena anumīyate
asti tad tad indriya saṃyogi sahakāri nimitta antaram avyāpi
yasya asannidheḥ na utpadyate jñānam
sannidheḥ ca utpadyate iti
manaḥ saṃyoga anapekṣasya hi indriya artha sannikarṣasya jñāna hetu tve yugapad utpadyeran jñānāni iti
krama prāptā tu
pravṛttiḥ vāc buddhi śarīra ārambhaḥ
manaḥ tra buddhiḥ iti abhipretam
budhyate nena iti buddhiḥ

original: so 'yabhārambhaḥ śarīreṇa vācā manasā ca puṇyaḥ pāpaśca daśavidhaḥ/
analyzed: saḥ śarīreṇa vācā manasā ca puṇyaḥ pāpaḥ ca daśavidhaḥ
tat etat kṛta bhāṣyam dvitīya sūtre iti
pravartanā lakṣaṇāḥ doṣāḥ

original: jñātāraṃ hi rāgādayaḥ pravartayanti puṇye pāpe vā/
analyzed: jñātāram hi rāga ādayaḥ pravartayanti puṇye pāpe vā
yatra mityā ajñānam tatra rāga dveṣau iti

original: pratyātmavedanīyā hīme doṣāḥ kasmāllakṣaṇato nidrdiśyanta iti?
analyzed: pratyātma vedanīyāḥ hi ime doṣāḥ kasmāt lakṣaṇataḥ nidrdiśyante iti
karma lakṣaṇāḥ khalu rakta dviṣṭa mūḍhāḥ

original: rakto hi tatkarma kurute yena karmaṇā sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ vā labhate,
analyzed: raktaḥ hi tat karma kurute yena karmaṇā sukham duḥkham vā labhate
tathā dviṣṭaḥ tathā mūḍhaḥ iti
doṣāḥ rāga dveṣa mohā
iti ucyamāne bahu na uktam bhavati iti
punar utpattiḥ pretyabhāvaḥ

original: utpannasya kvacitsattvanikāye mṛtvā yā punarūtpattiḥ sa pretyabhāvaḥ/
analyzed: utpannasya kvacid sattvanikāye mṛtvā yā sa pretyabhāvaḥ
utpannasya a sambaddhasya
sambandhaḥ tu deha indriya buddhi vedanābhiḥ
punar utpattiḥ punar deha ādibhiḥ sambandhaḥ
purar iti abhyāsa abhidhānam

original: yatra kvacitprāṇabhṛnnikāye varttamānaḥ pūrvopāttān dehādīn jahāti tatpraiti/
analyzed: yatra kvacid prāṇabhṛt nikāye varttamānaḥ pūrva upāttān deha ādīn jahāti tat praiti
yat tatra anyatra vā deha ādīn anyān upādatte tat bhavati
pretyabhāvaḥ mṛtvā punarjanma
saḥ yam janma maraṇa prabandha abhyāsaḥ na ādiḥ apavarga antaḥ pretyabhāvaḥ veditavyaḥ iti
pravṛtti doṣa janitaḥ rthaḥ phalam
sukha duḥkha saṃvedanam phalam
sukha vipākam karma duḥkha vipākam ca

original: tatpunardehendriyaviṣayabuddhiṣu satīṣu bhavatīti saha dehādibhiḥ phalamabhipratam/
analyzed: tat punar deha indriya viṣaya buddhiṣu satīṣu bhavati iti saha deha ādibhiḥ phalam abhipratam
tathā hi pravṛtti doṣa janitaḥ ṛtha phalam etat sarvam bhavati
tat etat phalam upāttam upāttam heyam

original: tyaktaṃ tyaktamupādeyamiti nāsya hānopādānayorniṣṭhā paryavasānaṃ vāsti,
analyzed: tyaktam tyaktam upādeyam iti na asya hāna upādānayoḥ niṣṭhā paryavasānam vā asti

original: sa khalvayaṃ phalasya hānopādānasrotatasohyate loka iti //20//
analyzed: sa khalu ayam phalasya hāna upādāna srotatasā uhyate lokaḥ iti
atha etat eva
bādhanā lakṣaṇam duḥkham
bādhanā pīḍā tāpaḥ iti
tayā anubaddham anaṣaktam avinirbhāgena vartamānam duḥkha yogāt duḥkham iti

original: so 'yaṃ sarvaṃ duḥkhenānubaddhamiti paśyan duḥkhaṃ jihāsurjanmani duḥkhadarśī nirvidyate nirviṇṇo virajyate virakto vimucyate //21//
analyzed: saḥ yam sarvam duḥkhena anubaddham iti paśyan duḥkham jihāsuḥ janmani duḥkha darśī nirvidyate nirviṇṇaḥ virajyate viraktaḥ vimucyate

original: yatra tu niṣṭhā yatra tu paryavasānaṃ so 'yam---
analyzed: yatra tu niṣṭhā yatra tu paryavasānam saḥ yam
tad atyanta vimokṣaḥ upavargaḥ
tena duḥkhena janmanā atyantam vimuktiḥ apavargaḥ
katham upāttasya janmanaḥ hānam
anyasya ca anupādānam
etām avasthām aparyantām apavargam vedayante pavarga vidaḥ
tat abhayam ajaram amṛtyu padam brahma kṣema prāpitar iti

original: nityaṃ sukhamātmano mahattvavat tattu mokṣe abhivyajyate,
analyzed: nityam sukham ātmanaḥ mahat tva vat tat tu mokṣe abhivyajyate

original: tenābhivyaktenātyantaṃ vimuktaḥ sukhī bhavatīti kecit manyante/
analyzed: tena abhivyaktena atyantam vimuktaḥ sukhī bhavati iti kecid manyante
teṣām pramāṇa abhāvāt anupapattiḥ

original: na pratyakṣaṃ nānumānaṃ nāgamo vā vidyate,
analyzed: na pratyakṣam na anumānam na āgamaḥ vā vidyate

original: nityaṃ sukhamātmano mahattvavat tattu mokṣe 'bhivyajyata iti//
analyzed: nityam sukham ātmanaḥ mahat tva vat tat tu mokṣe bhivyajyate iti
nityasya abhivyaktiḥ saṃvedanam
tasya hetuvacanam
nityasya sukhasya abhivyaktiḥ saṃvedanam jñānam iti
tasya hetuḥ vācyaḥ yatas tat utpadyate iti
sukhavat nityam iti ced
saṃsāra sthasya muktena aviśeṣaḥ

original: yathā muktaḥ sukhena tatsaṃvedanena ca sannityenopapannastathā
analyzed: yathā muktaḥ sukhena tad saṃvedanena ca san nityena upapannaḥ tathā
saṃsāra sthaḥ pi iti aviśeṣaḥ prasajyate
ubhayasya nitya tvāt

original: abhyunujñāne ca dharmādharmaphalena sāhacaryaṃ yaugapadyaṃ gṛhyate/
analyzed: abhyunujñāne ca dharma adharma phalena sāhacaryam yaugapadyam gṛhyate

original: yadidam utpattisthāneṣu dharmādharmaphalaṃ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ ca saṃvedyate paryāyeṇa,
analyzed: yat idam utpatti sthāneṣu dharma adharma phalam sukham duḥkham ca saṃvedyate paryāyeṇa

original: tasya ca nityasaṃvedanasya ca sahabhāvo yaugapadyaṃ gṛhyeta,
analyzed: tasya ca nitya saṃvedanasya ca sahabhāvaḥ yaugapadyam gṛhyeta
na sukha abhāvaḥ na anabhivyaktiḥ asti
ubhayasya nitya tvāt
anitya tve hetuvacanam
atha mokṣe nityasya sukhasya sa vedanam anityam
yatas tat utpadyate sa hetuḥ vācyaḥ
ātma manaḥ saṃyogasya nimitta antara sahitasya hetu tvam
tasya sahakāri nimitta antara vacanam
ātma manaḥ saṃyogaḥ hetuḥ iti ced
evam api tasya sahakāri nimitta antaram vacanīyam iti
dharmasya kāraṇa vacanam
yadi dharmaḥ nimitta antaram
tasya hetuḥ vācyaḥ yatas utpadyate iti
yadi yoga samādhi jaḥ dharmaḥ hetuḥ
tasya kārya avasāya vipodhāt prakṣaye saṃvedanam nivarteta
a saṃvedane ca a vidyamānena aviśeṣaḥ

original: yadi dharmakṣayātsaṃvedanoparamo nityaṃ sukhaṃ na saṃvedyate iti kiṃ vidyamānaṃ na saṃvedyate,
analyzed: yadi dharma kṣayāt saṃvedanā uparamaḥ nityam sukham na saṃvedyate iti kim vidyamānam na saṃvedyate
atha avidyamānam iti na anumānam viśiṣṭe sati iti
a prakṣayaḥ ca dharmasya niranumānam utpatti dharmakasya anitya tvāt

original: yogasamādhijo dharmo na kṣīyata iti nāstyanumānam/
analyzed: yoga samādhi jaḥ dharmaḥ na kṣīyate iti na asti anumānam
utpatti dharmakam anityam iti viparyayasya tu anumānam

original: yasya tu saṃvedanoparamo nāsti tena saṃvedanaheturnitya ityanujñeyam//
analyzed: yasya tu saṃvedana uparamaḥ na asti tena saṃvedana hetuḥ nityaḥ iti anujñeyam
nitye ca mukta saṃsāra sthayoḥ aviśeṣaḥ iti uktam
yathā muktasya nityam sukham tad saṃvedana hetuḥ ca
saṃvedanasya tu uparamaḥ na asti
kāraṇasya nitya tvāt
tathā saṃsāra sthasya api iti

original: evaṃ ca sati dharmādharmaphalena sukhaduḥkhasaṃvedanena sāhacaryaṃ gṛhyeteti//
analyzed: evam ca sati dharma adharma phalena sukha duḥkha saṃvedanena sāhacaryam gṛhyeta iti
śarīra ādi sambandhaḥ pratibandha hetuḥ iti ced
na śarīra ādīnām upabhoga artha tvāt
viparyayasya ca ananumānāt
syāt matam saṃsāra avasthasya śarīra ādi sambandhaḥ nitya sukha saṃvedana hetoḥ pratibandhakaḥ
tena aviśeṣaḥ na asti iti
etat ca ayuktam
śarīra ādayaḥ upabhoga arthāḥ te bhoga pratibandham kariṣyanti iti a nupapannam
na ca asti anumānam aśarīrasya ātmanaḥ bhogaḥ kaścid asti iti
iṣṭa adhigama arthā pravṛttiḥ iti ced
na aniṣṭa uparama artha tvāt
idam anumānam
iṣṭa adhigama arthaḥ mokṣa upadeśaḥ pravṛttiḥ ca mumukṣūṇām
na ubhayam anarthakam iti
etat ca ayuktam
pravṛttiḥ ca mumukṣūṇām iti
na iṣṭam aniṣṭena ananubaddham sambhavati iti aniṣṭa anubandhāt iṣṭam api aniṣṭa sampadyate
aniṣṭa hānāya ca ghaṭamānaḥ iṣṭam api jahāti
viveka hānasya aśakya tvāt iti
dṛṣṭa atikramaḥ ca deha ādiṣu tulyaḥ

original: yathā dṛṣṭamanityaṃ sukhaṃ parityajya nityaṃ sukhaṃ kāmayate,
analyzed: yathā dṛṣṭam anityam sukham parityajya nityam sukham kāmayate

original: evaṃ dehendriya buddhīranityā dṛṣṭā anikramya muktasya nityā dehendriyabuddhayaḥ kalpayitavyāḥ,
analyzed: evam deha indriya buddhīḥ anityāḥ dṛṣṭāḥ a nikramya muktasya nityāḥ deha indriya buddhayaḥ kalpayitavyāḥ
sādhīyaḥ ca evam muktasya ca aikātmyam kalpitam bhavati iti
upapatti virūddham iti ced samānam
deha ādīnām nitya tvam pramāṇa virūddham kalpayayitum aśakyam iti samānam
sukhasya api tarhi nitya tvam pramāṇa virūddham kalpayitum aśakyam iti
ātyantike ca saṃsāra duḥkha abhāve sukha vacanāt āgame pi satya virodhaḥ
yadi api kaścid āgamaḥ syāt muktasya ātyantikam sukham iti
sukha śabdaḥ ātyantike duḥkha abhāve prayuktaḥ iti evam upapadyate

original: dṛṣṭo hi duḥkhābhāve sukhaśabdaprayogo bahulaṃloka iti//
analyzed: dṛṣṭaḥ hi duḥkha abhāve sukha śabda prayogaḥ bahulaṃloke iti
nitya sukha rāgasya a prahāṇe mokṣa adhigama abhāvaḥ rāgasya bandhana samājñānāt

original: yadyayaṃ mokṣe nityaṃ sukhamabhivyajyata iti nityasukharāgeṇa mokṣāyaghaṭamānā na mokṣamadhigacchet,
analyzed: yadi ayam mokṣe nityam sukham abhivyajyate iti nitya sukha rāgeṇa mokṣāya ghaṭamānā na mokṣam adhigacchet
na adhigantum arhati iti
bandhana samājñātaḥ hi rāgaḥ

original: na ca bandhane satyapi kaścinmukta ityupapadyata iti//
analyzed: na ca bandhane sati api kaścid muktaḥ iti upapadyate iti
prahīṇa nitya sūkha rāgasya a pratikūla tvam
atha asya nitya sukha rāgaḥ prahīyate
tasmin prahīṇe na asya nitya sukha a rāgaḥ pratikūlaḥ bhavati
yadi evam muktasya nityam sukham bhavati
atha api na bhavati
na asya ubhayoḥ pakṣayoḥ mokṣa adhigamaḥ vikalpyate iti

original: sthānavata etarhi saṃśayasya lakṣaṇaṃ vācyamiti taducyate---
analyzed: sthānavataḥ etarhi saṃśayasya lakṣaṇam vācyam iti tat ucyate
samāna aneka dharma upapatteḥ vipratipatteḥ ūpalabdhi anupalabdhi avyavasthātaḥ ca viśeṣa apekṣaḥ vimarśaḥ saṃśayaḥ
samāna dharma upapatteḥ viśeṣa apekṣaḥ vimarśaḥ saṃśayaḥ iti

original: sthāṇupurūṣayoḥ samānaṃ dharmamārohapariṇāhau paśyan pūrvadṛṣṭaṃ ca tayoviśeṣaṃ bubhutsamānaḥ kisvidityanyataraṃ nāvadhārayati,
analyzed: sthāṇu purūṣayoḥ samānam dharmam āroha pariṇāhau paśyan pūrva dṛṣṭam ca tayoḥ viśeṣam bubhutsamānaḥ kisvid iti anyataram na avadhārayati
yat tat anavadhāraṇa jñānam sa saṃśayaḥ

original: samānamanayordharmamupalabhe viśeṣamanyatarasya nopalabha ityeṣā buddhiḥ apekṣā/
analyzed: samānam anayoḥ dharmam upalabhe viśeṣam anyatarasya na upalabhe iti eṣā buddhiḥ apekṣā
sā saṃśayasya pravarttikā varttate
tena viśeṣa apekṣaḥ vimarśaḥ saṃśayaḥ
aneka dharma upapatteḥ iti
samāna jāta ūyam asamāna jātīyam ca anekam
tasya anekasya dharma upapatteḥ viśeṣasya ubhayathā dṛṣṭa tvāt
samāna jātīyebhyaḥ samāna jātīyebhyaḥ ca arthāḥ viśiṣyante
gandhavat tvāt pṛthivya vādibhyaḥ ca viśiṣyate
guṇa karmabhyaḥ ca
asti ca śabde vibhāga janya tvam viśeṣaḥ

original: tasmin dravyaṃ guṇaḥ karma veti sandehaḥ,
analyzed: tasmin dravyam guṇaḥ karma vā iti sandehaḥ
viśeṣasya ubhayathā dṛṣṭa tvāt
kim dravyasya sataḥ viśeṣaḥ
āhosvit aguṇasya sataḥ dravya karmabhyaḥ atha
karmaṇaḥ sataḥ dravya guṇebhyaḥ iti

original: viśeṣāpekṣā anyatamasya vyavasthāpakaṃ dharmaṃ nopalabha iti buddhiriti//
analyzed: viśeṣa apekṣā anyatamasya vyavasthāpakam dharmam na upalabhe iti buddhiḥ iti
vipratipatteḥ iti
vyāhatam eka artha darśanam vipratipattiḥ
vyāghātaḥ iti
asti ātmā ekam darśanam na asti ātmā iti aparam
na ca sadbhāva asadbhāvau saha ekatra sambhavataḥ
na ca anyatara sādhakaḥ hetuḥ ūpalabhyate
tatra tattva anavadhāraṇam saṃśayaḥ iti
upalabdhi avyavthātaḥ khalu api
sat ca udakam upalabhyate taḍāga ādiṣu
marīciṣu ca a vidyamānam udakam iti

original: ataḥ kkacidupasabhyamāne tattvavyavasthāpakasya pramāṇasyānupalabdheḥ kiṃ sadupalabhyate 'thāsaditi saṃśayo bhavati//
analyzed: atas kkacid upasabhyamāne tattva vyavasthāpakasya pramāṇasya anupalabdheḥ kim sat upalabhyate thā asat iti saṃśayaḥ bhavati
anupalabdhi avasthātaḥ ca
sat ca na upalabhyate mūla kīlaka udaka ādi
asat ca anutpannam nirūddham vā
tatas kkacid anupalabhyamāne
kim sat na upalabhyate uta asat iti saṃśayaḥ bhavati
viśeṣa apekṣau pūrvavat
pūrvaḥ samānaḥ nekaḥ ca dharmaḥ jñeya sthaḥ
upalabdhi anupalabdhī punar jñātṛ sthe
etāvatā viśeṣeṇa punarvacanam
samāna dharma adhigamāt samāna dharma upapatteḥ viśeṣa smṛti apekṣaḥ vimarśaḥ iti
sthānavatām lakṣaṇa vacanam iti samānam
yam artham adhikṛtya pravartate tat prayojanam
yam artham āptavyam hātavyam vā vyavasāya tad āpti hāna upāyam anutiṣṭhati
prayojanam tat veditavyam
pravṛtti hetu tvāt
imam artham āpsyāmi hāsyāmi vā iti vyavasāyaḥ ṛthasya adhikāraḥ
evam vyavasīyamānaḥ rthaḥ

original: NyS_1,1.25: laukikaparīkṣadāṇāṃ yasminn arthe buddhisāmyaṃ sa dṛṣṭāntaḥ //
analyzed: laukika parīkṣa dāṇām yasmin arthe buddhi sāmyam sa dṛṣṭāntaḥ
loka sāmānyam anatītāḥ laukikāḥ
naisargikam vainayikam buddhi atiśayam aprāptāḥ
tad viparītāḥ parīkṣakāḥ
tarkeṇa pramāṇaiḥ artham parīkṣitum arhanti iti
yathā yam artham laukikāḥ budhyatante
tathā parīkṣakāḥ api
saḥ rthaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ
dṛṣṭānta virodhena hi pratipakṣāḥ pratiṣeddhavyāḥ bhavanti iti
dṛṣṭānta samādhitāḥ na sva pakṣāḥ sthāpanīyāḥ bhavanti iti
avayaveṣu ca udāharaṇāya kalpate iti
atha siddhāntaḥ
idam ittham bhūtam ca iti abhyanujñāyamānam artha jātam siddham siddhasya saṃsthitiḥ siddhāntaḥ
saṃsthitiḥ ittham bhāva vyavasthā dharma niyamaḥ
sa khalu ayam
tantram itaretara abhisambaddhasya artha samūhasya upadeśaḥ śāstram
adhikaraṇa anuṣakta artha saṃsthitiḥ adhikaraṇa saṃsthitiḥ
abhyupagama saṃsthitiḥ anavadhārita artha parigrahaḥ
tantra bhedāt tu khalu sa caturvidhaḥ
sarva tantra prati tantra adhikaraṇa abhyupagama saṃsthiti arthāntara bhāvāt
tatra etāḥ catasraḥ saṃsthitayaḥ
tāsām
sarva tantra aviruddhaḥ tantre dhi kṛtaḥ rthaḥ sarva tantra siddhāntaḥ
yathā ghrāṇa ādīni indriyāṇi
gandha ādayaḥ indriyārthāḥ
pṛthivī ādīni bhūtāni
pramāṇaiḥ arthasya grahaṇam iti
samāna tantra siddhaḥ para tantra asiddhaḥ prati tantra siddhāntaḥ
yathā na āsata atmalābhaḥ
na sataḥ ātma hānam

original: niratiśayāścetanāḥ dehendriyamanaḥsaṃ viṣayeṣu tattatkāraṇeṣu ca viśeṣa iti sāṅkhcānām /
analyzed: niratiśayāḥ cetanāḥ deha indriya manaḥ sam viṣayeṣu tat tat kāraṇeṣu ca viśeṣaḥ iti sāṅkhcānām
karma hetavaḥ doṣāḥ pravṛttiḥ ca
sva guṇa viśiṣṭāḥ cetanāḥ
asat utpadyate utpannam nirudhyate iti yogānām
yad siddhau anya prakaraṇa siddhiḥ saḥ adhikaraṇa siddhāntaḥ
yasya arthasya siddhau anye rthāḥ anuṣajyante

original: na tairvinā so 'rthaḥ sidhyati te 'rthā yadadhiṣṭhānāḥ,
analyzed: na taiḥ vinā saḥ rthaḥ sidhyati te rthāḥ yad adhiṣṭhānāḥ
saḥ dhikaraṇa siddhāntaḥ
yathā deha indriya vyatiriktaḥ jñātā darśana sparśanābhyām eka artha grahaṇāt iti
atra anuṣaṅgiṇaḥ rthāḥ
indriya nānātvam
niyata viṣayāṇi indriyāṇi
sva viṣaya grahaṇa liṅgāni jñātuḥ jñāna sādhanāni
gandha ādi guṇa vyatiriktam dravyam
guṇa adhikaraṇam aniyata viṣayāḥ cetanāḥ iti
pūrva artha siddhau ete rthāḥ sidhyanti
na taiḥ vinā saḥ rthaḥ
yatra kiṃcid artha jātam aparīkṣitam abhyupagamyate
astu dravyam śabdaḥ
sa tu nityaḥ thā anityaḥ iti

original: dravyasya sato anityatā nityatā vā tadviśeṣaḥ parīkṣyate,
analyzed: dravyasya sataḥ anitya tā nitya tā vā tad viśeṣaḥ parīkṣyate

original: so 'bhyupagamasiddhāntaḥ svabuddhyatiśayacikhyāpayiṣayā parabuddhyavajñānāya ca pravartata iti //31//
analyzed: saḥ abhyupagama siddhāntaḥ sva buddhi atiśaya cikhyāpayiṣayā para buddhi avajñānāya ca pravartate iti
atha avayavāḥ
pratijñā hetu udāharaṇa upanaya nigamanāni avayavāḥ

original: daśāvayavāneke nauyayikā vākye sañcakṣate jijñāsā saṃśayaḥ śakyaprāptiḥ prayojanaṃ saṃśayavyudāsa iti/
analyzed: daśa avayavān eke nauyayikāḥ vākye sañcakṣate jijñāsā saṃśayaḥ śakya prāptiḥ prayojanam saṃśaya vyudāsaḥ iti
te kasmāt na ucyante iti
tatra apratīyamāne rthe pratyaya arthasya pravartikā jijñāsā
a pratīyamānam artham kasmāt jijñāsate

original: taṃ tattvato jñātaṃ hāsyāmi vopādāsya upekṣiṣye veti/
analyzed: tam tattvataḥ jñātam hāsyāmi vā upādāsye upekṣiṣye vā iti
tāḥ etāḥ hāna upādāna upekṣā buddhayaḥ tattva jñānasya arthaḥ tad artham ayam jijñāsate
sā khalu iyam asādhanam arthasya iti
jijñāsā adhika ṣṭhānam saṃśayaḥ ca vyāhata dharma upasaṅghātāt tatva jñāne pratyāsannaḥ
vyāhatoḥ hi dharmayoḥ anyatarat tattvam bhavitum arhati iti
sa pṛthak upadiṣṭaḥ pi asādhanam arthasya iti
pramātuḥ pramāṇāni prameya adhigama arthāni

original: sā śakyaprāptirna sādhakasya vākyasya bhāgena yujyate pratijñādivaditi/
analyzed: sā śakya prāptiḥ na sādhakasya vākyasya bhāgena yujyate pratijñā ādi vat iti

original: prayojanaṃ tattvāvadhāraṇamarthasādhakasya vākyasya phalaṃ naikadeśa iti/
analyzed: prayojanam tattva avadhāraṇam artha sādhakasya vākyasya phalam na eka deśaḥ iti
saṃśaya vyudāsaḥ pratipakṣa upavarṇanam tad pratiṣedhena tattva jñāna abhyanujñāna artham
na tu ayam sādhaka vākya eka deśaḥ iti
prakaraṇe tu samarthāḥ avadhāraṇīya artha upakārāt

original: tattvārnthasādhakabhāvāttu pratijñādayaḥ sādhakavāṅkyasya bhāgā ekadeśā avayavā iti // 32 //
analyzed: tattva ārntha sādhaka bhāvāt tu pratijñā ādayaḥ sādhaka vāṅkyasya bhāgāḥ eka deśāḥ avayavāḥ iti
teṣām tu yathā vibhaktānām

original: prajñāpanīyena dharmeṇa dharmiṇo viśiṣṭasya parigrahavacanaṃ pratijñā sādhyanirdeśaḥ/
analyzed: prajñāpanīyena dharmeṇa dharmiṇaḥ viśiṣṭasya parigraha vacanam pratijñā sādhya nirdeśaḥ
anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti
udāharaṇa sādharmyāt sādhya sādhanam hetuḥ

original: udāharaṇena sāmānyātsādhyasya dharmasya sādhanaṃ prajñāpanaṃ hetuḥ/
analyzed: udāharaṇena sāmānyāt sādhyasya dharmasya sādhanam prajñāpanam hetuḥ

original: sādhye pratisandhāya dharmamudāharaṇe ca pratisandhāya tasya sādhanatāvacanaṃ hetuḥ/
analyzed: sādhye pratisandhāya dharmam udāharaṇe ca pratisandhāya tasya sādhana tā vacanam hetuḥ
utpatti dharmaka tvāt iti
utpatti dharmakam anityam dṛṣṭam iti
kim etāvat hetu lakṣaṇam iti
na iti ucyate
kim tarhi
tathā vaidharmyāt
udāharaṇa vaidharmyāt ca sādhya sādhanam hetuḥ
katham anityaḥ śabdaḥ utpatti dharmaka tvāt
anutpatti dharmakam nityam dṛṣṭam ātma ādayaḥ iti
sādhya sādharmyāt tad dharma bhāvī dṛṣṭāntaḥ udāharaṇam
sādhyena sādharmyam samāna dharma tā
sādhya sādharmyāt kāraṇāt tad dharma bhāvī dṛṣṭāntaḥ iti
tasya dharmaḥ tad dharmaḥ
tasya iti sādhyasya

original: sādhyaṃ ca dvividham dharmiviśiṣṭo vā dharmaḥ śabdasyānityatvam,
analyzed: sādhyam ca dvividham dharmi viśiṣṭaḥ vā dharmaḥ śabdasya anitya tvam

original: dharmaviśiṣṭo vā dharmī anityaḥ śabda iti/
analyzed: dharma viśiṣṭaḥ vā dharmī anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti
iha uttaram tad grahaṇena gṛhyate iti
kasmāt pṛthak dharma vacanāt
tasya dharmaḥ tad dharmaḥ
tad dharmasya bhāvaḥ tad dharma bhāvaḥ

original: sa yasmin dṛṣṭānte vartate sa dṛṣṭāntaḥ taddharmabhāvī/
analyzed: sa yasmin dṛṣṭānte vartate sa dṛṣṭāntaḥ tad dharma bhāvī

original: yasmin dṛṣṭānte sādhyasādharmyādutpattidharmakatvāt sādhyasya dharmo 'nityatvaṃ bhavati sa dṛṣṭāntaḥ/
analyzed: yasmin dṛṣṭānte sādhya sādharmyāt utpatti dharmaka tvāt sādhyasya dharmaḥ nitya tvam bhavati sa dṛṣṭāntaḥ
sādhya sādharmyāt utpatti dharmaka tvāt tad dharma bhāvī bhavati
sa ca udāda haraṇam iṣyate
sthālī ādi dravyam utpatti dharmakam anityam
tatra yut atpadyate tat utpatti dharmakam
tat ca bhūtvā na bhavati
ātmānam jahāti nirudhyate iti anityam
evam utpatti dharmaka tvam sādhanam anitya tvam sādhyam

original: so 'yamekasmin dvayordharmayoḥ sādhyasādhanabhāvaḥ sādharmyād vyasthita upalabhyate/
analyzed: saḥ yam ekasmin dvayoḥ dharmayoḥ sādhya sādhana bhāvaḥ sādharmyāt vyasthitaḥ upalabhyate
tam dṛṣṭāntaḥ upalabhamānaḥ śabde pi anuminoti
śabdaḥ u pi utpatti dharmaka tvāt anityaḥ sthālī ādi vat iti
udāhriyate nena dharmayoḥ sādhya sādhana bhāvaḥ iti udāharaṇam
tad viparyayāt vā viparītam
dṛṣṭāntaḥ udāharaṇam iti prakṛtam
sādhya vaidharmyāt a tad dharma bhāvī ca dṛṣṭāntaḥ udāharaṇam iti
anityaḥ śabdaḥ utpatti dharmaka tvāt anutpatti dharmakam nityam ātma ādi

original: so 'yamātmādirdṛṣṭāntaḥ sādhyavaidharmyādanutpattidharmakatvādataddharmabhāvī-yo 'sau sādhyasya dharmo 'nityatvaṃ sa tasmin na bhavatīti/
analyzed: saḥ yam ātma ādiḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ sādhya vaidharmyāt anutpatti dharmaka tvāt ataddharmabhāvīyaḥ sau sādhyasya dharmaḥ nitya tvam sa tasmin na bhavati iti

original: atrātmādau dṛṣṭānta utpattidharmakatvasyābhāvādanityatvaṃ na bhavatīti upalabhamānaḥ śabde vapiryayamanuminoti,
analyzed: atra ātma ādau dṛṣṭānte utpatti dharmaka tvasya abhāvāt anitya tvam na bhavati iti upalabhamānaḥ śabde vapiḥ yayam anuminoti
utpatti dharmaka tvasya bhāvāt anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti

original: sādharmyoktasya hetoḥ sādhyasādharmyāt taddharmabhāvī dṛṣṭānta udāharaṇam/
analyzed: sādharmya uktasya hetoḥ sādhya sādharmyāt tad dharma bhāvī dṛṣṭāntaḥ udāharaṇam
vaidharmya uktasya hetoḥ sādhya vaidharmyāt ataddharma bhāvī dṛṣṭāntaḥ udāharaṇam

original: pūrvasmin dṛṣṭānte yau tau dharmauṃ sādhyasādhanabhūtau paśyati sādhye 'pi tayoḥ sādhyasādhanabhāvamanuminoti/
analyzed: pūrvasmin dṛṣṭānte yau tau dharmaum sādhya sādhana bhūtau paśyati sādhye tayoḥ sādhya sādhana bhāvam anuminoti

original: uttarasmin dṛṣṭānte yayordharmayorekasyābhāvāditarasyābhāvaṃ paśyati tayorekatarasya bhāvāditarasya bhāvaṃ sādhye 'numinotīti/
analyzed: uttarasmin dṛṣṭānte yayoḥ dharmayoḥ ekasya abhāvāt itarasya abhāvam paśyati tayoḥ ekatarasya bhāvāt itarasya bhāvam sādhye numinoti iti
tat etat hetvābhāseṣu na sambhavati iti ahetavaḥ hetvābhāsāḥ

original: tadidaṃ hetūdāharaṇayoḥ sāmarthyaṃ paramasūkṣmaṃ duḥkhabodhaṃ paṇḍitarūpavedanīyamiti //37//
analyzed: tat idam hetu udāharaṇayoḥ sāmarthyam parama sūkṣmam duḥkha bodham paṇḍita rūpa vedanīyam iti

original: NyS_1,1.38: udāharaṇāpekṣaḥ tathā iti upasaṃhāraḥ na tathā iti vā sādhyasya upanayaḥ //
analyzed: udāharaṇa apekṣaḥ tathā iti upasaṃhāraḥ na tathā iti vā sādhyasya upanayaḥ
udāharaṇa apekṣaḥ udāharaṇa tantraḥ udāharaṇa vaśaḥ
vaśaḥ sāmarthyam
sādhya sādharmya yukte udāharaṇe sthālī ādi dravyam utpatti dharmakam anityam dṛṣṭam

original: tathā ca śabda utpattidharmaka iti sādhyasya śabdasyotpattidharmakatvamūpasaṃhriyate /
analyzed: tathā ca śabdaḥ utpatti dharmakaḥ iti sādhyasya śabdasya utpatti dharmaka tvam ūpasaṃhriyate
sādhya vaidharmya yuktam punar udāharaṇe ātma ādi dravyam anutpatti dharmakam nityam dṛṣṭam
na ca tathā anutpatti dharmakaḥ śabdaḥ iti
anutpatti dharmaka tvasya upasaṃhāra pratiṣedhena utpatti dharmaka tvam upasaṃhriyate
tat idam upasaṃhāra dvetam udāharaṇa dvaitāt bhavati
upasaṃhriyate anena iti ca upasaṃhāraḥ veditavya
dvividhasya punar hetoḥ dvividhasya ca udāharaṇasya upasaṃhāra dvaite ca samānam
hetu apadeśāt pratijñāyāḥ punarvacanam nigamanam

original: sādharmyokte vā vaidharmyokte vā yathodāharaṇamupasaṃhriyate tasmādutpattidharmakatvādanityaḥ śabda iti nigamanam/
analyzed: sādharmya ukte vā vaidharmya ukte vā yathā udāharaṇam upasaṃhriyate tasmāt utpatti dharmaka tvāt anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti nigamanam
nigamyante anena iti pratijñā hetu udāharaṇa upanayāḥ ekatra iti nigamanam
nigamyante samarthyante saṃbadhyante
tatra sādharmya ukte tāvat vetau vākyam
anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti pratijñā
utpatti dharmaka tvāt iti hetuḥ
utpatti dharmakam sthālī ādi dravyam anityam iti udāharaṇam
tathā ca utpatti dharmakaḥ śabdaḥ iti upanayaḥ
tasmāt utpatti dharmaka tvāt anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti nigamanam
vaidharmya ukte pi
anityaḥ śabdaḥ
utpatti dharmaka tvāt
an atpatti dharmakam ātma ādi dravyam nityam dṛṣṭam
na ca tathā anutpatti dharmakaḥ śabdaḥ
kim tarhi utpatti dharmakaḥ
tasmāt utpatti dharmaka tvāt anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti
avayava samudāye ca vākye saṃbhūya itaretara abhisaṃbandhāt pramāṇāni artham sādhayanti iti
saṃbhavaḥ tāvat
śabda viṣayā pratijñā
āpta upadeśasya pratyakṣa anumānābhyām pratisandhānāt anṛṣeḥ ca svātantrya anupapatteḥ
anumānam hetuḥ
udāharaṇe saṃdṛśya pratipatteḥ
tat ca udāharaṇa bhāṣye vyākhyātam
pratyakṣa viṣayam udāharaṇam
dṛṣṭena adṛṣṭa siddheḥ
upamānam upanayaḥ
tathā iti upasaṃhaarāt
na ca tathā iti ca upamāna dharma pratiṣedhe viparīta dharma upasaṃha ara siddheḥ
sarveṣām eka artha pratipattau sāmarthya pradarśanam nigamanam iti
itaretara abhisaṃbandhaḥ u pi asatyām pratijñāyām anāśrayāḥ hetu ādayaḥ na pravartteran
asati hetau kasya sādhana bhāvaḥ pradarśyeta
udāharaṇe sādhye ca syāt

original: kasya cāpadeśātpratijñāyāḥ punarvacanaṃ nigamanaṃ syāt iti?
analyzed: kasya ca apadeśāt pratijñāyāḥ punarvacanam nigamanam syāt iti

original: asatyudāharaṇe kena sādharmyaṃ vaidharmyaṃ vā sādhyasādhanamupādīyeta?
analyzed: asati udāharaṇe kena sādharmyam vaidharmyam vā sādhya sādhanam upādīyeta
kasya vā sādharmya vaśāt upasaṃhaaraḥ pravarteta

original: upanayaṃ cāntareṇa sādhye 'nupasaṃhṛtaḥ sādhako dharmo nārthaṃ sādhayet/
analyzed: upanayam ca antareṇa sādhye n upasaṃhṛtaḥ sādhakaḥ dharmaḥ na artham sādhayet

original: nigamanābhāve cānabhivyaktasaṃbandhānāṃ pratijñādīnāmekārthena pravartanaṃ tatheti pratipādanaṃ kasyeti//
analyzed: nigamana abhāve ca anabhivyakta saṃbandhānām pratijñā ādīnām eka arthena pravartanam tathā iti pratipādanam kasya iti
atha avayava arthaḥ
sādhyasya dharmasya dharmiṇā saṃbandha upapādanam pratijñā arthaḥ

original: udāharaṇena samānasya viparītasya vā sādhyasya dharmasya sādhakabhāvavacanaṃ hetvarthaḥ/
analyzed: udāharaṇena samānasya viparītasya vā sādhyasya dharmasya sādhaka bhāva vacanam hetvarthaḥ
dharmayoḥ sādhya sādhana bhāva pradarśanam ekatra udāharaṇa arthaḥ
sādhana bhūtasya dharmasya sādhyena dharmeṇa sāmānādhikaraṇya upapādanam upanaya arthaḥ
udāharaṇa sthayoḥ ddharmayoḥ sādhya sādhana bhāva upapattau sādhye viparīta prasaṅga pratiṣedha artham nigamanam

original: na caitasyāṃ hetūdāharaṇapariśuddhau satyāṃ sādharmyavaidharmyābhyāṃ pratyavasthānasya vikalpājjātinigrahasthānabahutvaṃ prakramate/
analyzed: na ca etasyām hetu udāharaṇa pariśuddhau satyām sādharmya vaidharmyābhyām pratyavasthānasya vikalpāt jāti nigrahasthāna bahu tvam prakramate

original: avyavasthāpya khalu dharmayoḥ sādhyasādhanabhāvamudāharaṇe jātivādī pratyavatiṣṭhate/
analyzed: a vyavasthāpya khalu dharmayoḥ sādhya sādhana bhāvam udāharaṇe jāti vādī pratyavatiṣṭhate

original: vyavasthiteha khilu dharmayoḥ sādhyasādhanabhāve dṛṣṭāntasthe gṛhyamāṇe sādhanabhūtasya dharmasya hetutvena upādānaṃ na sādharmyamātrasya,
analyzed: vyavasthitā iha khilu dharmayoḥ sādhya sādhana bhāve dṛṣṭānta sthe gṛhyamāṇe sādhana bhūtasya dharmasya hetu tvena upādānam na sādharmya mātrasya
na vairdharmya mātrasya vā iti

original: ata ūrdhvaṃ tarko lakṣaṇīya iti athedamucyate---
analyzed: atas ūrdhvam tarkaḥ lakṣaṇīyaḥ iti atha idam ucyate
avijñāta tattve rthe kāraṇa upapattitaḥ tattva jñāna artham ūhaḥ tarkaḥ
a vijñāyamāna tattve rthe jijñāsā tāvat jāyate jānīya imam artham iti

original: atha jijñāsitasya vastuno vyāhatau dharmauṃ vibhāgena vimṛśati,
analyzed: atha jijñāsitasya vastunaḥ vyāhatau dharmaum vibhāgena vimṛśati
kim svid ittham āhosvit na ittham iti
vimṛśyamānayoḥ dharmayoḥ ekataram kāraṇa upapattyā anujñānāti
sambhavati asmin kāraṇam pramāṇam hetuḥ iti
kāraṇa upapattyā syāt evam etat na itarat iti
tatra nidarśanam
yaḥ yam jñātā jñātavyam artham jānīte
tam tattvataḥ jānīya iti jijñāsā
sa kim utpatti dharmakaḥ n utpatti dharmakam iti vimarśaḥ
vimṛśyamāne vijñāta tattve rthe yasya dharmasya abhyanujñā kāraṇam upapadyate
tam anujānāti

original: yadyayamanutpattidharmakaḥ tataḥ svakṛtasya karmaṇaḥ phalamanubhavati jñātā/
analyzed: yadi ayam anutpatti dharmakaḥ tatas sva kṛtasya karmaṇaḥ phalam anubhavati jñātā
duḥkha janma pravṛtti doṣa mithyājñānānām uttaram uttaram pūrvasya pūrvasya kāraṇam

original: uttarottarāpāye ca tadanantarābhāvādapavarga iti syātāṃ saṃsārāpavargauṃ/
analyzed: uttara uttara apāye ca tad anantara abhāvāt apavargaḥ iti syātām saṃsāra apavargauṃ
utpatti dharmake jñātari punar na syātām

original: utpannaḥ khalu jñātā dehendriyaviṣayabuddhivedanābhiḥ saṃbadhyata iti nāsyedaṃ svakṛtasya karmaṇaḥ phalam/
analyzed: utpannaḥ khalu jñātā deha indriya viṣaya buddhi vedanābhiḥ saṃbadhyate iti na asya idam sva kṛtasya karmaṇaḥ phalam
utpannaḥ ca bhūtvā na bhavati iti

original: tasyāvidyamānasya niruddhasya vā svakṛtakarmaṇaḥ phalopabhogo nāsti,
analyzed: tasya a vidyamānasya niruddhasya vā sva kṛta karmaṇaḥ phala upabhogaḥ na asti
tat evam ekasya aneka śarīra yogaḥ śarīra viyogaḥ ca atyantam na syāt iti yatra
kāraṇam anupapadyamānam paśyati
tat na anujānāti
saḥ yam evaṃlakṣaṇaḥ ūhaḥ tarkaḥ iti ucyate
katham punar ayam tattva jñāna arthaḥ na tattva jñānam eva iti
an avadhāraṇāt
anujānāti ayam ekataram dharmam kāraṇa upapattyā

original: na tvavadhārayati na vyavasyati na niścinoti evamevedamiti/
analyzed: na tu avadhārayati na vyavasyati na niścinoti evam eva idam iti
katham tattva jñāna arthaḥ iti

original: tattvajñānaviṣayābhyanujñālakṣaṇādūhād bhāvitātprasannādanantaraṃ pramāṇasāmarthyāt tattvajñānam utpadyata ityevaṃ tattvajñānārtha iti//
analyzed: tattva jñāna viṣaya abhyanujñā lakṣaṇāt ūhāt bhāvitāt prasannāt anantaram pramāṇa sāmarthyāt tattva jñānam utpadyate iti evam tattva jñāna arthaḥ iti

original: so 'yaṃ tarkaḥ pramāṇāni pratisandadhānaḥ pramāṇābhyanujñānāt pramāṇasahito vāde 'padiṣṭa iti/
analyzed: saḥ yam tarkaḥ pramāṇāni pratisandadhānaḥ pramāṇa abhyanujñānāt pramāṇa sahitaḥ vāde padiṣṭaḥ iti

original: avijñātatattve 'rthe iti yathā so 'rtho bhavati tasya tathābhāvastattvamaviparyayo yāthātathyam //40//
analyzed: avijñāta tattve rthe iti yathā saḥ rthaḥ bhavati tasya tathābhāvaḥ tattvam aviparyayaḥ yāthātathyam
etasmin ca tarka viṣaye
vimṛśya pakṣa pratipakṣābhyām artha avadhāraṇa nirṇayaḥ
sthāpanā sādhanam
pratiṣedhaḥ upālambhaḥ

original: tau sādhanopālambhau pakṣapratipakṣāśrayau vyatiṣaktāvanubandhena pravarttamānau pakṣapratipakṣāvityucyete/
analyzed: tau sādhana upālambhau pakṣa pratipakṣa āśrayau vyatiṣaktau anubandhena pravarttamānau pakṣa pratipakṣau iti ucyete
tayoḥ anyatarasya nivṛttiḥ ekatarasya avasthānam avarjanīyam avaśyambhāvi tvāt
yasya avasthānam tasya artha avadhāraṇam nirṇayaḥ

original: nedaṃ pakṣapratipakṣābhyāmarthāvadhāraṇaṃ sambhavatīti eko hi pratijñātamarthaṃ taṃ hetutaḥ sthāpayati pratiṣiddhaṃ coddharati dvitīyasya/
analyzed: na idam pakṣa pratipakṣābhyām artha avadhāraṇam sambhavati iti ekaḥ hi pratijñātam artham tam hetutaḥ sthāpayati pratiṣiddham ca uddharati dvitīyasya
dvitīyena sthāpanā hetuḥ ca pratiṣidhyate tasya eva pratiṣedha hetuḥ ca uddhriyate
sa nivarttate
tasya nivṛttau yaḥ vatiṣṭhate tena artha avadhāraṇam nirṇayaḥ
ubhābhyām eva artha avadhāraṇam iti āha
kayā yuktyā
ekasya saṃbhavaḥ dvitīyasya asambhavaḥ

original: tāvetau sambhavāsambhavau vimarśaṃ saha nivarttayata ubhayasambhave/
analyzed: tau etau sambhava asambhavau vimarśam saha nivarttayataḥ ubhaya sambhave
ubhaya asambhave tu anivṛttaḥ nimarśaḥ iti
vimṛśya iti vimarśam kṛtvā

original: so 'yaṃ vimarśaḥ pakṣapratipakṣāvavadyotya nyāyaṃ pravartayatītyupādīyata iti/
analyzed: saḥ yam vimarśaḥ pakṣa pratipakṣau avadyotya nyāyam pravartayati iti upādīyate iti
etat ca viruddhayoḥ eka dharmi sthayoḥ bodhavyam

original: yatra tu dharmisāmānyagatau viruddhau dharmauṃ hetutaḥ sambhavataḥ tatra samuccayaḥ,
analyzed: yatra tu dharmi sāmānya gatau viruddhau dharmaum hetutaḥ sambhavataḥ tatra samuccayaḥ
hetutaḥ rthasya tathā bhāva upapatteḥ

original: yathā kriyāvad dravyamiti lakṣaṇavacane yasya dravyasya kriyāyogo hetutaḥ saṃbhavati tat kriyāvat,
analyzed: yathā kriyāvat dravyam iti lakṣaṇa vacane yasya dravyasya kriyā yogaḥ hetutaḥ saṃbhavati tat kriyāvat
yasya na saṃbhavati tat akriyam iti
eka dharmi sthāyoḥ ca viruddhayoḥ dharmayoḥ ayugapad bhāva vinoḥ kāla vikalpaḥ
yathā tat eva dravyam kriyā yuktam kriyāvat
an utpanna uparata kriyam punar akriyam iti

original: na cāyaṃ nirṇaye niyamaḥ vimṛśyaiva pakṣapratipakṣābhyāmarthāvadhāraṇaṃ nirṇaya iti, kiṃ tarhi?
analyzed: na ca ayam nirṇaye niyamaḥ vimṛśya eva pakṣa pratipakṣābhyām artha avadhāraṇam nirṇayaḥ iti kim tarhi
bhavati khalu indriya artha sannikarṣāt utpanna pratyakṣe rtha avadhāraṇam nirṇayaḥ iti
parīkṣā viṣaye tu vimṛśya pakṣa pratipakṣābhyām artha avadhāraṇam nirṇayaḥ
śāstre vāde ca vimarśa varjam
iti vātsyāyanīye nyāya bhāṣye prathama adhyāyasya prathama āhnikam
tisraḥ kathāḥ bhavanti
vādaḥ jalpaḥ vitaṇḍā ca iti
tāsām

original: NyS_1,2.1: pramāṇatarkasādhanopālambhaḥ siddhāntāviruddhaḥ pañcāvayavopapannaḥ pakṣapratipakṣaparigraho vādaḥ //

analyzed: eka adhikaraṇa sthau viruddhau dharmaum pakṣa pratipakṣau pratyanīka bhāvāt
asti ātmā na asti ātmā iti
nānā adhikaraṇa sthau viruddhau api na pakṣa pratipakṣau
yathā nitya ātmā
anityā buddhiḥ iti
parigrahaḥ bhyupagama vyavasthā
pakṣa pratipakṣa parigrahaḥ vādaḥ
tasya viśeṣaṇam pramāṇa tarka sādhana upālambhaḥ
pramāṇa tarka sādhanaḥ pramāṇa tarka upālambhaḥ ca
pramāṇaiḥ ca sādhanam upālambhaḥ ca asmin kriyate iti
sādhanam sthāpanā
upālambhaḥ pratiṣadhaḥ

original: tau sādhanopālambhau ubhayorapi pakṣayorvyatiṣaktāvanubaddhau ca tāvad yāvadeko nivṛtta ekataro vyavasthita iti/
analyzed: tau sādhana upālambhau ubhayoḥ api pakṣayoḥ vyatiṣaktau anubaddhau ca tāvat yāvat ekaḥ nivṛttaḥ ekataraḥ vyavasthitaḥ iti
nivṛttasya upālambhaḥ vyavasthitasya sādhanam iti
jalpe nigrahasthāna viniyogāt vāde tad pratiṣedhaḥ

original: tatpratiṣedhe ca kasyacidabhyanujñānārthaṃ siddhāntāviruddha iti vacanam/
analyzed: tad pratiṣedhe ca kasyacid abhyanujñāna artham siddhānta aviruddhaḥ iti vacanam

original: siddhāntamabhyupetya tadvirodhī viruddha iti viruddhasya hetvābhāsasya nigrahasthānasyābhyanujñā vāde/
analyzed: siddhāntam abhyupetya tad virodhī viruddhaḥ iti viruddhasya hetvābhāsasya nigrahasthānasya abhyanujñā vāde

original: pañcāvayavopapanna iti hīnamanyatamenāpyavayavena nyūnam hetudāharaṇādhikamadhikam iti caitayorabhyanujñānārthamiti//
analyzed: pañca avayava upapannaḥ iti hīnam anyatamena api avayavena nyūnam hetu dāharaṇa adhikam adhikam iti ca etayoḥ abhyanujñāna artham iti
avayaveṣu pramāṇa tarka antarbhāve pṛthak pramāṇa tarka grahaṇam sādhana upalambha vyatiṣaṅga jñāpana artham

original: anyathobhāvapi pakṣau sthāpanāhetunā pravṛttau vāda iti syāt/
analyzed: anyathā ubhau api pakṣau sthāpanā hetunā pravṛttau vādaḥ iti syāt
antareṇa api ca avayava saṃbandham pramāṇāni artham sādhayanti iti dṛṣṭam

original: tenāpi kalpena sādhanopālambhau vāde bhavata iti jñāpayati/
analyzed: tena api kalpena sādhana upālambhau vāde bhavataḥ iti jñāpayati

original: chalajātinigrahasthānasādhanopālambho jalpa iti vacanādvinigraho jalpa iti mā vijñāyi,
analyzed: chala jāti nigrahasthāna sādhana upālambhaḥ jalpaḥ iti vacanāt vinigrahaḥ jalpaḥ iti mā vijñāyi
chala jāti nigrahasthāna sādhana upālambhaḥ eva jalpaḥ

original: pramāṇatarkasādhanopālambho vāda eveti sa mā vijñāyītyevamartha pṛthak pramāṇatarkagrahaṇamiti //1//
analyzed: pramāṇa tarka sādhana upālambhaḥ vādaḥ eva iti sa mā vijñāyi iti evam artha pṛthak pramāṇa tarka grahaṇam iti
yathā ukta upapannaḥ chala jāti nigrahasthāna sādhana upālambhaḥ jalpaḥ
yathā ukta upapannaḥ iti
pramāṇa tarka sādhana upālambhaḥ siddhānta aviruddhaḥ pañca avayava upapannaḥ pakṣa pratipakṣa parigrahaḥ
chala jāti nigrasthāna sādhana upālambhaḥ iti

original: chalajātinigrahasthānaiḥ sādhanamupālambhaścāsmin kriyata iti evaṃviśeṣaṇo jalpaḥ//
analyzed: chala jāti nigrahasthānaiḥ sādhanam upālambhaḥ ca asmin kriyate iti evam viśeṣaṇaḥ jalpaḥ

original: na khalu vai chalajātinigrahasthānaiḥ sādhanaṃ kasyacidarthasya sambhavati,
analyzed: na khalu vai chala jāti nigrahasthānaiḥ sādhanam kasyacid arthasya sambhavati

original: pratiṣedhārthataivaiṣāṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇe viśeṣalakṣaṇe ca śrūyate vacanavighāto 'rthavikalpopattyā chalam iti,
analyzed: pratiṣedha artha tā eva eṣām sāmānya lakṣaṇe viśeṣa lakṣaṇe ca śrūyate vacana vighātaḥ rtha vikalpa upattyā chalam iti
sādharmya vaigharmyābhyām pratyavasthānam jātiḥ
vipratipattiḥ apratipattiḥ ca nigrahasthānam iti
viśeṣa lakṣaṇeṣu api yathāsvam iti
na ca etat vijānīyāt pratiṣedha arthatayā eva artham sādhayanti iti
chala jāti nigraha sathāna upālambhaḥ jalpaḥ iti evam api ucyamāne vijñāyate etat iti
pramāṇaiḥ sādhana upālambheyīḥ chala jāti nigrahasthānānām aṅga bhāvaḥ sva pakṣa rakṣaṇa artha tvāt
na svatantrāṇām sādhana bhāvaḥ
yat tad pramāṇaiḥ arthasya sādhanam tatra chala jāti nigrasthānānām aṅga abhāvaḥ rakṣaṇa artha tvāt

original: tāni hi prayujyamānāni parapakṣavighāte svapakṣaṃ rakṣanti/
analyzed: tāni hi prayujyamānāni para pakṣa vighāte sva pakṣam rakṣanti

original: tathā coktaṃ tattvādhyavasāyasaṃrakṣaṇārthaṃ jalpavitaṇḍe bījaprarohasaṃharakṣaṇārthaṃ kaṇṭakaśākhāvaraṇavat iti/
analyzed: tathā ca uktam tattva adhyavasāya saṃrakṣaṇa artham jalpa vitaṇḍe bīja praroha saṃha rakṣaṇa artham kaṇṭaka śākhā āvaraṇa vat iti

original: yaścāsau pramāṇaiḥ pratipakṣasyopālambhastasya caitāni prayujyamānāni pratiṣedhabighātātsahakārīṇi bhavanti/
analyzed: yaḥ ca asau pramāṇaiḥ pratipakṣasya upālambhaḥ tasya ca etāni prayujyamānāni pratiṣedha bighātāt sahakārīṇi bhavanti
tat evam aṅgībhūtānām chala ādīnām upādānam jalpe
na svatantra ṇām sādhana bhāvaḥ
upālambhe tu svātantrayam api asti iti
sa pratipakṣa sthāpanā hīnaḥ vitaṇḍā
sa jalpaḥ vitaṇḍā bhavati
kim viśeṣaṇaḥ
pratipakṣa sthāpanayā hīnaḥ

original: yau tau samānādhikaraṇau viruddhau dharmauṃ pakṣapratipakṣāvityuktau tayorekataraṃ vaitaṇḍiko na sthāpayatīti parapakṣapratiṣedhenaiva pravarttata
analyzed: yau tau samāna adhikaraṇau viruddhau dharmau pakṣa pratipakṣau iti uktau tayoḥ ekataram vaitaṇḍikaḥ na sthāpayati iti parapakṣa pratiṣedhena eva pravarttata
astu tarhi sa pratipakṣa hīnaḥ vitaṇḍā

original: yadvai khalu tatparapratiṣedhalakṣaṇaṃ vākyaṃ sa vaitaṇḍikasya pakṣaḥ,
analyzed: yat vai khalu tad para pratiṣedha lakṣaṇam vākyam sa vaitaṇḍikasya pakṣaḥ

original: na tvasau sādhyaṃ kaṃcidarthaṃ pratijñāya sthāpayatīti/
analyzed: na tu asau sādhyam kaṃcid artham pratijñāya sthāpayati iti
tasmāt yathānyāsam eva astu iti
hetu lakṣaṇa abhāvāt ahetavaḥ hetu sāmānyāt vetu vat ābhāsamānāḥ
te ime
savyabhicāra viruddha prakaraṇasama sādhyasama kālātītāḥ hetvābhāsāḥ
teṣām
anaikāntikaḥ savyabhicāraḥ
vyabhicāraḥ ekatra avyavasthitiḥ
saha vyabhicāreṇa varttate iti savyabhicāraḥ
nidarśanam nityaḥ śabdaḥ sparśa tvāt
sparśavān anityaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ
na ca tathā sparśavān śabdaḥ
tasmāt asparśa tvāt nityaḥ śabdaḥ iti

original: dṛṣṭānte sparśavattvamanityatvaṃ ca dharmauṃ na sādhyasādhanabhūtau gṛhyate,
analyzed: dṛṣṭānte sparśavat tvam anitya tvam ca dharmaum na sādhya sādhana bhūtau gṛhyate
sparśavān ca aṇuḥ nityaḥ ca iti

original: ātmādau ca dṛṣṭānte udāharaṇasādharmyātsādhyasādhanaṃ hetuḥ iti asparśatvāditi heturnityatvaṃ vyabhicarati,
analyzed: ātma ādau ca dṛṣṭānte udāharaṇa sādharmyāt sādhya sādhanam hetuḥ iti asparśa tvāt iti hetuḥ nitya tvam vyabhicarati
asparśā ca buddhiḥ anityā ca iti

original: evaṃ dvividhāpi dṛṣṭānte vyabhicārātsādhyasādhanabhāvo nāstīti lakṣaṇābhāvādaheturiti//
analyzed: evam dvividhā api dṛṣṭānte vyabhicārāt sādhya sādhana bhāvaḥ na asti iti lakṣaṇa abhāvāt ahetuḥ iti
nitya tvam api ekaḥ ntaḥ
anitya tvam api ekaḥ ntaḥ
ekasmin ante vidyate iti aikāntikaḥ viparyayāt anaikānitakaḥ
siddhāntam abhyupetya tad virodhī viruddhaḥ
tam viruṇaddhi iti tad virodhī
abhyupetam siddhāntam vyāhanti iti
yathā saḥ yam vikāraḥ vyakteḥ apaiti nitya tva pratiṣedhāt
na nityaḥ vikāraḥ upapadyate
vikāraḥ sti vināśa pratiṣedhāt

original: so 'yaṃ nityatvapratiṣedhāditi heturvyakterapeto 'pi vikāro 'stītyanena svasiddhāntena virudhyate/
analyzed: saḥ yam nitya tva pratiṣedhāt iti hetuḥ vyakteḥ apetaḥ pi vikāraḥ sti iti anena sva siddhāntena virudhyate
katham vyaktiḥ ātmalābhaḥ
upāyaḥ pracyutiḥ
yadi ātmalābhāt pracyutaḥ vikāraḥ sti
nitya tva pratiṣedhau na upapadyate
yat vyakteḥ apetasya api vikārasya astitvam
tat khalu nitya tvam iti
nitya tva pratiṣedhaḥ nāma vikārasya ātmalābhāt pracyuteḥ upapattiḥ
yat ātmalābhāt pracyavate tat anityam dṛṣṭam
yat asti na tat ātmalābhāt pracyavate

original: astitvaṃ cātmalābhāpracyutiriti ca viruddhāvetau dhamau na saha sambhavata iti/
analyzed: astitvam ca ātma lābha apracyutiḥ iti ca viruddhau etau dhamau na saha sambhavataḥ iti

original: so 'yaṃ heturyaṃ siddhāntamāśritya pravarttate tameva vyāhantīti // 6//
analyzed: saḥ yam hetuḥ yam siddhāntam āśritya pravarttate tam eva vyāhanti iti

original: NyS_1,2.7: yasmāt prakaraṇacintā saḥ nirṇayārthamapadiṣṭaḥ prakaraṇasamaḥ //
analyzed: yasmāt prakaraṇa cintā saḥ nirṇaya artham apadiṣṭaḥ prakaraṇasamaḥ
vimarśa adhiṣṭhānau pakṣa pratipakṣau ubhau anavasitau prakaraṇam
tasya cintā vimarśāt prabhṛti prāk nirṇayāt yat samīkṣaṇam

original: sā jijñāsā yatkṛtā sa nirṇayārthaṃ prayukta ubhayapakṣasāmyāt prakaraṇamanativartamānaḥ prakaraṇasamo nirṇayāya na prakalpate/
analyzed: sā jijñāsā yad kṛtā sa nirṇaya artham prayuktaḥ ubhaya pakṣa sāmyāt prakaraṇam an ativartamānaḥ prakaraṇasamaḥ nirṇayāya na prakalpate
prajñāpanam tu anityaḥ śabdaḥ nitya dharma anupalabdheḥ iti anupalabhyamāna nitya dharmakam anityam dṛṣṭam sthālī ādi
yantra samānaḥ dharmaḥ saṃśaya kāraṇam hetu tvena upādīyate
sa saṃśayasamaḥ savyabhicāraḥ eva

original: yā tu vimarśasya viśeṣāpekṣitā ubhayapakṣaviśeṣānupalabdhiśca sā prakaraṇaṃ pravartayati/
analyzed: yā tu vimarśasya viśeṣa apekṣi tā ubhaya pakṣa viśeṣa anupalabdhiḥ ca sā prakaraṇam pravartayati

original: yathā śabde nityadharmo nopalabhyate evamanityadharmaḥ api/
analyzed: yathā śabde nitya dharmaḥ na upalabhyate evam anitya dharmaḥ api
sā iyam ubhaya pakṣa viśeṣa anupalabdhiḥ prakaraṇa cintām pravartayati
katham viparyaye hi prakaraṇa nivṛtteḥ
yadi nitya dharmaḥ śabde gṛhyeta
na syāt prakaraṇam
yadi vai anitya dharmaḥ gṛhyeta
evam api nivartteta prakaraṇam

original: so 'yaṃ heturubhau pakṣau pravartayannanyatarasya nirṇayāya na prakalpate // 7//
analyzed: saḥ yam hetuḥ ubhau pakṣau pravartayan anyatarasya nirṇayāya na prakalpate
sādhya aviśiṣṭaḥ sādhya tvāt sādhyasamaḥ
dravyam chāyā iti sādhyam
gatimat tvāt iti hetuḥ
sādhyena aviśiṣṭaḥ sādhanīya tvāt sādhyasamaḥ
ayam api asiddha tvāt sādhaya vat prajñāpayitavyaḥ

original: sādhyaṃ tāvadetat---kiṃ puruṣavacchāyāpi gacchati āho svidāvarakadravye saṃsarpati āvaraṇasantānādasannidhisantāno 'yaṃ tejaso gṛhyata iti/
analyzed: sādhyam tāvat etat kim puruṣa vat chāyā api gacchati āho svit āvaraka dravye saṃsarpati āvaraṇa santānāt asannidhi santānaḥ yam tejasaḥ gṛhyate iti

original: sarpatā khalu dravyeṇa yo yastejobhāga āvriyate tasya tasyāsannidhirevāvicchinno gṛhyata iti/
analyzed: sarpatā khalu dravyeṇa yaḥ yaḥ tejaḥ bhāgaḥ āvriyate tasya tasya a sannidhiḥ eva avicchinnaḥ gṛhyate iti
āvaraṇam tu prāpti pratiṣedhaḥ
kāla atyaya apadiṣṭaḥ kāla atītaḥ

original: kālātyayena yukto yasyārthaikadeśo 'padiśyamānasya sa kālātyayāpadiṣṭaḥ kālātīta ityucyate/
analyzed: kāla atyayena yuktaḥ yasya artha eka deśaḥ upadiśyamānasya sa kāla atyaya apadiṣṭaḥ kāla atītaḥ iti ucyate
nidarśanam nityaḥ śabdaḥ saṃyoga vyaṅgya tvāt rūpa vat

original: prāgūrddhaṃ ca vyakteravasthitaṃ rūpaṃ pradīpaghaṭasaṃyogena vyajyate,
analyzed: prāk ūrddham ca vyakteḥ avasthitam rūpam pradīpa ghaṭa saṃyogena vyajyate
tathā ca śabdaḥ api avasthitaḥ bherī daṇḍa saṃyogena vyajyate
dāru paraśu saṃyogena vā
tasmāt saṃyoga vyaṅgya tvāt nityaḥ śabdaḥ iti ayam ahetuḥ kāla atyaya apadeśāt

original: vyañjakasya saṃyogasya kālaṃ na vyaṅgyasya rūpasya vyaktiratyeti/
analyzed: vyañjakasya saṃyogasya kālam na vyaṅgyasya rūpasya vyaktiḥ atyeti
sati pradīpa saṃyoge rūpasya grahaṇam bhavati
na nivṛtte saṃyoge rūpam gṛhyate

original: nivṛtte tu dāruparaśusaṃyoge dūrasthena śabdaḥ śrūyate vibhāgakāle/
analyzed: nivṛtte tu dāru paraśu saṃyoge dūra sthena śabdaḥ śrūyate vibhāga kāle
sā iyam śabdasya vyaktiḥ
saṃyoga kālam atyeti iti na saṃyoga nimittā bhavati
kasmāt kāraṇa abhāvāt hi kārya abhāvaḥ iti
evam udāharaṇa sādharmyasya abhāvāt asādhanam ayam hetuḥ hetvābhāsaḥ iti
avayava viparyāsa vacanam na sūtra arthaḥ
kasmāt
yasya yena artha sambandhaḥ dūra sthasya api tasya saḥ
arthataḥ hi asamarthānām ānantaryam akāraṇam

original: ityetadvacanādviparyāsenokto heturudāharaṇasādharmyāttathā vaidharmyātsādhyasādhanaṃ hetulakṣaṇa na jahāti/
analyzed: iti etad vacanāt viparyāsena uktaḥ hetuḥ udāharaṇa sādharmyāt tathā vaidharmyāt sādhya sādhanam hetu lakṣaṇa na jahāti
a jahat hetu lakṣaṇam na hetvābhāsaḥ bhavati iti
avayava viparyāsa vacanam aprāpata kālam iti ca nigrahasthānam uktam
tat eva idam punar ucyate iti
atas tat na sūtra arthaḥ
atha chalam
vacana vidhātaḥ ṛtha vikalpa upatyā chalam
na sāmānya lakṣaṇe chalam śakyam udāhartum
vibhāge tu udāharaṇāni
vibhāgaḥ ca

original: NyS_1,2.11: tat trividhaṃ vākchalaṃ sāmānyacchalamupacāracchalaṃ ca //
analyzed: tat trividham vākchalam sāmānyacchalam upacāracchalam ca
teṣām
a viśeṣa abhihite rthe vaktuḥ abhiprāyāt artha anatara kalpanā vākchalam
nava kambalaḥ yam māṇavakaḥ iti prayogaḥ
atra navaḥ sya iti vaktuḥ ābhiprāyaḥ
vigrahe tu viśeṣaḥ na samāse

original: tatrāyaṃ chalavādī vaktuḥ abhiprāyādavivakṣitamanyamarthaṃ nava kambalā asyeti tāvadabhihitaṃ bhavateti kalpayati/
analyzed: tatra ayam chala vādī vaktuḥ abhiprāyāt avivakṣitam anyam artham nava kambalāḥ asya iti tāvat abhihitam bhavatā iti kalpayati
kalpayitvā ca asambhavena pratiṣedhati

original: eko 'sya kambalaḥ kuto nava kambalā iti/
analyzed: ekaḥ sya kambalaḥ kutas nava kambalāḥ iti

original: tadidaṃ sāmānyaśabde vāci nimitte chalaṃ vākchalamiti//
analyzed: tat idam sāmānya śabde vāci nimitte chalam vākchalam iti
asya pratyavasthānam sāmānya śabdasya aneka artha tve nyatara abhidhāna kalpanāyām viśeṣa vacanam
nava kambalaḥ iti aneka artha abhidhānam
navaḥ kambalaḥ sya iti
nava kambalāḥ asya iti ca

original: etasminprayukte yeyaṃ kalpanā navakambalā asyetyetad bhavatābhihitam,
analyzed: etasmin prayukte yā iyam kalpanā nava kambalā asya iti etat bhavatā abhihitam
tat ca na sambhavati iti
etasyām anyatara abhidhāna kalpanāyām viśeṣaḥ vaktavyaḥ
yasmāt viśeṣaḥ rtha viśeṣeṣu vijñāyate yam arthaḥ nena abhihitaḥ iti
sa ca viśeṣaḥ na asti
tasmāt mithyā abhiyoga mātram etat iti
prasaddhiḥ ca loke śabda artha sambandhaḥ bhidhāna abhidheya niyama niyogaḥ
asya abhidhānasya ayam arthaḥ bhidhena iti samānaḥ sāmānya śabdasya
viśeṣaḥ viśiṣṭa śabdasya
prayukta pūrvāḥ ca ime śabdāḥ arthe prayujyante
na a prayukta pūrvāḥ
prayogaḥ ca artha sampratyaya arthaḥ
artha pratyayāt ca vyavahāraḥ iti
tatra evam artha gati arthe śabda prayoge sāmarthyāt sāmānya śabdasya prayoga niyamaḥ
ajām grāmam naya
sarpiḥ ādara
brāhmaṇam bhojaya iti sāmānya śabdāḥ santaḥ rtha avayaveṣu prayujyante

original: sāmarthyāt yatrārthakriyādeśanā sambhavati tatra pravartante nārthasāmānye,
analyzed: sāmarthyāt yatra artha kriyā deśanā sambhavati tatra pravartante na artha sāmānye
kriyā deśanā sambhavāt

original: evamayaṃ sāmānyaśabdo navakambala iti yo 'rthaḥ sambhavati navaḥ kambalo 'syeti,
analyzed: evam ayam sāmānya śabdaḥ nava kambalaḥ iti yaḥ rthaḥ sambhavati navaḥ sya iti
tatra pravartate

original: yasatu na sambhavati nava kambalā asyeti,
analyzed: yasatu na sambhavati nava kambalāḥ asya iti
tatra na pravartate
saḥ yam anupapadyamāna artha kalpanayā para vākya upālambhaḥ te na kalpate iti
sambhavataḥ rthasya ati sāmānya yogāt asambhūta artha kalpanā sāmānyacchalam

original: aho khalavasau brāhmaṇo vidyācaraṇasampanna ityukte kaścidāha sambhavati brāhmaṇe vidyācaraṇasampaditi/
analyzed: aho khalu asau brāhmaṇaḥ vidyā caraṇa sampannaḥ iti ukte kaścid āha sambhavati brāhmaṇe vidyā caraṇa sampad iti

original: asya vacanasya vidhāto 'rthavikalpopapattyā asambhūtārthakalpanayā kriyate yadi brāhmaṇe vidyācaraṇasampat sambhavati nanu vrātye 'pi sambhavet,
analyzed: asya vacanasya vidhātoḥ ṛtha vikalpa upapattyā asambhūta artha kalpanayā kriyate yadi brāhmaṇe vidyā caraṇa sampad sambhavati nanu vrātye sambhavet
vrātyaḥ u pi brāhmaṇaḥ
saḥ pi astu vidyā caraṇa sampannaḥ
yat vivakṣitam artham āpnoti ca atyeti ca tat atisāmānyam
yathā brāhmaṇa tvam vidyā caraṇa sampadam kvacid āpnoti kvacid atyeti iti
sāmānya nimittam chalam sāmānyacchalam iti

original: asya ca pratyavasthānam---avivakṣitahetukasya viṣayānuvādaḥ praśaṃsārthatvād vākyasya/
analyzed: asya ca pratyavasthānam avivakṣita hetukasya viṣaya anuvādaḥ praśaṃsā artha tvāt vākyasya
tat atra asaṃbhūta artha kalpanā anupapattiḥ
yathā sambhavanti asmin kṣetre śālayaḥ iti
anirākṛtam avivakṣitam ca bīja janma
pravṛtti viṣayaḥ tu kṣetram praśasyate
saḥ yam
na asmin śālayaḥ vidhīyante iti
bījātam śāli nirvṛttiḥ satī na vivakṣitā

original: evaṃ sambhavati brāhmaṇe vidyācaraṇasampaditi sampadviṣayo brāhmaṇatvaṃ na sampaddhetuḥ/
analyzed: evam sambhavati brāhmaṇe vidyā caraṇa sampad iti sampad viṣayaḥ brāhmaṇa tvam na sampad hetuḥ
na ca atra hetuḥ vivakṣitaḥ
viṣaya anuvādaḥ tu ayam praśaṃsā artha tvāt vākyasya
sati brāhmaṇa tve sampad hetuḥ samarthaḥ iti

original: viṣayaṃ ca praśaṃsatā vākyena yathāhetutaḥ phalanirvṛttirna pratyākhyāyate/
analyzed: viṣayam ca praśaṃsatā vākyena yathā hetutaḥ phala nirvṛttiḥ na pratyākhyāyate
tat evam sati sambhūta artha kalpanayā na upapadyate iti
abhidhānasya dharmaḥ yathā artha prayogaḥ
dharma vikalpaḥ nyatra dṛṣṭasya anyatra prayogaḥ
tasya nirdeśe dharma vikalpa nirdeśe

original: yathā mañcāḥ krośantīti arthasadbhāvaneva pratiṣedhaḥ mañcasthāḥ puruṣāḥ krośanti,
analyzed: yathā mañcāḥ krośanti iti artha sadbhāvanā iva pratiṣedhaḥ mañca sthāḥ puruṣāḥ krośanti
na tu mañcāḥ krośanti
kā punar atra artha vikalpa upattiḥ
anyathā prayuktasya anyathā artha kalpanam

original: bhaktyā prayoge prādhānyena kalpanam upacāraviṣayaṃ chalamupacāracchalam/
analyzed: bhaktyā prayoge prādhānyena kalpanam upacāra viṣayam chalam upacāracchalam
upacāraḥ nītārthaḥ sahacaraṇa ādi nimittena
a tad bhāve tadvat abhidhānam upacāraḥ iti

original: atra samādhiḥ---prasiddhe prayoge vakturyathābhiprāyaṃ śabdārthayorabhyanujñā pratiṣedho vā na cchandataḥ/
analyzed: atra samādhiḥ prasiddhe prayoge vaktuḥ yathā abhiprāyam śabda arthayoḥ abhyanujñā pratiṣedhaḥ vā na chandataḥ

original: pradhānabhūtasya śabdasya bhāktasya ca guṇabhūtasya prayoga ubhayorloke siddhaḥ/
analyzed: pradhāna bhūtasya śabdasya bhāktasya ca guṇa bhūtasya prayogaḥ ubhayoḥ loke siddhaḥ

original: siddhe prayoge yathā vakturabhiprāyastathā śabdārthāvanujñeyau pratiṣedhyau vā na cchandataḥ/
analyzed: siddhe prayoge yathā vaktuḥ abhiprāyaḥ tathā śabda arthau anujñeyau pratiṣedhyau vā na chandataḥ
yadi vaktā pradhāna śabdam prayuṅkte
yathā bhūtasya abhyanujñā pratiṣedhaḥ vā na
atha guṇa bhūtam
tadā guṇa bhūtasya

original: yatra tu vaktā guṇabhūtaṃ śabdaṃ prayuṅkte pradhānabhūtamabhipretya paraḥ pratiṣedhati,
analyzed: yatra tu vaktā guṇa bhūtam śabdam prayuṅkte pradhāna bhūtam abhipretya paraḥ pratiṣedhati

original: svamanīṣayā pratiṣedho 'sau bhavati na paropālambha iti // 14 //
analyzed: sva manīṣayā pratiṣedhaḥ sau bhavati na para upālambhaḥ iti
vākchalam eva upacāracchalam tat aviśeṣāt
na vākchalāt upacāracchalam bhidyate
tasya api artha antara kalpanāyāḥ aviśeṣāt
iha api sthānī arthaḥ guṇa śabdaḥ

original: pradhānaśabdaḥ sathānārtha iti kalpayitvā pratiṣidhyata iti // 15 //
analyzed: pradhāna śabdaḥ sathāna arthaḥ iti kalpayitvā pratiṣidhyate iti
na tad artha antara bhāvāt
na vākchalam eva upacāracchalam tasya artha sadbhāva pratiṣedhasya artha antara bhāvāt
kutas artha antara kalpanātaḥ
anyā hi arthānta kalpanā
anyaḥ ṛtha sadbhāva pratiṣedhaḥ iti
aviśeṣe vā kiñcid sādharmyāt eka chala prasaṅgaḥ
chalasya dvi tvam abhyanujñāya tri tvam pratiṣidhyate kiṃcid sādharmyāt
yathā ca ayam hetuḥ tri tvam pratiṣedhati tathā
dvi tvam api abhyanujñātam pratiṣedhati
vidyate hi kiṃcid sādharmyāt na nivartate
tri tvam api na nivartsyati iti
atas ūddham
sādharmya vaidharmyābhyām pratyavasthānam jātiḥ

original: prayukte hi hetau yaḥ prasaṅgo jāyate sā jātiḥ/
analyzed: prayukte hi hetau yaḥ prasaṅgaḥ jāyate sā jātiḥ

original: sa ca prasaṅgaḥ sādharmyavaidharmyābhyā pratyavasthānamupālambhaḥ pratiṣedha iti/
analyzed: sa ca prasaṅgaḥ sādharmya vaidharmyābhyā pratyavasthānam upālambhaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ iti
udāharaṇa sādharmyāt sādhya sādhanam hetuḥ iti asya udāharaṇa vaidharmyeṇa pratyavasthānam
tathā udāharaṇa vaidharmyāt sādhya sādhanam hetuḥ iti asya udāharaṇa sādharmyeṇa pratyavasthānam
pratyanīka bhāvāt jāyamānaḥ rthaḥ jātiḥ ati
vipratipattiḥ apratipattiḥ ca nigrahasthānam
viparītā vā kutsitā vā pratipattiḥ vipratipattiḥ
vipratipadyamānaḥ parājayam prāpnoti
nigrahasthānam khalu parājaya prāptiḥ
apratipattiḥ tu ārambha viṣaye pi anārambhaḥ
pareṇa sthāpitam vā na pratiṣedhati
pratiṣedham vā na uddharati
asamāsāt ca na ete eva nigrahasthāne iti
kim punar dṛṣṭāntavat jāti nigrahasthānayoḥ abhedaḥ siddhānta vat bhedaḥ iti atas āha
tad vikalpān jāti nigrahasthāna bahu tvam
tasya sādharmya vaidharmyābhyām pratyavasthānasya vikalpāt jāti bahu tvam
tayoḥ ca vipratipatti apratipattyoḥ vikalpāt nigrahasthāna bahu ttvam
nānā kalpaḥ vikalpaḥ
vividhaḥ vā kalpaḥ vikalpaḥ
tatra ananubhāṣaṇam ajñānam apratibhā vikṣepaḥ matānujñā paryanuyojyopekṣaṇam iti apratipattiḥ nigrahasthānam
śeṣaḥ tu vipratipattiḥ iti

original: ta ime pramāṇādayaḥ padārthā uddiṣṭā yathoddeśaṃ ca lakṣitā yathālakṣaṇaṃ ca parīkṣiṣyanta iti trividhā cāsya
analyzed: te ime pramāṇa ādayaḥ padārthāḥ uddiṣṭāḥ yathoddeśam ca lakṣitāḥ yathālakṣaṇam ca parīkṣiṣyantaḥ iti trividhā ca asya
śāstrasya pravṛttiḥ veditavyā iti
vātsyāyanīye nyāya bhāṣye prathama adhyāyasya dvitīya āhnikam
samāptaḥ ca ayam prathamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī śrīnivāsa svāmi
śrī vināyaka svāmi
śrī sarasvatī devī oṃ
atha saṭīke nyāya bhāṣye dvitīya adhyāyasya prathamam āhnikam

original: ata ūrdhvaṃ pramāṇādiparīkṣā sā ca“vimṛśya pakṣapratipakṣābhyāmarthāvadhāraṇaṃ nirṇayaḥ 1-1-41“ityagre vimarśa eva parīkṣyate---
analyzed: atas ūrdhvam pramāṇa ādi parīkṣā sā ca vimṛśya pakṣa pratipakṣābhyām artha avadhāraṇam nirṇayaḥ vimarśaḥ eva parīkṣyate
samāna aneka dharma adhyavasāyāt anyatara dharma adhyavasāyāt vā na saṃśaya
samānasya dharmasya adhyavasāyāt saṃśayaḥ na dharma mātrāt

original: atha vā 'samānamanayordharmamupalabhe' iti dharmadharmigrahaṇe saṃśayābhāva iti,
analyzed: atha vā samānam anayoḥ dharmam upalabhe iti dharma dharmi grahaṇe saṃśaya abhāvaḥ iti

original: atha vā samānadharmādhyavasāyādarthāntarabhūte dharmiṇi saṃśayo 'nupapannaḥ-- na jātu rūpāsayārthāntarabhūtasyādhyavasāyādarthāntarabhūte sparśe  #
analyzed: atha vā samāna dharma adhyavasāyāt artha antara bhūte dharmiṇi saṃśayaḥ nu papannaḥ na jātu rūpa āsayā artha antara bhūtasya adhyavasāyāt artha antara bhūte sparśe
saṃśayaḥ iti

original: atha vā nādhyavasāyāt = arthāvadhāraṇād anavadhāraṇajñānaṃ saṃśaya upapadyate--- kāryakāraṇayoḥ sārūpyābhavāditi/
analyzed: atha vā na adhyavasāyāt artha avadhāraṇāt anavadhāraṇa jñānam saṃśayaḥ upapadyate kārya kāraṇayoḥ sārūpya ābhavāt iti
etena aneka dharma adhyavasāyāt iti vyākhyātam

original: anyataradharmādhyavasāyācca saṃśayo na bhavati-- tato hyanyatarāvadhāraṇameveti // 1 //
analyzed: anyatara dharma adhyavasāyāt ca saṃśayaḥ na bhavati tatas hi anyatara avadhāraṇam eva iti
vipratipatti avyavasthā adhyavasāyāt ca
na vipratipatti mātrāt avyavasthā mātrāt vā saṃśayaḥ kim tarhi
vipratipattim upalabhamānasya saṃśayaḥ
evam avyavasthāyām api iti

original: atha vā 'astyātmā' ityeke 'nāstyātmā' ityapare manyante ityupalabdheḥ kathaṃ saṃśayaḥ syāt ? iti/
analyzed: atha vā asti ātmā iti eke na asti ātmā iti apare manyante iti upalabdheḥ katham saṃśayaḥ syāt iti

original: tathopalabdhiravyavasthitā anupalabdhiś cāvyavasthiteti vibhāgenādhyavasite saṃśayo nopapadyate iti // 2 //
analyzed: tathā upalabdhiḥ avyavasthitā anupalabdhiḥ ca avyavasthitā iti vibhāgena adhyavasite saṃśayaḥ na upapadyate iti
vipratipattau ca saṃpratipatteḥ

original: yāṃ va vipratipattiṃ bhavān saṃśayahetuṃ manyate sā saṃpratipattiḥ-- sā hi dvayoḥ pratyanīkadharmaviṣayā,
analyzed: yām vaḥ vipratipattim bhavān saṃśaya hetum manyate sā saṃpratipattiḥ sā hi dvayoḥ pratyanīka dharma viṣayā
tatra yadi viprattipatteḥ saṃśayaḥ
saṃpratipatteḥ eva saṃśayaḥ iti
avyavasthā ātmani vyavasthita tvāt ca avyavasthāyāḥ
na saṃśayaḥ
yadi tāvat iyam avyavasthā ātmani eva vyavasthitā
vyavasthānāt avyavasthā na bhavati iti anupapannaḥ saṃśayaḥ
atha avyavasthā ātmani na vyavasthitā
evam atādātmyāt avyavasthā na bhavati iti saṃśaya abhāvaḥ iti
tathā atyanta saṃśayaḥ tad dharma sātatya upapatteḥ

original: yena kalpena bhavān samānadharmopapatteḥ saṃśaya iti manyate tena khalv atyantasaṃśayaḥ
analyzed: yena kalpena bhavān samāna dharma upapatteḥ saṃśayaḥ iti manyate tena khalu atyanta saṃśayaḥ
prasajyate samāna dharma upapatteḥ anucchedāt saṃśaya anucchedaḥ na ayam a tad dharmā dharmī

original: vimṛśyamāno gṛhyate satataṃ tu taddharmā bhavatīti // 5 //
analyzed: vimṛśyamānaḥ gṛhyate satatam tu tad dharmā bhavati iti
asya pratiṣedha prapañcasya saṃkṣepeṇa uddhāraḥ

original: NyS_2,1.6: yathoktādhyavasāyādeva tadviśeṣāpekṣāt saṃśaye nāsaṃśayo nātyantasaṃśayo vā //
analyzed: yathā ukta adhyavasāyāt eva tad viśeṣa apekṣāt saṃśaye na asaṃśayaḥ na atyanta saṃśayaḥ vā
na saṃśaya anutpattiḥ saṃśaya anucchedaḥ ca prasajyate katham
yat tāvat samāna dharma adhyavasāyaḥ saṃśaya hatuḥ na samāna dharma mātram iti evam etat
kasmāt evam na ucyate

original: iti,“vaśeṣāpekṣiḥ“itivacanāt tatsiddheḥ. viśeṣasyāpekṣā = ākāṅkṣā sā cānupalabhyamāne vaśeṣe simarthā/
analyzed: iti va śeṣa apekṣiḥ iti vacanāt tad siddheḥ viśeṣasya apekṣā ākāṅkṣā sā ca anupalabhyamāne
na ca uktam samāna dharma apekṣaḥ iti

original: samāne ca dharme kathamākāṅkṣā na bhaved yadyayamapratyakṣaḥ myāt,
analyzed: samāne ca dharme katham ākāṅkṣā na bhavet yadi ayam apratyakṣaḥ myāt
etena sāmarthyena vajñāyite samāna dharma adhyavasāyāt iti

original: upapattivacanādvā. samānadharmopapatterityucyate. na cānyā sadbhāvasaṃvedanādṛte samānadharmopapattirasti,
analyzed: upapatti vacanāt vā samāna dharma upapatteḥ iti ucyate na ca anyā sadbhāva saṃvedanāt ṛte samāna dharma upapattiḥ asti
anupalabhyamāna sadbhāvaḥ hi samānaḥ dharmaḥ vadyimāna vat bhavati iti

original: vaṣiyaśabdena vā vaṣiyiṇaḥ pratyayasyābhidhānaṃ yathā loke 'dhūmenāgniranumīyate' ityukte 'dhūmadarśanenāgniranumīyate' itijñāyate, katham
analyzed: vaṣiya śabdena vā pratyayasya abhidhānam yathā loke dhūmena agniḥ anumīyate iti ukte dhūma darśanena agniḥ anumīyate iti jñāyate katham

original: . dṛṣṭvā hi dhūmamathāgnimanuminoti nādṛṣṭe. na caṃ vākye darśanaśabdaḥ śrūyate.
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā hi dhūmam atha agnim anuminoti na a dṛṣṭe na vākye darśana śabdaḥ śrūyate

original: anujānāti ca vākyasyārthapratyāyakatvaṃ tena manyāmahe-- vaṣiyaśabdena vaṣiyiṇaḥ
analyzed: anujānāti ca vākyasya artha pratyāyaka tvam tena manyāmahe vaṣiya śabdena vaṣiyiṇaḥ
pratyayasya abhidhānam boddhā anujānāti evam iha api samāna dharma śabdena samāna dharma adhyavasāyam āha iti
yat uktam samānam anayoḥ dharmam upalabhe iti dharma dharmi grahaṇe saṃśaya abhāvaḥ iti

original: pūrvadṛṣṭaviṣayametatuyāvahamarthau pūrvamadrākṣaṃ tayoḥ samānaṃ dharmamupalabhe viśeṣaṃ nopalabhe iti. kathaṃ nu viśeṣaṃ paśyeyaṃ yenānyataramavadhārayeyamiti,
analyzed: pūrva dṛṣṭa viṣayam etatuyau aham arthau pūrvam adrākṣam tayoḥ samānam dharmam upalabhe viśeṣam na upalabhe iti katham nu viśeṣam paśyeyam yena anyataram avadhārayeyam iti

original: na caitat samānadharmopalabdhau dharmadharmigrahaṇamātreṇa nivartate iti/
analyzed: na ca etat samāna dharma upalabdhau dharma dharmi grahaṇa mātreṇa nivartate iti

original: yaccoktam-- nārthāntarādhyavasāyādanyatra saṃśaya iti. yo hyarthāntarādhyavasāyamātraṃ saṃśayahetumupādadīta sa evaṃ vācya iti/
analyzed: yat ca uktam na artha antara adhyavasāyāt anyatra saṃśayaḥ iti yaḥ hi artha antara adhyavasāya mātram saṃśaya hetum upādadīta saḥ evam vācyaḥ iti
yat punar etat kārya kāraṇayoḥ sārūpya abhāvāt iti

original: kāraṇasya bhāvābhāvayoḥ kāryasya bhāvābhāvau kāryakāraṇayoḥ sārūpyamuyasyotpādāt
analyzed: kāraṇasya bhāva abhāvayoḥ kāryasya bhāva abhāvau kārya kāraṇayoḥ

original: yadutpadyate yasya cānutpādād yannotpadyate tat kāraṇaṃ kāryamitarad ityetsārūpyam
analyzed: yat utpadyate yasya ca anutpādāt yat na utpadyate tat kāraṇam kāryam itarat iti et sārūpyam
asti ca saṃśaya kāraṇe saṃśaye ca etat iti
etena aneka dharma adhyavasāyāt iti pratiṣedhaḥ parihṛtaḥ iti
yat punar etat uktam vipratipatti avyavasthā adhyavasāyāt ca na saṃśayaḥ iti

original: pṛthakpravādayorvyāhatamarthamupalabhe viśeṣaṃ ca na jānāmiunopalabhe yenānyataramavadhārayeyaṃ
analyzed: pṛthak pravādayoḥ vyāhatam artham upalabhe viśeṣam ca na jānāmi iunā upalabhe yena anyataram avadhārayeyam

original: tatkotra viśeṣaḥ syād yenaikataramavadhārayeyamiti saṃśayo vipratipattijanitoyaṃ
analyzed: tat kaḥ utra viśeṣaḥ syāt yena ekataram avadhārayeyam iti saṃśayaḥ vipratipatti janitaḥ yam
na śakyaḥ vipratipatti saṃpratipatti mātreṇa nivartayitum iti
evam upalabdhi anupalabdhi avyavasthā kṛte saṃśaye veditavyam iti
yat punar etat vipratipattau ca

original: vipratipattiśabdasya yorthaḥ tadadhyavasāyo viśeṣāpekṣaḥ saṃśayahetustasya ca samākhyāntareṇa
analyzed: vipratipatti śabdasya yaḥ ṛthaḥ tad adhyavasāyaḥ viśeṣa apekṣaḥ saṃśaya hetuḥ tasya ca samākhyā antareṇa

original: na nivṛttiḥusamāne 'dhikaraṇe vyāhatārthau pravādau vipratipattiśabdasyārthaḥ tadadhyavasāyaśca
analyzed: na dhikaraṇe vyāhata arthau pravādau vipratipatti śabdasya arthaḥ tad adhyavasāyaḥ ca

original: viśeṣāpekṣaḥ saṃśayahetuḥ na cāsya saṃpratipattiśabde samākhyāntare yojyamāne saṃśayahetutvaṃ
analyzed: viśeṣa apekṣaḥ saṃśaya hetuḥ na ca asya saṃpratipatti śabde samākhyā antare yojyamāne saṃśaya hetu tvam
nivartate tat idam akṛta buddhi saṃmohanam iti
yat punar a vyavasthā ātmani
saṃśaya hetoḥ arthasya apratiṣedhāt avyavasthā abhyanujñānāt ca nimitta antareṇa śabda antara kalpanā vyarthā

original: śabdāntarakalpanā-- 'avyavasthā khalv avyavasthā na bhavati-- avyavasthātmani vyavasthitatvāditi' /
analyzed: śabda antara kalpanā avyavasthā khalu avyavasthā na bhavati avyavasthā ātmani vyavasthita tvāt iti

original: nānayorupalabdhyanupalabdhyoḥ sadasadviṣayatvaṃ viśeṣāpekṣaṃ saṃśayaheturna bhavatīti pratiṣidhyate/
analyzed: na anayoḥ upalabdhi anupalabdhyoḥ sat asat viṣaya tvam viśeṣa apekṣam saṃśaya hetuḥ na bhavati iti pratiṣidhyate

original: yāvatā cāvyavasthātmani vyavasthitā na tāvatātmānaṃ jahāti tāvatā hyanujñātā bhavatyavyavasthā,
analyzed: yāvatā ca avyavasthā ātmani vyavasthitā na tāvatā ātmānam jahāti tāvatā hi anujñātā bhavati avyavasthā
evam iyam kriyamāṇā api śabda antara kalpanā na artha antaram sādhayati iti
yat punar etat
na ayam samāna dharma ādibhyaḥ eva saṃśayaḥ

original: kiṃ tarhi ?. tadviṣayādhyavasāyād viśeṣasmṛtisahitāt iti. ato nātyantasaṃśaya iti/
analyzed: kim tarhi tad viṣaya adhyavasāyāt viśeṣa smṛti sahitāt iti atas na atyanta saṃśayaḥ iti

original: “anyataradharmādhyavasāyādvā na saṃśayaḥ“iti. tanna yuktam-- viśeṣāpekṣo vimarśaḥ
analyzed: anyatara dharma adhyavasāyāt vā na saṃśayaḥ iti tat na yuktam viśeṣa apekṣaḥ vimarśaḥ

original: saṃśayaḥ itivacanāt. viśeṣaścānyataradharmo na tasminn adhyavasīyamāne viśeṣāpekṣā
analyzed: saṃśayaḥ iti vacanāt viśeṣaḥ ca anyatara dharmaḥ na tasmin adhyavasīyamāne viśeṣa apekṣā
saṃbhavati iti
yatra saṃśayaḥ tatra evam uttara uttara prasaṅgaḥ

original: yatra yatra saṃśayapūrvikā parīkṣā śāstre kathāyāṃ vā tatra tatraivaṃ saṃśaye pareṇa pratiṣiddhe samādhirvācya iti,
analyzed: yatra yatra saṃśaya pūrvikā parīkṣā śāstre kathāyām vā tatra tatra evam saṃśaye pareṇa pratiṣiddhe samādhiḥ vācyaḥ iti

original: ataḥ sarvaparīkṣāvyāpitvāt prathamaṃ saṃśayaḥ parīkṣita iti // 7 //
analyzed: atas sarva parīkṣā vyāpi tvāt prathamam saṃśayaḥ parīkṣitaḥ iti
atha pramāṇa parīkṣā
pratyakṣa ādīnām aprāmāṇyam traikālya asiddheḥ
pratyakṣa ādīnām pramāṇyam na asti traikālya asiddheḥ upūrva apara sahabhāva anupapatteḥ iti
atha sāmānya vacanasya artha vibhāgaḥ

original: NyS_2,1.9: pūrvaṃ hi pramāṇasiddhau nendriyārthasaṃnikarṣāt pratyakṣotpattiḥ //
analyzed: pūrvam hi pramāṇa siddhau na indriya artha saṃnikarṣāt pratyakṣa utpattiḥ

original: gandhādiviṣayaṃ jñānaṃ pratyakṣaṃ tad yadi pūrvaṃ paścād gandhādīnāṃ siddhiḥ ?
analyzed: gandha ādi viṣayam jñānam pratyakṣam tat yadi pūrvam paścāt gandha ādīnām siddhiḥ
na idam gandha ādi saṃnikarṣāt utpadyate iti
paścāt siddhau na pramāṇebhyaḥ prameya siddhiḥ

original: asati pramāṇe kena pramīyamāṇo 'rthaḥ prameyaḥ syāt ?
analyzed: asati pramāṇe kena pramīyamāṇaḥ rthaḥ prameyaḥ syāt

original: , pramāṇena khalu pramīyamāṇo 'rthaḥ prameyam ityetat sidhyati //
analyzed: pramāṇena khalu pramīyamāṇaḥ rthaḥ prameyam iti etat sidhyati
yugapad siddhau prati artha niyata tvāt krama vṛtti tva abhāvaḥ buddhīnām

original: yadi pramāṇaṃ prameyaṃ ca yugapad bhavataḥ ?
analyzed: yadi pramāṇam prameyam ca yugapad bhavataḥ

original: evamapi gandhādiṣvindriyārtheṣu jñānāni pratyarthaniyatāni yugapad saṃbhavantīti
analyzed: evam api gandha ādiṣu indriya artheṣu jñānāni prati artha niyatāni yugapad saṃbhavanti iti

original: jñānānāṃ pratyarthaniyatatvāt kramavṛttitvābhāvaḥuyā imā buddhayaḥ krameṇārtheṣu
analyzed: jñānānām prati artha niyata tvāt krama vṛtti tva abhāvaḥ imāḥ buddhayaḥ krameṇa artheṣu
vartante tāsām krama vṛtti tvam na saṃbhavati iti
vyāghātaḥ ca yugapad jñāna anutpattiḥ manasaḥ liṅgam

original: etāvāṃśca pramāṇaprameyayoḥ sadbhāvaviṣayaḥ sa cānupapanna iti,
analyzed: etāvān ca pramāṇa prameyayoḥ sadbhāva viṣayaḥ sa ca anupapannaḥ iti
tasmāt pratyakṣa ādīnām pramāṇa tvam na saṃbhavati iti
asya samādhiḥ upalabdhi hetoḥ upalabdhi viṣayasya ca arthasya pūrva apara sahabhāvāḥ niyamāt
yathādarśanam kvacid upalabdhi hetuḥ pūrvam paścāt upalabdhi viṣayaḥ
yathā ādityasya prakāśaḥ
utpadyamānānām kvacid pūrvam upalabdhi viṣayaḥ paścāt upalabdhi hetuḥ yathā avasthitānām pradīpaḥ
kvacid upalabdhi hetuḥ upalabdhi viṣayaḥ ca saha bhavataḥ yathā dhūmena agneḥ grahaṇam iti
upalabdhi hetuḥ ca pramāṇam prameyam tu upalabdhi viṣayaḥ
