original: evaṃ pramāṇaprameyayoḥ pūrvāparasahabhāve 'niyate yathārtho dṛśyate tathā vibhajya vacanīya iti,

original: tatraikāntena pratiṣedhānupapattiḥ-- sāmānyena khalu vibhajya pratiṣedha ukta iti/

original: samākhyāhetosraikālyayogāt tathābhūtā samākhyā3. yatpunaridam-- 'paścātsiddhauuasati pramāṇe prameyaṃ na sidhyati-- pramāṇena pramīyamāṇo 'rthaḥ  #
analyzed: samākhyā hetoḥ raikālya yogāt tathābhūtā yat punar idam pramāṇe prameyam na sidhyati pramāṇena pramīyamāṇaḥ rthaḥ
prameyam iti vijñāyate iti

original: pramāṇamityetasyāḥ samākhyāyā upalabdhihetutvaṃ nimittaṃ tasya traikālyayogaḥ-- 'upalabdhimakārṣīt'
analyzed: pramāṇam iti etasyāḥ samākhyāyāḥ upalabdhi hetu tvam nimittam tasya traikālya yogaḥ upalabdhim akārṣīt

original: 'upalabdhiṃ karoti' 'upalabdhiṃ kariṣyati' iti samākhyāhetoḥ traikālyayogāt samākhyā tathābhūtā,

original: pramito 'nenārthaḥ pramīyate pramāsyate iti pramāṇam. pramitaṃ pramīyate pramāsyate iti ca prameyam,
analyzed: pramitaḥ nena arthaḥ pramīyate pramāsyate iti pramāṇam pramitam pramīyate pramāsyate iti ca prameyam

original: evaṃ sati bhaviṣyatyasmin hetuta upalabdhiḥupramāsyate 'yamarthaḥ prameyamidam ityetatsarvaṃ bhavatīti/
analyzed: evam sati bhaviṣyati asmin hetutaḥ upalabdhiḥ yam arthaḥ prameyam idam iti etat sarvam bhavati iti

original: traikālyānabhyanujñāne ca vyavahārānupapa4ttiḥ. yaścaivaṃ nābhyanujānīyāt tasya 'pācakamānaya pakṣyati' 'lāvakamānaya laviṣyatītivyavahāro
analyzed: traikālya anabhyanujñāne ca yaḥ ca evam na abhyanujānīyāt tasya pācakam ānaya pakṣyati lāvakam ānaya laviṣyati iti vyavahāraḥ

original: “pratyakṣādīnāmaprāmāṇyaṃ traikālyāsiddheḥ 2-1-8“ityevamādivākyaṃ pramāṇapratiṣedhaḥ. tatrāyaṃ praṣṭavyaḥ- athānena pratiṣedhena bhavatā kiṃ  #

traikālya asiddheḥ pratiṣedha anupapattiḥ

original: asya tu vibhāgaḥ-- pūrvaṃ hi pratiṣedhasiddhāvasati pratiṣedhye kimanena pratiṣidhyate ?

original: pratiṣedhalakṣaṇe ca vākye 'nupapadyamāne siddhaṃ pratyakṣādīnāṃ pramāṇatvamiti // 12 //

original: hetvarthasya sādhakatvaṃ dṛṣṭānte darśayitavyamiti. na ca tarhi pratyakṣādīnāmaprāmāṇyam,
analyzed: hetvarthasya sādhaka tvam dṛṣṭānte darśayitavyam iti na ca tarhi pratyakṣa ādīnām aprāmāṇyam
atha pratyakṣa ādīnām aprāmāṇyam

original: . upādīyamānamapyudāharaṇaṃ nārthaṃ sādhayiṣyatīti. soyaṃ sarvapramāṇairvyāhato heturahetuḥ-- “siddhāntamabhyupetya tadvirodhī viruddhaḥ 1-2-6“iti,
analyzed: upādīyamānam api udāharaṇam na artham sādhayiṣyati iti saḥ ayam sarva pramāṇaiḥ vyāhataḥ hetuḥ ahetuḥ siddhāntam abhyupetya tad virodhī viruddhaḥ

original: vākyārtho hyasya siddhāntaḥ sa ca vākyārthaḥ-- 'pratyakṣādīni nārthaṃ sādhayanti' iti. idaṃ cāvayavānāmupādānamarthasya sādhanāyeti/
analyzed: vākya arthaḥ hi asya siddhāntaḥ sa ca vākya arthaḥ pratyakṣa ādīni na artham sādhayanti iti idam ca avayavānām upādānam arthasya sādhanāya iti
atha na upādīyate

original: apradarśitahetvarthasya dṛṣṭānte na sādhakatvamiti pratiṣedho nopapadyate-- hetutvāsiddheriti // 13 //
analyzed: apradarśita hetvarthasya dṛṣṭānte na sādhaka tvam iti pratiṣedhaḥ na upapadyate hetu tva asiddheḥ iti
tad prāmāṇye vā na sarva pramāṇa vipratiṣedhaḥ

original: paravākyepyavayavāśritānāṃ prāmāṇyaṃ prasajyate-- aviśeṣāditi. evaṃ ca na sarvāṇi
analyzed: para vākye api avayava āśritānām prāmāṇyam prasajyate aviśeṣāt iti evam ca na sarvāṇi

kimartham punar idam ucyate
pūrva ukta nibandhana artham yat tāvat pūrva uktam upalabdhi hetoḥ upalabdhi viṣayasya ca arthasya

original: pūrvāparasahabhāvāniyamād yathādarśanaṃ vibhāgavacanam' iti taditaḥ samuttthānaṃ yathā vijñāyeta /
analyzed: pūrva apara sahabhāva aniyamāt yathādarśanam vibhāga vacanam iti tat itas samutthānam yathā vijñāyeta

original: aniyamadarśī khalvayaṃ krṛṣirniyamena pratiṣedhaṃ pratyācaṣṭe-- traikālyasya cāyuktaḥ pratiṣedha iti/
analyzed: aniyama darśī khalu ayam krṛṣiḥ niyamena pratiṣedham pratyācaṣṭe traikālyasya ca ayuktaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ iti
tatra ekām vidhām udāharati śabdāt ātodya siddhi vat iti

original: yathā paścāt siddhena śabdane pūrvasiddhamātodyamanumīyate. sādhyaṃ cātodyaṃ sādhanaṃ
analyzed: yathā paścāt siddhena śabdane pūrva siddham ātodyam anumīyate sādhyam ca ātodyam sādhanam

original: ca śabdaḥ. antarhite hyātodye svanato 'numānaṃ bhavatīti-- vīṇā vādyate veṇuḥ pūryate
analyzed: ca śabdaḥ antarhite hi ātodye svanataḥ bhavati iti vīṇā vādyate veṇuḥ pūryate

original: iti svanaviśeṣeṇātodyaviśeṣaṃ pratipadyate. tathā pūrvasiddhamupalabdhiviṣayaṃ paścātsiddhenopalabdhihetunā
analyzed: iti svana viśeṣeṇa ātodya viśeṣam pratipadyate tathā pūrva siddham upalabdhi viṣayam paścāt siddhena upalabdhi hetunā
pratipadyate iti nidarśana artha tvāt ca asya śeṣayoḥ vidhayoḥ yathā uktam udāharaṇam veditavyam iti
kasmāt punar iha tat na ucyate pūrva uktam upapādyate

original: iti, sarvathā tāvadayamarthaḥ prakāśayitavyaḥ sa iha vā prakāśyeta tatra vā na kaścidviśeṣa iti/
analyzed: iti sarvathā tāvat ayam arthaḥ prakāśayitavyaḥ saḥ iha vā prakāśyeta tatra vā na kaścid viśeṣaḥ iti

original: pramāṇaṃ prameyamiti ca samākhyā samāveśena vartate-- samākhyānimittavaśāt. samākhyānimittaṃ
analyzed: pramāṇam prameyam iti ca samākhyā samāveśena vartate samākhyā nimitta vaśāt samākhyā nimittam

original: tūpalabdhisādhanaṃ pramāṇam upalabdhiviṣayaśca prameyamiti. yadā copalabdhiviṣayaḥ
analyzed: tu upalabdhi sādhanam pramāṇam upalabdhi viṣayaḥ ca prameyam iti yadā ca upalabdhi viṣayaḥ

original: kvacidupalabdhisādhanaṃ bhavati tadā pramāṇaṃ prameyamiti caiko 'rtho 'bhidhīyate // 15 //

analyzed: yat api manyeta dṛṣṭam idam senā vana aṅgānām pṛthaktvasya a grahaṇāt abhedena ekam iti grahaṇam na ca dṛṣṭam śakyam pratyākhyātum iti
tat ca nā evam tad viṣayasya parīkṣā upapatteḥ

original: darśanaviṣaya evāyaṃ parīkṣyate yoyamekamiti pratyayo dṛśyate sa parīkṣyate-- kiṃ dravyāntaraviṣayo vā ?
analyzed: darśana viṣayaḥ eva ayam parīkṣyate yaḥ uyam ekam iti pratyayaḥ dṛśyate sa parīkṣyate kim dravya antara viṣayaḥ vā
atha aṇu saṃcaya viṣayaḥ

original: iti, atra darśanamanyatarasya sādhakaṃ na bhavati/
analyzed: iti atra darśanam anyatarasya sādhakam na bhavati

original: nānābhāve cāṇūnāṃ pṛthaktvasyāgrahaṇādabhedena 'ekam' itigrahaṇam atasmiṃstaditipratyayo yathā sthāṇau puruṣa iti/
analyzed: nānābhāve ca aṇūnām pṛthaktvasya agrahaṇāt abhedena ekam iti grahaṇam a tasmin tat iti pratyayaḥ yathā sthāṇau puruṣaḥ iti
tatas kim

original: sthāṇau puruṣa iti pratyayasya kiṃ pradhānam ?
analyzed: sthāṇau puruṣaḥ iti pratyayasya kim pradhānam

original: . yo 'sau puruṣe puruṣapratyayaḥ tasmin sati puruṣasāmānyagrahaṇāt sthāṇau puruṣoyamiti,
analyzed: yaḥ sau puruṣe puruṣa pratyayaḥ tasmin sati puruṣa sāmānya grahaṇāt sthāṇau puruṣaḥ yam iti

original: evaṃ nānābhūteṣu 'ekam' iti sāmānyagrahaṇāt pradhāne sati bhavitumarhati pradhānaṃ ca sarvasyāgrahaṇād nopapadyate iti. tasmādabhinne evāyamabhedapratyayaḥ--  #
analyzed: evam nānā bhūteṣu ekam iti sāmānya grahaṇāt pradhāne sati bhavitum arhati pradhānam ca sarvasya agrahaṇāt na upapadyate iti tasmāt abhinne eva ayam abheda pratyayaḥ
ekam iti
indriya antara viṣayeṣu abheda pratyayaḥ pradhānam iti ced
na viśeṣa hetu abhāvāt dṛṣṭānta avyavasthā

original: śrotrādiviṣayeṣu śabdādiṣvabhinneṣu ekapratyayaḥ pradhānam anekasminn ekapratyayasyeti/
analyzed: śrotra ādi viṣayeṣu śabda ādiṣu abhinneṣu eka pratyayaḥ pradhānam anekasmin eka pratyayasya iti

original: evaṃ ca sati dṛṣṭāntopādānaṃ na vyavatiṣṭhate-- viśeṣahetvabhāvāt,
analyzed: evam ca sati dṛṣṭānta upādānam na vyavatiṣṭhate viśeṣa hetu abhāvāt
aṇuṣu saṃciteṣu eka pratyayaḥ kim a tasmin tat iti pratyayaḥ sthāṇau puruṣa pratyaya vat

original: athārthasya tathābhāvāt tasmiṃstaditipratyayo yathā śabdasyaikatvādekaḥ śabda iti ?
analyzed: atha arthasya tathā bhāvāt tasmin tad iti pratyayaḥ yathā śabdasya eka tvāt ekaḥ śabdaḥ iti
viśeṣa hetu parigraham antareṇa dṛṣṭāntau saṃśayam āpādayataḥ iti
kumbha vat saṃcaya mātram gandha ādayaḥ api iti anudāharaṇam gandha ādayaḥ iti
evam parimāṇa saṃyoga spanda jāti viśeṣa pratyayān api anuyoktavyaḥ teṣu ca evam prasaṅgaḥ iti

original: ekatvabuddhistasmiṃstaditipratyaya iti viśeṣahetuḥ-- mahaditi- pratyena sāmānādhikaraṇyāt / 16 /
analyzed: eka tva buddhiḥ tasmin tat iti pratyayaḥ iti viśeṣa hetuḥ mahat iti pratyena sāmānādhikaraṇyāt  /

original: 'ekamidaṃ mahacca' ityekaviṣayau pratyayau samānādhikaraṇau bhavatastena vijñāyate-- yanmahat tadekamiti/
analyzed: ekam idam mahat ca iti eka viṣayau pratyayau samāna adhikaraṇau bhavataḥ tena vijñāyate yat mahat tat ekam iti
aṇu samūha atiśaya grahaṇam mahat pratyayaḥ iti ced
saḥ yam tasmin tad iti pratyayaḥ bhavati iti

original: kiṃ cātaḥ ? atasmiṃstaditipratyayasya pradhānāpekṣitvāt pradhānasiddhiriti ubhavitavyaṃ mahatyeva mahatpratyayeneti/
analyzed: kim ca atas mahati eva mahat pratyayena iti

original: aṇuḥ śabdo mahāniti ca vyavasāyāt pradhānasiddhiriticet ?
analyzed: aṇuḥ śabdaḥ mahān iti ca vyavasāyāt pradhāna siddhiḥ iti ced
na manda tīvra tā grahaṇam iyat tā anavadhāraṇāt yathā dravye

original: 'aṇuḥ śabdo 'lpo mandaḥ' ityetasya grahaṇam 'mahān śabdaḥ paṭustīvraḥ' ityetasya grahaṇam, kasmāt ?
analyzed: aṇuḥ śabdaḥ lpaḥ mandaḥ iti etasya grahaṇam mahān śabdaḥ paṭuḥ tīvraḥ iti etasya grahaṇam kasmāt

original: iyattānavadhāraṇātuna hyayam 'mahān śabdaḥ' itivyavasyan 'iyānayam' ityavadhārayati yathā badarāmalakabilvādīni/
analyzed: hi ayam mahān śabdaḥ iti vyavasyan iyān ayam iti avadhārayati yathā badara āmalaka bilva ādīni
saṃyukte ime iti ca dvi tva samāna āśraya prāpti grahaṇam
dvau samudāyau āśrayaḥ saṃyogasya iti ced
kā oyam samudāyaḥ
prāptiḥ anekasya
anekā vā prāptiḥ ekasya samudāyaḥ iti ced
prāpteḥ agrahaṇam prāpti āśritāyā

original: 'saṃyukte ime vastunī' iti nātra dve prāptī saṃyukte gṛhyete //
analyzed: saṃyukte ime vastunī iti na atra dve prāptī saṃyukte gṛhyete

na dvi tvena sāmānādhikaraṇyasya grahaṇāt

original: 'dvāvimau saṃyuktāvarthauṃ' iti grahaṇe sati nānekasamūhāśrayaḥ saṃyogo gṛhyate na ca dvayoraṇvorgrahaṇamasti tasmānmahatī dvitvāśrayabhūte  #
analyzed: dvau imau saṃyuktau arthauṃ iti grahaṇe sati na aneka samūha āśrayaḥ saṃyogaḥ gṛhyate na ca dvayoḥ aṇvoḥ grahaṇam asti tasmāt mahatī dvi tva āśraya bhūte
dravye saṃyogasya sthānam iti
pratyāsattiḥ pratīghāta avasānā saṃyogaḥ na artha antaram iti ced
na artha antara hetu tvāt saṃyoga asya

original: śabdarūpādispandānāṃ hetuḥ saṃyogaḥ-- na ca dravyayorguṇāntaropajananamantareṇa śabde rūpādiṣu spande ca kāraṇatvaṃ gṛhyate tasmād guṇāntaram/
analyzed: śabda rūpa ādi spandānām hetuḥ saṃyogaḥ na ca dravyayoḥ guṇa antara upajananam antareṇa śabde rūpa ādiṣu spande ca kāraṇa tvam gṛhyate tasmāt guṇa antaram
pratyaya viṣayaḥ ca artha antaram tad pratiṣedhaḥ vā

original: 'kuṇḍalī guruḥ akuṇḍalaśchātraḥ' iti saṃyogabuddheśca yadyarthāntaraṃpa na viṣayaḥ ?
analyzed: kuṇḍalī guruḥ a kuṇḍalaḥ chātraḥ iti saṃyoga buddheḥ ca na viṣayaḥ
artha antara pratiṣedhaḥ tarhi viṣayaḥ tatra pratiṣidhyamāna vacanam

original: 'saṃyukte dravye' iti yadarthāntaramanyatra dṛṣṭamiha pratiṣidhyate tad vaktavyamiti/
analyzed: saṃyukte dravye iti yat artha antaram anyatra dṛṣṭam iha pratiṣidhyate tat vaktavyam iti
dvayoḥ mahatoḥ āśritasya grahaṇāt na aṇu āśrayaḥ iti
jāti viśeṣasya pratyaya anuvṛtti liṅgasya a pratyākhyānam pratyākhyāne vā pratyaya vyavasthā anupapattiḥ
vyadhikaraṇasya anabhivyakteḥ adhikaraṇa vacanam  /
aṇu samavasthānam viṣayaḥ iti ced
prāpta aprāpta sāmarthya vacanam
kim aprāpte aṇu samavasthāne tad āśrayaḥ jāti viśeṣaḥ gṛhyate
atha prāpte iti
aprāpte grahaṇam iti ced
vyavahitasya aṇu samavasthānasya api upalabdhi prasaṅgaḥ uvyavahite ṇu samavasthāne tad āśrayaḥ jāti viśeṣaḥ gṛhyeta
prāpte grahaṇam iti ced
madhya para bhāgayoḥ aprāptau anabhivyaktiḥ
yāvat prāptam bhavati tāvatī abhivyaktiḥ iti ced

original: tāvato 'dhikaraṇatvamaṇusamavasthānasyauyāvati prāpte jātiviśeṣo gṛhyate tāvadasyādhikaraṇamiti prāptaṃ bhavati tatra--- ekasamudāye pratīyamāne  #
analyzed: tāvataḥ adhikaraṇa tvam aṇu samavasthānasya auyāvati prāpte jāti viśeṣaḥ gṛhyate tāvat asya adhikaraṇam iti prāptam bhavati tatra eka samudāye pratīyamāne
rtha bhede  /

original: evaṃ ca sati yo 'ṇusamudāyo vṛkṣa iti pratīyate tatra vṛkṣabahutvaṃ pratīyetauyatra yatra hyaṇusamudāyasya bhāge vṛkṣatvaṃ gṛhyate sa sa vṛkṣa
analyzed: evam ca sati yaḥ ṇu samudāyaḥ vṛkṣaḥ iti pratīyate tatra vṛkṣa bahu tvam yatra hi aṇu samudāyasya bhāge vṛkṣa tvam gṛhyate sa sa vṛkṣa
tasmāt samudita aṇu samavasthānasya artha antarasya jāti viśeṣa abhivyakti viṣaya tvāt avayavi artha antara bhūtaḥ iti

anumānam idānīm parīkṣate
rodha upaghāta sādṛśyebhyaḥ vyabhicārāt anumānam apramāṇam
apramāṇam iti

original: rodhādapi nadī pūrṇā gṛhyate tadā ca 'upariṣṭhād vṛṣṭo devaḥ' iti mithyānumānam. nīḍopaghātādapi pipīlikāṇḍasaṃcāro bhavati tadā ca 'bhaviṣyati  #
analyzed: rodhāt api nadī pūrṇā gṛhyate tadā ca upariṣṭhāt vṛṣṭaḥ devaḥ iti mithyā anumānam nīḍa upaghātāt api pipīlika aṇḍa saṃcāraḥ bhavati tadā ca bhaviṣyati  /
vṛṣṭiḥ iti mithyā anumānam iti

original: puruṣopi mayūravāśitamanukaroti tadāpi śabdasādṛśyād mithyānumānaṃ bhavati // 37 //
analyzed: puruṣaḥ api mayūra vāśitam anukaroti tadā api śabda sādṛśyāt mithyā anumānam bhavati  /
na eka deśa trāsa sādṛśyebhyaḥ ṛtha antara bhāvāt
na ayam anumāna vyabhicāraḥ ananumāne tu khalu ayam anumāna abhimānaḥ
katham na a viśiṣṭaḥ liṅgam bhavitum arhati

original: pūrvodakaviśiṣṭaṃ khalu varṣodakaṃ śīghrataratvaṃ srotaso bahutaraphenaphalaparṇakāṣṭhādivahanaṃ
analyzed: pūrva udaka viśiṣṭam khalu varṣa udakam śīghratara tvam srotasaḥ bahutara phena phala parṇa kāṣṭha ādi vahanam

original: copalabhamānaḥ pūrṇatvena nadyāḥ 'upari vṛṣṭo devaḥ' ityanuminoti nodakavṛddhimātreṇa /
analyzed: ca upalabhamānaḥ pūrṇa tvena nadyāḥ upari vṛṣṭaḥ devaḥ iti anuminoti na udaka vṛddhi mātreṇa

original: pipīlikāprāyasyāṇḍasaṃcāre 'bhaviṣyati vṛṣṭiḥ' ityanumīyate na kāsāṃ ciditi/
analyzed: pipīlikā prāyasya aṇḍa saṃcāre bhaviṣyati vṛṣṭiḥ iti anumīyate na kāsām cit iti

original: yastu viśiṣṭācchabdād viśiṣṭamayūravāśitaṃ gṛhṇati tasya viśiṣṭo 'rtho gṛhyamāṇo liṅgaṃ yathā sarpādīnāmiti/

original: nedānīṃ tṛtīyo 'dhvā vidyate yatra patatīti vartamānaḥ kālo gṛhyeta. tasmād vartamānaḥ kālo na vidyate iti // 39 //
analyzed: na idānīm tṛtīyaḥ dhvā vidyate yatra patati iti vartamānaḥ kālaḥ gṛhyeta tasmāt vartamānaḥ kālaḥ na vidyate iti  /

na adhva vyaṅgyaḥ kālaḥ kim tarhi

original: yadi cāyaṃ dravye vartamānaṃ patanaṃ na gṛhṇāti kasya uparamam utpatsyamānatāṃ vā prativadyate ?/

original: soyaṃ kriyādravyayoḥ saṃbandhaṃ gṛhṇāti vartamānaḥ kālaḥ tadāśrayau cetarau kālau tadabhāve na syātāmiti // 40 //

analyzed: rūpa sparśau gandha rasau na itaretara apekṣau sidhyataḥ evam atīta anāgatau iti na itaretara apekṣā

original: sat kiñcidanujānātīti pratyakṣanimittaṃ pratyakṣaviṣayaḥ pratyakṣajñānaṃ sarvaṃ nopapadyate,

original: ubhayathā ca vartamānaḥ kālo gṛhyate-- kvacidarthasadbhāvavyaṅgyo yathā 'asti dravyam'

original: iti. kvacit kriyāsaṃtānavyaṅgyo yathā 'pacati chinattīti. nānāvidhā caikārthā kriyā
analyzed: iti kvacid kriyā saṃtāna vyaṅgyaḥ yathā pacati chinatti iti nānāvidhā ca ekārthā kriyā

original: yaccedaṃ pacyamānaṃ chidyamānaṃ ca tat kriyamāṇaṃ tasmin kriyamāṇe---
analyzed: yat ca idam pacyamānam chidyamānam ca tat kriyamāṇam tasmin kriyamāṇe

original: kriyāsaṃtāno 'nārabdhaścikīrpito 'nāgataḥ kālaḥ 'pakṣyatīti. prayojanāvasānaḥ kriyāsaṃtānoparamo 'tītaḥ kālaḥ 'apākṣīt' iti. ārabdhakriyāsaṃtāno  #

vartamānaḥ kālaḥ pacati iti

original: tatra yā uparatā sā kṛtatā yā cikīrṣitā sā kartavyatā yā vidyamānā sā kriyamāṇatā.
analyzed: tatra yā uparatā sā kṛta tā yā cikīrṣitā sā kartavya tā yā vidyamānā sā kriyamāṇa tā

original: tadevaṃ kriyāsaṃtānasthaḥ traikālyasamāhāraḥ 'pacati pacyate' iti vartamānagrahaṇena
analyzed: tat evam kriyā saṃtāna sthaḥ traikālya samāhāraḥ pacati pacyate iti vartamāna grahaṇena

original: gṛhyate-- kriyāsaṃtānasya hyatrāvicchedo vidhīyate nārambho noparam iti /

original: soyamubhayathā vartamānāṃ gṛhyate-- apavṛkto vyapavṛktaśca atītānāgatābhyām. sthitivyaṅgyaḥ--

original: anyaśca pratyāsattiprabhṛterrathasya vivakṣāyāṃ tadabhidhāyī bahuprakāro lokeṣūtprekṣitavyaḥ,

atyanta prāya eka deśa sādharmyāt upamānapa asiddhiḥ

original: yadā hyayamupayuktopamāno godarśī gavā samānamarthaṃ paśyati tadā ayaṃ gavaya ityasya saṃjñāśabdasya vyavasthāṃ pratipadyate na caivamanumānamiti/

itas ca anumānam śabdaḥ

śabdaḥ unumānam iti vartate

yat tāvat arthasya anumeya tvāt iti tat na
āpta upadeśa sāmarthyāt śabdāt artha saṃpratyayaḥ

original: 'svargaḥ apsarasaḥ uttarāḥ kuravaḥ sapta dvīpāḥ samudro lokasaṃniveśaḥ' ityevamāderapratyakṣasyārthasya na śabdamātrāt pratyayaḥ, kiṃ tarhi
analyzed: svargaḥ apsarasaḥ uttarāḥ kuravaḥ sapta dvīpāḥ samudraḥ loka saṃniveśaḥ iti evamādeḥ apratyakṣasya arthasya na śabda mātrāt pratyayaḥ kim tarhi

original: 'āptairayamuktaḥ śabdaḥ' ityataḥ saṃpratyayaḥ-- viparyayeṇa saṃpratyayābhāvāt na tvevamanumānamiti/

upalabdheḥ a dvi pravṛtti tvāt iti

original: asti ca śabdārthayoḥ saṃbandho 'nujñātaḥ asti ca pratiṣiddhaḥu 'asyedam' itiṣaṣṭhīviśiṣṭasya vākyasyārthaviśeṣo 'nujñātaḥ prāptilakṣaṇastu  #

śabda arthayoḥ saṃbandhaḥ pratiṣiddhaḥ

original: kasmāt ?, pramāṇatonupalabdheḥupratyakṣatastāvat śabdārthaprāpternopalabdhiḥ-- atīndriyatvātuyenendriyeṇa gṛhyate śabdastasya viṣayabhāvamativṛtto  #

rthaḥ na gṛhyate
asti ca atīndriya viṣaya bhūtaḥ api arthaḥ
samānena ca indriyeṇa gṛhyamāṇayoḥ prāptiḥ gṛhyate iti

original: prāptilakṣaṇe ca gṛhyamāṇe saṃbandhe śabdārthayoḥ śabdāntike vārthaḥ syāt arthāntike vā śabdaḥ syāt ubhayaṃ vobhayatra // 52 //
analyzed: prāpti lakṣaṇe ca gṛhyamāṇe saṃbandhe śabda arthayoḥ śabda antike vā arthaḥ syāt artha antike vā śabdaḥ syāt ubhayam vā ubhayatra  /
atha khalu ayam
pūraṇa pradāha pāṭana anupalabdheḥ ca saṃbandha abhāvaḥ
sthāna karaṇa abhāvāt iti ca arthaḥ
na ca ayam anumānataḥ upi upalabhyate śabdāntike rthaḥ iti

original: etasmin pakṣe 'py āsyasthānakaraṇoccāraṇīyaḥ śabdastadantike 'rtha iti annāgnyasiśabdoccāraṇe pūraṇapradāhapāṭanāni gṛhyeran. na ca gṛhyante,
analyzed: etasmin pakṣe pi āsya sthāna karaṇa uccāraṇīyaḥ śabdaḥ tad antike rthaḥ iti anna agni asi śabda uccāraṇe pūraṇa pradāha pāṭanāni gṛhyeran na ca gṛhyante
agrahaṇāt na anumeyaḥ prāpti lakṣaṇaḥ saṃbandhaḥ
artha antike śabdam iti sthāna karaṇa asaṃbhavāt anuccāraṇam
sthānam kaṇṭha ādayaḥ karaṇam prayatna viśeṣaḥ tasya artha antike nupapattiḥ iti
ubhaya pratiṣedhāt ca na ubhayam
tasmāt na śabdena arthaḥ prāptaḥ iti
śabda artha vyavasthānāt apratiṣedhaḥ

original: śabdārthapratyayasya vyavasthādarśanād anumīyate-- asti śabdārthasaṃbandho vyavasthākāraṇam,

atra samādhiḥ

original: . samayakāritaṃ yattadavocāma-- 'asyedamiti ṣaṣṭhīviśiṣṭasya vākyasyārthaviśeṣo 'nujñātaḥ śabdārthayoḥ saṃbandhaḥ' iti samayaṃ tamavocāma iti/

asya śabdasya idam artha jātam abhidheyam iti abhidhāna abhidhaiya niyama niyogaḥ

original: tadevaṃ prāptilakṣaṇasya śabdārthasaṃbandhasyārthajuṣo 'py anumānahetur na bhavatīti // 55 //

original: svābhāvike hi śabdasyārthapratyāyakatve yathākāmaṃ na syāt,

original: . anṛtadoṣāt-- putrakāmeṣṭau--“putrakāmaḥ putreṣṭyā yajeta“iti. neṣṭau saṃsthitāyāṃ putrajanma dṛśyate,

original: dṛṣṭārthasya vākyasyānṛtatvāt adṛṣṭārthamapi vākyam--“agnihotraṃ juhuyāt svargakāmaḥ“ityādyanṛtamiti jñāyate/

vyāghātāt ca anyatarat mithyā iti

original: punaruktadoṣācca-- abhyāse deśyamāne“triḥ prathamāmanvāha triruttamām“iti punaruktadoṣo

original: iṣṭyā pitarau saṃyujyamānau putraṃ janayata iti,

analyzed: iṣṭiḥ karaṇam sādhanam pitarau kartārau saṃyogaḥ karma trayāṇām guṇa yogāt putra janma vaiguṇyāt viparyayaḥ

original: sādhanavaiguṇyaṃ havirasaṃskṛtam upahatamiti. mantrā nyūnādhikāḥ svaravarṇahīnā iti. dakṣiṇā durāgatā hīnā ninditā ceti/

original: loke ca 'agnikāmo dāruṇī mathnīyāt' iti vidhivākyam tatra karmavaiguṇyaṃ mithyābhimanthānam.

analyzed: kartṛ vaiguṇyam prajñā prayatna gataḥ pramādaḥ sādhana vaiguṇyam ārdram suṣiram dāru

original: iti. tatra phalaṃ na niṣpadyate iti nānṛtadoṣaḥ,

original: na cedaṃ laukikād bhidyate--“putrakāmaḥ putreṣṭyā yajeta“iti // 58 //

original: doṣa ucyate--“śyāvo 'syāhutimabhyavaharati ca udite juhoti“tadidaṃ vidhibhreṣe nindāvacanamiti // 59 //

original: 'arthāpattir na pramāṇam-- anaikāntikatvāt' iti vākyaṃ pratiṣedhaḥ tenānena arthāpatteḥ pramāṇatvaṃ pratiṣidhyate na sadbhāvaḥ,
analyzed: arthāpattiḥ na pramāṇam anaikāntika tvāt iti vākyam pratiṣedhaḥ tena anena arthāpatteḥ pramāṇa tvam pratiṣidhyate na sadbhāvaḥ

original: evamanaikāntiko bhavati. anaikāntikatvādapramāṇenānena na kaścidarthaḥ pratiṣidhyate iti // 5 //
analyzed: evam anaikāntikaḥ bhavati anaikāntika tvāt apramāṇena anena na kaścid arthaḥ pratiṣidhyate iti

original: artha manyase niyataviṣayeṣvartheṣu svaviṣaye vyabhicāro bhavati. na ca pratiṣedhasya sadbhāvo viṣayaḥ ?, evaṃ tarhi---
analyzed: artha manyase niyata viṣayeṣu artheṣu sva viṣaye vyabhicāraḥ bhavati na ca pratiṣedhasya sadbhāvaḥ viṣayaḥ evam tarhi
tad prāmāṇye vā na arthāpatti aprāmāṇyam

original: athāṅpatterapi kāryotpādane kāraṇasattāyā avyabhicāro viṣayaḥ na ca kāraṇadharmo nimittapratibandhāt kāyāṅnutpādakatvamiti // 6 //
analyzed: atha āṅpatteḥ api kārya utpādane kāraṇa sattāyāḥ avyabhicāraḥ viṣayaḥ na ca kāraṇa dharmaḥ nimitta pratibandhāt
abhāvasya tarhi pramāṇa bhāva abhyanujñā na upapadyate katham iti
na abhāva prāmāṇyam prameya asiddheḥ
abhāvasya bhūyasi prameye loka siddhe vaiyātyāt ucyate
na abhāva prāmāṇyam prameya asiddheḥ
iti
atha ayam artha bahu tvāt artha eka deśaḥ udāhriyate
lakṣiteṣu alakṣaṇa lakṣita tvāt alakṣitānām tad prameya siddhiḥ
tasya abhāvasya sidhyati prameyam
katham lakṣiteṣu vāsaḥsu anupādeyeṣu
upādeyānām alakṣitānām alakṣaṇa lakṣita tvāt lakṣaṇa abhāvena lakṣita tvāt iti

original: ubhayasaṃnidhau' alakṣitāni vāsāṃsyānaya' iti prayukto yeṣu vāsaḥsatu lakṣaṇāni na
analyzed: ubhaya saṃnidhau alakṣitāni vāsāṃsi ānaye iti prayuktaḥ yeṣu vāsaḥ satu lakṣaṇāni na

original: bhavanti tāni lakṣaṇābhāvena pratipadyate pratipadya cānayati pratipattihetuśca pramāṇamiti // 8 //
analyzed: bhavanti tāni lakṣaṇa abhāvena pratipadyate pratipadya ca ānayati pratipatti hetuḥ ca pramāṇam iti

original: NyS_2,2.9: asatyarthe nābhāva iti cen nānyalakṣaṇopapatteḥ //
analyzed: asati arthe na abhāvaḥ iti ced na anya lakṣaṇa upapatteḥ

original: yatra bhūtvā kiñcinna bhavati tatra tasyābhāva upapadyate. na cālakṣiteṣu vāsaḥsu lakṣaṇāni bhūtvā na bhavanti. tasmātteṣu lakṣaṇābhāvo 'nupapanna
analyzed: yatra bhūtvā kiñcid na bhavati tatra tasya abhāvaḥ upapadyate na ca alakṣiteṣu vāsaḥsu lakṣaṇāni bhūtvā na bhavanti tasmāt teṣu lakṣaṇa abhāvaḥ
na anya lakṣaṇa upapatteḥ

original: yathāyamanyeṣu vāsaḥsu lakṣaṇānāmupapattiṃ paśyati naivamalakṣiteṣu soyaṃ lakṣaṇābhāvaṃ paśyan abhāvenārthaṃ pratipadyate iti // 9 //
analyzed: yathā ayam anyeṣu vāsaḥsu lakṣaṇānām upapattim paśyati na evam alakṣiteṣu saḥ uyam lakṣaṇa abhāvam paśyan abhāvena artham pratipadyate iti
tad siddheḥ alakṣiteṣu ahetuḥ
teṣu vāsaḥsu lakṣiteṣu siddhiḥ

original: vidyamānatā yeṣāṃ bhavati na teṣāmabhāvo lakṣaṇānām /
analyzed: vidyamāna tā yeṣām bhavati na teṣām abhāvaḥ lakṣaṇānām

original: yāni ca lakṣiteṣu vidyante lakṣaṇāni teṣāmalakṣiteṣvabhāva ity ahetuḥ-- yāni khalu bhavanti teṣāmabhāvo vyāhata iti // 10 //
analyzed: yāni ca lakṣiteṣu vidyante lakṣaṇāni teṣām alakṣiteṣu abhāvaḥ iti ahetuḥ yāni khalu bhavanti teṣām abhāvaḥ vyāhataḥ iti  /
na lakṣaṇa avasthita apekṣā siddheḥ

original: na brūmo yāni lakṣaṇāni bhavanti teṣāmabhāva iti kiṃ tu keṣu cillakṣaṇānyavasthitāni,
analyzed: na brūmaḥ yāni lakṣaṇāni bhavanti teṣām abhāvaḥ iti kim tu keṣu cit lakṣaṇāni avasthitāni

original: anavasthitāni keṣucit. apekṣamāṇo yeṣu lakṣaṇānāṃ bhāvaṃ na paśyati tāni lakṣaṇābhāvena prapidyate iti // 11 //
analyzed: anavasthitāni keṣucid apekṣamāṇaḥ yeṣu lakṣaṇānām bhāvam na paśyati tāni lakṣaṇa abhāvena prapidyate iti
prāk utpatteḥ abhāva upapatteḥ ca

original: abhāvadvaitaṃ khalu bhavati-- prāk cotpatteravidyamānatā. utpannasya cātmano hānādavidyamānatā.
analyzed: abhāva dvaitam khalu bhavati prāk ca utpatteḥ avidyamāna tā utpannasya ca ātmanaḥ hānāt avidyamāna tā

original: tatrālakṣiteṣu vāsaḥsu prāgutpatteravidyamānatālakṣaṇo lakṣaṇānāmabhāvo netara iti // 12 //
analyzed: tatra alakṣiteṣu vāsaḥsu prāk utpatteḥ avidyamāna tā lakṣaṇaḥ lakṣaṇānām abhāvaḥ na itaraḥ iti
āpta upadeśaḥ śabdaḥ

original: iti pramāṇabhāve viśeṣaṇaṃ bruvatā 'nānāprakāraḥ śabdaḥ' iti jñāpyate. tasmin sāmānyena vicāraḥ-- kiṃ nityo 'thānityaḥ ?
analyzed: iti pramāṇa bhāve viśeṣaṇam bruvatā nānā prakāraḥ śabdaḥ iti jñāpyate tasmin sāmānyena vicāraḥ kim nityaḥ thā anityaḥ
iti vimarśa hetu anuyoge ca vipratipatteḥ saṃśayaḥ
ākāśa guṇaḥ śabdaḥ vibhuḥ nityaḥ bhivyakti dharmakaḥ iti eke
gandha ādi sahavṛttiḥ dravyeṣu saṃniviṣṭaḥ gandha ādi vat avasthitaḥ bhivyakti dharmakaḥ iti apare
ākāśa guṇaḥ śabdaḥ utpatti nirodha dharmakaḥ buddhi vat iti apare

original: 'mahābhūtasaṃkṣobhajaḥ śabdo 'nāśrita utpattidharmako nirodhadharmakaḥ' ityanye. ataḥ saṃśayaḥ-- kimatra tattvam ?
analyzed: mahābhūta saṃkṣobha jaḥ śabdaḥ na āśritaḥ utpatti dharmakaḥ nirodha dharmakaḥ iti anye atas saṃśayaḥ kim atra tattvam
iti anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti uttaram
katham
ādimat tvāt aindriyaka tvāt kṛtaka vat upacārāt ca

original: ādiḥuyoniḥukāraṇam-- ādīyate 'smāditi. kāraṇavad anityaṃ dṛṣṭam. saṃyogavibhāgajaśca śabdaḥ kāraṇavattvādanitya iti/
analyzed: ādīyate smāt iti kāraṇavat anityam dṛṣṭam saṃyoga vibhāga jaḥ ca śabdaḥ kāraṇavat tvāt anityaḥ iti
kā punar iyam artha deśānā kāraṇavat tvāt iti

original: , utpattidharmakattvādanityaḥ śabda iti = bhūtvā na bhavati = vināśadharmaka iti/
analyzed: utpatti dharmaka ttvāt anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti bhūtvā na bhavati vināśa dharmakaḥ iti
sāṃśayikam etat kim utpatti kāraṇam saṃyoga vibhāgau śabdasya
āhosvit abhivyakti kāraṇam
iti atas āha aindriyaka tvāt iti
indriya pratyāsatti grāhyaḥ aindriyakaḥ
kim ayam vyañjakena samāna deśaḥ bhivyajyate rūpa ādi vat
atha saṃyoga jāt śabdāt śabda saṃtāne sati śrotra pratyāsannaḥ gṛhyate

original: iti--- saṃyoganivṛttau śabdagrahaṇānna vyañjakena samānadeśasya grahaṇam1/
analyzed: iti saṃyoga nivṛttau śabda grahaṇāt na vyañjakena samāna deśasya

original: dāruvraścane dāruparaśusaṃyoganivṛttau dūrasthena śabdo gṛhyate. na ca vyañjakābhāve vyaṅgyagrahaṇaṃ bhavati tasmānna vyañjakaḥ saṃyogaḥ,
analyzed: dāru vraścane dāru paraśu saṃyoga nivṛttau dūra sthena śabdaḥ gṛhyate na ca vyañjaka abhāve vyaṅgya grahaṇam bhavati tasmāt na vyañjakaḥ saṃyogaḥ

original: utpādake tu saṃyoge saṃyogajācchabdācchabdasantāne sati śrotrapratyāsannasya grahaṇamiti yuktaṃ saṃyoganivṛttau śabdasya grahaṇamiti/
analyzed: utpādake tu saṃyoge saṃyoga jāt śabdāt śabda santāne sati śrotra pratyāsannasya grahaṇam iti yuktam saṃyoga nivṛttau śabdasya grahaṇam iti

original: itaścaśabda utpadyate nābhivyajyate-- kṛtakavadupacārātu 'tīvraṃ mandam' iti kṛtakamupacaryate--
analyzed: itas caśabdaḥ utpadyate na abhivyajyate tīvram mandam iti kṛtakam upacaryate

original: 'tīvraṃ sukhaṃ mandaṃ sukham. tīvraṃ duḥkhaṃ mandaṃ duḥkham' iti. upacaryate ca--
analyzed: tīvram sukham mandam sukham tīvram duḥkham mandam duḥkham iti upacaryate ca
tīvraḥ śabdaḥ mandaḥ śabdaḥ iti

original: vyañjakasya tathābhāvād grahaṇasya tīvramandatā rūpavaditi cet ?
analyzed: vyañjakasya tathā bhāvāt grahaṇasya tīvra manda tā rūpa vat iti ced
na abhibhava upapatteḥ

original: saṃyogasya vyañjakasya tīvramandatayā śabdagrahaṇasya tīvramandatā bhavati na tu śabdo bhidyate yathā prakāśasya tīvramandatayā rūpagrahaṇasyeti,
analyzed: saṃyogasya vyañjakasya tīvra manda tayā śabda grahaṇasya tīvra manda tā bhavati na tu śabdaḥ bhidyate yathā prakāśasya tīvra manda tayā rūpa grahaṇasya iti

original: tacca naivam-- abhibhavopapatteḥu tīvro bherīśabdo mandaṃ tantrīśabdam abhibhavati na mandaḥ,
analyzed: tat ca na evam tīvraḥ bherī śabdaḥ mandam tantrī śabdam abhibhavati na mandaḥ

original: na ca śabdagrahaṇamabhibhāvakaṃ śabdaśca na bhidyate (iti)
analyzed: na ca śabda grahaṇam abhibhāvakam śabdaḥ ca na bhidyate iti

original: , śabde tu bhidyamāne yukto 'bhibhavaḥ tasmādutpadyate śabdo nābhivyajyate iti/

original: 'vyañjakena samānadeśo 'bhivyajyate śabdaḥ' ityetasmin pakṣe nopapadyate 'bhibhavaḥ-- na hi bherīśabdena tantrīsvanaḥ prāpta iti/
analyzed: vyañjakena samāna deśaḥ bhivyajyate śabdaḥ iti etasmin pakṣe na upapadyate bhibhavaḥ na hi bherī śabdena tantrī svanaḥ prāptaḥ iti
aprāpte bhibhavaḥ iti ced
artha manyeta asatyām prāptau abhibhavaḥ bhavati iti

original: evaṃ sati yathā bherīśabdaḥ kañcit tantrīsvanamabhibhavati evamantikasthopādānāniva
analyzed: evam sati yathā bherī śabdaḥ kañcid tantrī svanam abhibhavati evam antika stha upādānān iva
davīyaḥ stha upādānān api tantrī svanān abhibhavet aprāpteḥ aviśeṣāt tatra kvacid eva

original: bheryā praṇāditāyāṃ sarvalokeṣu samānakālāstantrīsvanā na śrūyeran iti /
analyzed: bheryā praṇāditāyām sarva lokeṣu samāna kālāḥ tantrī svanāḥ na śrūyeran iti

original: nānābhūteṣu śabdasantāneṣu satsu śrotrapratyāsattibhāvena kasyacicchabdasyautīvreṇa mandasyābhibhavo yukta iti/

kaḥ punar ayam abhibhavaḥ nāma
grāhya samāna jātīya grahaṇa kṛtam agrahaṇam abhibhavaḥ yathā ulkā prakāśasya grahaṇa arhasya āditya prakāśena iti
na ghaṭa abhāva sāmānya nitya tvāt nityeṣu api anitya vat upacārāt ca

katham ādimān
kāraṇa vibhāgebhyaḥ hi ghaṭaḥ na bhavati
katham asya nitya tvam

original: yo 'sau kāraṇavibhāgebhyo na bhavati na tasyābhāvo bhāvena kadācid nirvartyate iti/
analyzed: yaḥ asau kāraṇa vibhāgebhyaḥ na bhavati na tasya abhāvaḥ bhāvena kadācid nirvartyate iti
yat api aindriyaka tvāt iti

original: tadapi vyabhicarati = aindriyakaṃ ca sāmānyaṃ nityaṃ ceti/
analyzed: tat api vyabhicarati aindriyakam ca sāmānyam nityam ca iti

original: yadapi kṛtakavadupacārāditi. etadapi vyabhicarati nityeṣvanityavadupacāro dṛṣṭo yathā
analyzed: yat api kṛtaka vat upacārāt iti etat api vyabhicarati nityeṣu anitya vat upacāraḥ dṛṣṭaḥ yathā

original: hi bhavati-- 'vṛkṣasya pradeśaḥ kambalasya pradeśaḥ' evam-- 'ākāśasya pradeśa ātmanaḥ
analyzed: hi bhavati vṛkṣasya pradeśaḥ kambalasya pradeśaḥ evam ākāśasya pradeśa ātmanaḥ
pradeśaḥ iti bhavati iti
tattva bhāktayoḥ nānā tva vibhāgāt avyabhicāraḥ
nityam iti atra kim tāvat tattvam
artha antarasya anutpatti dharmakasya ātma hāna anupapattiḥ nitya tvam tat ca abhāve nā upapadyate

original: bhāktaṃ tu bhavati-- yattatrātmānamahāsītuyad bhūtvā na bhavati na jātu tat punarbhavati. tatra nitya iva nityo ghaṭābhāva ityayaṃ padārtha
analyzed: bhāktam tu bhavati yat tatra ātmānam ahāsītu yat bhūtvā na bhavati na jātu tat punar bhavati tatra nityaḥ iva nityaḥ ghaṭa abhāvaḥ iti ayam padārtha

original: tatra yathājātīyakaḥ śabdo na tathājātīyakaṃ kāryaṃ kiñcid nityaṃ dṛśyate ity avyabhicāraḥ // 15 //
analyzed: tatra yathājātīyakaḥ śabdaḥ na tathājātīyakam kāryam kiñcid nityam dṛśyate iti avyabhicāraḥ  /

santāna anumāna viśeṣaṇāt
nityeṣu avyabhicāraḥ iti prakṛtam

kim tarhi indriya pratyāsatti grāhya tvāt saṃtāna anumānam tena anitya tvam iti
yat api nityeṣu api anitya vat upacārāt iti na
kāraṇa dravyasya pradeśa śabdena abhidhānāt nityeṣu api avyabhicāraḥ iti

original: 'evamākāśapradeśaḥ ātmapradeśaḥ' iti. nātrākāśātmanoḥ kāraṇadravyamabhidhīyate yathā kṛtakasya/
analyzed: evam ākāśa pradeśaḥ ātma pradeśaḥ iti na atra ākāśa ātmanoḥ kāraṇa dravyam abhidhīyate yathā kṛtakasya
katham hi a vidyamānam abhidhīyate
a vidyamāna tā ca pramāṇataḥ na upalabdheḥ
kim tarhi tatra abhidhīyate

original: , saṃyogasyāvyāpyavṛttitvamuparicchinnena dravyeṇākāśasvaya saṃyogo nākāśaṃ vyāpnoti = avyāpya vartate iti. tadasya kṛtakena dravyeṇa sāmānyam,
analyzed: saṃyogasya avyāpya vṛtti tvam uparicchinnena dravyeṇa ākāśa svayam saṃyogaḥ na ākāśam vyāpnoti a vyāpya vartate iti tat asya kṛtakena dravyeṇa sāmānyam

anena ātma pradeśaḥ vyākhyātaḥ

original: parīkṣitā ca tīvramandatā śabdatattvaṃ na bhaktikṛteti/
analyzed: parīkṣitā ca tīvra manda tā śabda tattvam na bhakti kṛtā iti

original: kasmāt punaḥ sūtrakārasyāsminnarthe sūtraṃ na śrūyate iti ?

original: , śīlamidaṃ bhagavataḥ sūtrakārasya bahuṣvadhikaraṇeṣu dvau pakṣau na vyavasthāpayati,

original: athāpi khalu 'idamasti idaṃ nāstīti kuta etat pratipattavyamiti ?

original: asaṃnikṛṣṭaścendriyavyavadhānād ityevamādi anupalabdhikāraṇaṃ na gṛhyate iti. so

uccāraṇam asya vyañjakam tad abhāvāt prāk uccāraṇāt anupalabdhiḥ iti

original: , vivakṣājanitena prayatnena koṣṭhyasya vāyoḥ preritasya kaṇṭhatālvādipratighātād varṇābhivyaktiriti/

original: saṃyogaviśeṣo vai pratighātaḥ pratiṣiddhaṃ ca saṃyogasya vyañjakatvaṃ tasmānna vyañjakābhāvādagrahaṇam
analyzed: saṃyoga viśeṣaḥ vai pratighātaḥ pratiṣiddham ca saṃyogasya vyañjaka tvam tasmāt na vyañjaka abhāvāt agrahaṇam

original: api tvabhāvādeveti. soyamuccāryamāṇaḥ śrūyate śrūyamāṇaścābhūtvā bhavati ityanumīyate.
analyzed: api tu abhāvāt eva iti saḥ uyam uccāryamāṇaḥ śrūyate śrūyamāṇaḥ ca a bhūtvā bhavati iti anumīyate

original: ūrdhvañcoccāraṇānna śrūyate sa bhūtvā na bhavati = abhāvānna śrūyate iti /
analyzed: ūrdhvam ca uccāraṇāt na śrūyate sa bhūtvā na bhavati abhāvāt na śrūyate iti

original: samānam = ayaṃ khalvāvaraṇamanupalabhamānaḥ pratyātmameva saṃvedayate-- 'nāvaraṇamupalabhe' iti,

abhyanujñā vādā iva tu ucyate jātivādinā

tatra yat uktam na āvaraṇa anupapattiḥ anupalambhāt iti ayuktam iti

original: tatra pratighātidravyasaṃyogaḥ śabdasya nimittāntaraṃ saṃskārabhūtaṃ niruṇaddhītyanumīyate. tasya ca nirodhāt śabdasaṃtāno notpadyate anutpanne  #

original: NyS_4,2.14: svaviṣayānatikrameṇendriyasya paṭumandabhāvād viṣayagrahaṇasya tathābhāvo nāviṣaye pravṛttiḥ //
analyzed: sva viṣaya anatikrameṇa indriyasya paṭu manda bhāvāt viṣaya grahaṇasya tathābhāvaḥ na aviṣaye pravṛttiḥ
yathāviṣayam indriyāṇām paṭu manda bhāvāt viṣaya grahaṇānām paṭu manda bhāvaḥ bhavati

original: cakṣuḥ khalu prakṛṣyamāṇaṃ nāviṣayaṃ gandhaṃ gṛhṇāti. nikṛṣyamāṇaṃ ca na svaviṣayāt pracyavate,
analyzed: cakṣuḥ khalu prakṛṣyamāṇam na aviṣayam gandham gṛhṇāti nikṛṣyamāṇam ca na sva viṣayāt pracyavate

original: soyaṃ taimirikaḥ kaściccakṣurviṣayaṃ keśaṃ na gṛhṇāti gṛhṇāti ca keśasamūham. ubhayaṃ hy ataimirikeṇa cakṣuṣā gṛhyate,
analyzed: saḥ ayam taimirikaḥ kaścid cakṣuḥ viṣayam keśam na gṛhṇāti gṛhṇāti ca keśa samūham ubhayam hi a taimirikeṇa cakṣuṣā gṛhyate
paramāṇavaḥ tu atīndriyāḥ

original: indriyāviṣayabhūtā kenacidindriyeṇa gṛhyante samuditāstu gṛhyante ityaviṣaye pravṛttirindriyasya

original: prasajyeta-- na jātvarthāntaramaṇubhyo gṛhyate iti. te khalvime paramāṇavaḥ saṃhatā
analyzed: prasajyeta na jātu artha antaram aṇubhyaḥ gṛhyate iti te khalu ime paramāṇavaḥ saṃhatā

analyzed: gṛhyamāṇāḥ atīndriya tvam jahati viyuktāḥ ca agṛhyamāṇāḥ indriya viṣaya tvam na labhante

original: iti soyaṃ dravyāntarānutpattāvatimahān vyāghāta ityupapadyate dravyāntaraṃ yad grahaṇasya viṣaya iti /

original: saṃcayaḥ khalvanekasya saṃyogaḥ sa ca gahyamāṇāśrayo gṛhyate nātīndriyāśrayaḥ. bhavati hīdamanena saṃyuktam' iti. tasmādayuktametaditi/

original: sarvapralayāya vā kalpeta niravayavādvā nivarteta. ubhayathā copalabdhiviṣayasyābhāvaḥ

vaidharmyāt pratiṣedhaḥ vaktum iti
sādhya atideśāt ca dṛṣṭānta upapatteḥ

original: yatra laukikaparīkṣakāṇāṃ buddhisāmyaṃ tenāviparīto 'rtho 'tidiśyate prajñāpanārtham. evaṃ sādhyātideśād dṛṣṭānte upapadyamāne sādhyatvamanupapannamiti
analyzed: yatra laukika parīkṣakāṇām buddhi sāmyam tena aviparītaḥ rthaḥ atidiśyate prajñāpana artham evam sādhya atideśāt dṛṣṭānte upapadyamāne sādhya tvam anupapannam iti

original: NyS_5,1.7: prāpya sādhyamaprāpya vā hetoḥ prāptyāviśiṣṭatvād aprāptyāsādhakatvācca prāptyaprāptisamau //
analyzed: prāpya sādhyam a prāpya vā hetoḥ prāptyā aviśiṣṭa tvāt aprāptyā asādhaka tvāt ca prāpti aprāpti samau

original: hetuḥ prāpya vā sādhyaṃ sādhayedaprāpya vā ?
analyzed: hetuḥ prāpya vā sādhyam sādhayet a prāpya vā

original: , na tāvat prāpya-- prāptyāmaviśiṣṭatvād asādhakaḥu dvayorvidyamānayoḥ prāptau satyāṃ kiṃ kasya sādhakaṃ sādhyaṃ vā ?/
analyzed: na tāvat prāpya prāptyām aviśiṣṭa tvāt dvayoḥ vidyamānayoḥ prāptau satyām kim kasya sādhakam sādhyam vā

original: aprāpya sādhakaṃ na bhavati-- nāprāptaḥ pradīpaḥ prakāśayatīti/
analyzed: a prāpya sādhakam na bhavati na a prāptaḥ pradīpaḥ prakāśayati iti
prāptyā pratyavasthānam prāptisamaḥ
aprāptyā pratyavasthānam aprāptisamaḥ
ghaṭa ādi niṣpatti darśanāt pīḍane ca abhicārāt apratiṣedhaḥ

original: ubhayathā khalvayuktaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ-- kartṛkaraṇādhikaraṇāni prāpya mṛdaṃ ghaṭādikāryaṃ viṣpādayanti,
analyzed: ubhayathā khalu ayuktaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ kartṛ karaṇa adhikaraṇāni prāpya mṛdam ghaṭa ādi kāryam viṣpādayanti

original: abhicārācca pīḍane sati dṛṣṭam aprāpya sādhakatvamiti // 8 //
analyzed: abhicārāt ca pīḍane sati dṛṣṭam a prāpya sādhaka tvam iti

original: NyS_5,1.9: dṛṣṭāntasya kāraṇānapadeśāt pratyavasthānācca pratidṛṣṭāntena prasaṅgapratidṛṣṭāntasamau //
analyzed: dṛṣṭāntasya kāraṇa anapadeśāt pratyavasthānāt ca pratidṛṣṭāntena prasaṅga pratidṛṣṭānta samau

original: sādhanasyāpi sādhanaṃ vaktavyamiti prasaṅgena pratyavasthānaṃ prasaṅgasamaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ-- kriyāhetuguṇayogī kriyāvān loṣṭa itiheturnāpadiśyate  #
analyzed: sādhanasya api sādhanam vaktavyam iti prasaṅgena pratyavasthānam prasaṅgasamaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ kriyā hetu guṇa yogī kriyāvān loṣṭaḥ iti hetuḥ na apadiśyate  /
na ca hetum antareṇa siddhiḥ asti iti

original: pratidṛṣṭāntena pratyavasthānaṃ pratidṛṣṭāntasamaḥ-- 'kriyāvānātmā kriyāhetuguṇayogāt loṣṭavat' ityukte pratidṛṣṭānta upādīyate-- 'kriyāhetuguṇayuktamākāśaṃ  #
analyzed: pratidṛṣṭāntena pratyavasthānam pratidṛṣṭāntasamaḥ kriyāvān ātmā kriyā hetu guṇa yogāt loṣṭa vat iti ukte pratidṛṣṭāntaḥ upādīyate kriyā hetu guṇa yuktam ākāśam
niṣkriyam dṛṣṭam iti
kaḥ punar ākāśasya kriyā hetuḥ guṇaḥ
vāyunā saṃyogaḥ saṃskāra apekṣaḥ vāyu vanaspati saṃyoga vat iti
amayoḥ uttaram

original: idaṃ tāvadayaṃ pṛṣṭo vaktumarhati-- atha ke pradīpamupādadate kimarthaṃ ceti ?
analyzed: idam tāvat ayam pṛṣṭaḥ vaktum arhati atha ke pradīpam upādadate kimartham ca iti
didṛkṣamāṇāḥ dṛśya darśana artham iti
atha pradīpam didṛkṣamāṇāḥ pradīpa antaram kasmāt na upādadate

original: , antareṇāpi pradīpāntaraṃ dṛśyate pradīpastatra pradīpadarśanārthaṃ pradīpopādānaṃ nirarthakam/
analyzed: antareṇa api pradīpa antaram dṛśyate pradīpaḥ tatra pradīpa darśana artham pradīpa upādānam nirarthakam
atha dṛṣṭāntaḥ kimartham ucyate iti
a prajñātasya jñāpana artham iti
atha dṛṣṭānte kāraṇa ādeśaḥ kimartham mṛgyate
yadi prajñāpana artham

original: , prajñāto dṛṣṭāntaḥ sa khalu--“laukikaparīkṣakāṇāṃ yasminnarthe buddhisāmyaṃ sa dṛṣṭāntaḥ 1-1-25“iti tatprajñāpanārthaḥkāraṇāpadeśo nirarthaka  #
analyzed: prajñātaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ sa khalu laukika parīkṣakāṇām yasmin arthe buddhi sāmyam sa dṛṣṭāntaḥ tad prajñāpana arthaḥ kāraṇa apadeśaḥ nirarthaka
iti prasaṅga samasya uttaram  /
atha pratidṛṣṭānta samasya uttaram
pratidṛṣṭānta hetu tve ca na ahetuḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ

original: pratidṛṣṭāntaṃ bruvatā na viśeṣaheturapadiśyate-- anena prakāreṇa pratidṛṣṭāntaḥ sādhako na dṛṣṭānta iti,
analyzed: pratidṛṣṭāntam bruvatā na viśeṣa hetuḥ apadiśyate anena prakāreṇa pratidṛṣṭāntaḥ sādhakaḥ na dṛṣṭāntaḥ iti

original: evaṃ pratidṛṣṭāntahetutve nāheturdṛṣṭānta ityupapadyate. sa ca kathaṃ heturnasyād yadyapratiṣiddhaḥ sādhakaḥ syāditi // 11 //
analyzed: evam pratidṛṣṭānta hetu tve na ahetuḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ iti upapadyate sa ca katham hetuḥ na syāt yadi apratiṣiddhaḥ sādhakaḥ syāt iti
prāk utpatteḥ kāraṇa abhāvāt anutpattisamaḥ

original: anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvād ghaṭavadityukte apara āha-- prāgutpatteranutpanne
analyzed: anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatna ānantarīyaka tvāt ghaṭa vat iti ukte aparaḥ āha prāk utpatteḥ anutpanne

original: śabde prayatnānantarīyakatvamanityatvakāraṇaṃ nāsti tadabhāvād nityatvaṃ prāptaṃ
analyzed: śabde prayatna ānantarīyaka tvam anitya tva kāraṇam na asti tad abhāvāt nitya tvam prāptam
nityasya ca utpattiḥ na asti
anutpattyā pratyavasthānam anutpattisamaḥ
asya uttaram
tathā bhāvāt utpannasya kāraṇa upapatteḥ na kāraṇa pratiṣedhaḥ

original: tathābhāvādutpannasyeti-- utpannaḥ khalvayaṃ śabda iti bhavati. prāgutpatteḥ śabda
analyzed: tathābhāvāt utpannasya iti utpannaḥ khalu ayam śabdaḥ iti bhavati prāk utpatteḥ śabda

original: eva nāsti-- utpannasya śabdabhāvāt. śabdasya sataḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvam anityatvakāraṇamupapadyate.
analyzed: eva na asti utpannasya śabda bhāvāt śabdasya sataḥ prayatna ānantarīyaka tvam anitya tva kāraṇam upapadyate
kāraṇa upapatteḥ ayuktaḥ iyam doṣaḥ
prāk utpatteḥ kāraṇa abhāvāt iti
sāmānya dṛṣṭāntayoḥ aindriyaka tve samāne nitya anitya sādharmyāt saṃśayasamaḥ

original: anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvād ghaṭavadityukte hetau. saṃśayena pratyavatiṣṭhate--
analyzed: anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatna ānantarīyaka tvāt ghaṭa vat iti ukte hetau saṃśayena pratyavatiṣṭhate

original: sati prayatnānāntarīyakatve astyevāsya nityena sāmānyena sādharmyam- aindriyakatvam.
analyzed: sati prayatna ānāntarīyaka tve asti eva asya nityena sāmānyena sādharmyam aindriyaka tvam

original: asti ca ghaṭenānityena. ato nityānityasādharmyādanivṛttaḥ saṃśaya iti // 14 //
analyzed: asti ca ghaṭena anityena atas nitya anitya sādharmyāt anivṛttaḥ saṃśayaḥ iti
asya uttaram

original: NyS_5,1.15: sādharmyātsaṃśaye na saṃśayo vaidharmyād ubhayathā vā saṃśaye 'tyantasaṃśayaprasaṅgo nityatvānabhyupagamācca sāmānyasyāpratiṣedhaḥ
analyzed: sādharmyāt saṃśaye na saṃśayaḥ vaidharmyāt ubhayathā vā saṃśaye tyanta saṃśaya prasaṅgaḥ nitya tva anabhyupagamāt ca sāmānyasya apratiṣedhaḥ

original: viśeṣād vaidharmyādavadhāryamāṇe 'rthe 'puruṣaḥ' iti na sthāṇupuruṣasādharmyāt saṃśayo 'vakāśaṃ labhate,
analyzed: viśeṣāt vaidharmyāt avadhāryamāṇe rthe puruṣaḥ iti na sthāṇu puruṣa sādharmyāt saṃśayaḥ vakāśam labhate

original: evaṃ vaidharmyād viśeṣāt prayatnānantarīyakatvādavadhāryamāṇe śabdasyānityatve nityānityasādharmyāt saṃśayo 'vakāśaṃ na labhate. yadi vai labheta
analyzed: evam vaidharmyāt viśeṣāt prayatna ānantarīyaka tvāt avadhāryamāṇe śabdasya anitya tve nitya anitya sādharmyāt saṃśayaḥ vakāśam na labhate yadi vai labheta
tatas sthāṇu puruṣa sādharmya anucchedāt atyantam saṃśayaḥ syāt

original: gṛhyamāṇe ca viśeṣe nityasādharmyaṃ saṃśayaheturiti nābhyupagamyate-- nahi gṛhyamāṇe puruṣasya viśeṣe sthāṇupuruṣasādharmyaṃ saṃśayaheturbhavati
analyzed: gṛhyamāṇe ca viśeṣe nitya sādharmyam saṃśaya hetuḥ iti na abhyupagamyate nahi gṛhyamāṇe puruṣasya viśeṣe sthāṇu puruṣa sādharmyam saṃśaya hetuḥ bhavati
ubhaya sādharmyāt prakriyā siddheḥ prakaraṇasamaḥ

original: ubhayenaunityena cānityena sādharmyāt pakṣapratipakṣayoḥ pravṛttiḥ prakriyā,
analyzed: ubhayena aunityena ca anityena sādharmyāt pakṣa pratipakṣayoḥ pravṛttiḥ prakriyā

original: 'anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvād ghaṭavat' ityekaḥ pakṣaṃ pravartayati. dvitīyaśca
analyzed: anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatna ānantarīyaka tvāt ghaṭa vat iti ekaḥ pakṣam pravartayati dvitīyaḥ ca
nitya sādharmyāt evam ca sati prayatna ānantarīyaka tvāt iti hetuḥ anitya sādharmyeṇa ucyamānaḥ
na prakaraṇam ativartate prakaraṇa an ativṛtteḥ nirṇaya an anivartanam
samānam ca etat nitya sādharmyeṇa ucyamāne hetau
tat idam prakaraṇa anativṛttyā pratyavasthānam prakaraṇasamaḥ

original: samānaṃ caitadvaidharmye 'pi = ubhayavaidharmyāt prakriyāsiddheḥ prakaraṇasama iti // 16 //
analyzed: samānam ca etat vaidharmye pi ubhaya vaidharmyāt prakriyā siddheḥ prakaraṇasamaḥ iti
asya uttaram
pratipakṣāt prakaraṇa siddheḥ pratiṣedha anupapatiḥ pratipakṣa upapatteḥ

original: ubhayasādharmyāt prakriyāsiddhiṃ bruvatā pratipakṣāt prakriyāsiddhiruktā bhavati,
analyzed: ubhaya sādharmyāt prakriyā siddhim bruvatā pratipakṣāt prakriyā siddhiḥ uktā bhavati

original: yadyubhyasādharmyaṃ tatraikataraḥ pratipakṣa ityevaṃ satyupapannaḥ pratipakṣo bhavati.
analyzed: yadi ubhya sādharmyam tatra ekataraḥ pratipakṣaḥ iti evam sati upapannaḥ pratipakṣaḥ bhavati

original: pratipakṣopapatteranupapannaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ-- yataḥ pratipakṣopapattiḥ pratiṣedhopapattiśceti vipratiṣiddhamiti /
analyzed: pratipakṣa upapatteḥ anupapannaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ yatas pratipakṣa upapattiḥ pratiṣedha upapattiḥ ca iti vipratiṣiddham iti

original: tattvānavadhāraṇācca prakriyāsiddhiḥ-- viparyaye prakaraṇāvasānātu tattvāvadhāraṇe hyavasitaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhavatīti // 17 //
analyzed: tattva anavadhāraṇāt ca prakriyā siddhiḥ viparyaye tattva avadhāraṇe hi avasitam prakaraṇam bhavati iti
traikālya asiddheḥ hetoḥ ahetusamaḥ

original: hetuḥusādhanaṃ tat sādhyāt pūrvaṃ paścāt saha vā bhavet. yadi pūrvaṃ sādhanam ?
analyzed: tat sādhyāt pūrvam paścāt saha vā bhavet yadi pūrvam sādhanam
asati sādhye kasya sādhanam
atha paścāt
asati sādhane kasya idam sādhyam
atha yugapad sādhya sādhate

original: dvayorvidyamānayoḥ kiṃ kasya sādhanaṃ kiṃ kasya sādhyam. iti heturahetunā na viśiṣyate/
analyzed: dvayoḥ vidyamānayoḥ kim kasya sādhanam kim kasya sādhyam iti hetuḥ ahetunā na viśiṣyate
ahetunā sādharmyāt pratyavasthānam ahetusamaḥ
asya uttaram
na hetutaḥ sādhya siddheḥ traikālya asiddhiḥ
na traikālya asiddhiḥ kasmāt
hetutaḥ sādhya siddheḥ

original: nirvatainīyasya nirvṛttiḥ vijñeyasya vijñānam ubhayaṃ kāraṇato dṛśyate. soyaṃ mahān pratyakṣaviṣaya udāharaṇamiti/
analyzed: nirvatainīyasya nirvṛttiḥ vijñeyasya vijñānam ubhayam kāraṇataḥ dṛśyate saḥ uyam mahān pratyakṣa viṣayaḥ udāharaṇam iti

original: yattu khalūktam-- asati sādhye kasya sādhanamiti ?
analyzed: yat tu khalu uktam asati sādhye kasya sādhanam iti
yat tu nirvartyate yat ca vijñāpyate tasya iti
pratiṣedha anupapatteḥ ca pratiṣeddhavya apratiṣedhaḥ

original: 'pūrvaṃ paścād yugapadvā' pratiṣedha iti nopapadyate. pratiṣedhānupapatteḥ sthāpanāhetuḥ siddha iti // 20 //
analyzed: pūrvam paścāt yugapad vā pratiṣedhaḥ iti nā upapadyate pratiṣedha anupapatteḥ sthāpanā hetuḥ siddhaḥ iti
arthāpattitaḥ pratipakṣa siddheḥ arthāpattisamaḥ

original: 'anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvād ghaṭavat' iti sthāpite pakṣe arthāpattyā pratipakṣaṃ sādhayato 'rthāpattisamaḥ,
analyzed: anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatna ānantarīyaka tvāt ghaṭa vat iti sthāpite pakṣe arthāpattyā pratipakṣam sādhayataḥ rthāpattisamaḥ
yadi prayatna ānantarīyaka tvāt anitya sādharmyāt anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti tadā
arthāt āpadyate nitya sādharmyāt nityaḥ iti
asti tu asya nityena sādharmyam asparśa tvam iti
asya uttaram
anuktasya arthāpatteḥ pakṣa hāneḥ upapattiḥ anukta tvāt anaikāntika tvāt ca arthāpatteḥ

original: anupapādya sāmarthyam anuktamarthādāpadyate itibruvataḥ pakṣahānerupapattiḥ-- anuktatvāt = anityapakṣasiddhau arthādāpannam-- nityapakṣasya
analyzed: an upapādya sāmarthyam anuktam arthāt āpadyate iti bruvataḥ pakṣa hāneḥ upapattiḥ anukta tvāt anitya pakṣa siddhau arthāt āpannam nitya pakṣasya

original: anekāntikatvāccārthāpatteḥ = ubhayapakṣasamā ceyamarthāpattiḥ-- yadi nityasādharmyādasparśatvādākāśavacca nityaḥ śabdaḥ ? ( tadā )
analyzed: anekāntika tvāt ca arthāpatteḥ ubhaya pakṣa samā ca iyam arthāpattiḥ yadi nitya sādharmyāt asparśa tvāt ākāśa vat ca nityaḥ śabdaḥ
arthāt āpannam anitya sādharmyāt prayatna ānantarīyaka tvāt anityaḥ iti

original: na ceyaṃ viparyayamātrādekāntenārthāpattiḥ. na khalu vai dhanasya grāvṇaḥ patanamiti arthādāpadyate-- dravāṇāmapāṃ patanābhāva iti // 22 //
analyzed: na ca iyam viparyaya mātrāt ekāntena artha āpattiḥ na khalu vai dhanasya grāvṇaḥ patanam iti arthāt āpadyate dravāṇām apām patana abhāvaḥ iti  /
eka dharma upapatteḥ aviśeṣe sarva aviśeṣa prasaṅgāt sadbhāva upapatteḥ aviśeṣasamaḥ

original: eko dharmaḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvaṃ śabdaghaṭayorupapadyate ityaviśeṣe ubhayoranitayatve sarvasyāviśeṣaḥ prasajyate/
analyzed: ekaḥ dharmaḥ prayatna ānantarīyaka tvam śabda ghaṭayoḥ upapadyate iti aviśeṣe ubhayoḥ anitaya tve sarvasya aviśeṣaḥ prasajyate

original: katham ? sadbhāvopapatteḥ = eko dharmaḥ sadbhāvaḥ sarvasyopapadyate/
analyzed: katham sadbhāva upapatteḥ ekaḥ dharmaḥ sadbhāvaḥ sarvasya upapadyate
sadbhāva upapatteḥ sarva aviśeṣa prasaṅgāt pratyavasthānam aviśeṣasamaḥ
asya uttaram
kvacid dharma anupapatteḥ kvacid ca upapatteḥ pratiṣedha abhāvaḥ

original: yathā sādhyadṛṣṭāntayorekadharmasya prayatnānantarīyakatvasyopapatteranityatvaṃ dharmāntaram aviśeṣo naivaṃ sarvabhāvānāṃ sadbhāvopapattinimittaṃ  #
analyzed: yathā sādhya dṛṣṭāntayoḥ eka dharmasya prayatna ānantarīyaka tvasya upapatteḥ anitya tvam dharma antaram aviśeṣaḥ na evam sarva bhāvānām sadbhāva upapatti nimittam
dharma antaram asti yena aviśeṣaḥ syāt

original: atha matam-- anityatvameva dharmāntaraṃ sadbhāvopapattinimittaṃ bhāvānāṃ sarvatra syāditi ?
analyzed: atha matam anitya tvam eva dharma antaram sadbhāva upapatti nimittam bhāvānām sarvatra syāt iti

original: , evaṃ khalu vai kalpyamāne-- 'anityāḥ sarve bhāvāḥ sadbhāvopapatteḥ' itipakṣaḥ prāpnoti,
analyzed: evam khalu vai kalpyamāne anityāḥ sarve bhāvāḥ sadbhāva upapatteḥ itipakṣaḥ prāpnoti
tatra pratijñā artha vyatiriktam anyat udāharaṇam na asti anudāharaṇaḥ ca hetuḥ na asti iti

original: pratijñaikadeśasya codāharaṇatvamanupapannam-- na hi sādhyamudāharaṇaṃ bhavati,
analyzed: pratijñā eka deśasya ca udāharaṇa tvam anupapannam na hi sādhyam udāharaṇam bhavati
sataḥ ca nitya anitya bhāvāt anitya tva anupapattiḥ tasmāt sadbhāva upapatteḥ sarva aviśeṣa prasaṅgaḥ iti nirabhidheyam etat vākyam iti

original: 'sarvabhāvānāṃ sadbhāvopapatteranityatvam' iti bruvatānujñātaṃ śabdasyānityatvaṃ tatrānupapannaḥ pratiṣedha iti // 24 //
analyzed: sarva bhāvānām sadbhāva upapatteḥ anitya tvam iti bruvatā anujñātam śabdasya anitya tvam tatra anupapannaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ iti
ubhaya kāraṇa upapatteḥ upapattisamaḥ

original: yady anityatvakāraṇamupapadyate śabdasya ity anityaḥ śabdaḥ ?
analyzed: yadi anitya tva kāraṇam upapadyate śabdasya iti anityaḥ śabdaḥ
nitya tva kāraṇam api upapadyate sya asparśa tvam iti nitya tvam api upapadyate

original: ubhayasya = anityatvasya nityatvasya ca kāraṇopapattyā pratyavasthānamupapattisamaḥ // 25 //
analyzed: ubhayasya anitya tvasya nitya tvasya ca kāraṇa upapattyā pratyavasthānam upapattisamaḥ
asya uttaram
upapatti kāraṇa abhyanujñānāt apratiṣedhaḥ
ubhaya kāraṇa upapatteḥ iti bruvatā na anitya tva kāraṇa upapatteḥ anitya tvam pratiṣidhyate
yadi pratiṣidhyate
na ubhaya kāraṇa upapattiḥ syāt
ubhaya kāraṇa upapatti vacanāt anitya tva kāraṇa upapattiḥ abhyanujñāyate abhyanujñānāt anupapannaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ
vyāghātāt pratiṣedhaḥ iti ced
samānaḥ vyāghātaḥ

original: ekasya nityatvānityatvaprasaṅgaṃ vyāhataṃ bruvatā uktaḥ pratiṣedha iticet ?
analyzed: ekasya nitya tva anitya tva prasaṅgam vyāhatam bruvatā uktaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ iti ced

original: spapakṣaparapakṣayoḥ samāno vyāghātaḥ sa ca naikatarasya sādhaka iti // 26 //
analyzed: spapakṣa parapakṣayoḥ samānaḥ vyāghātaḥ sa ca na ekatarasya sādhakaḥ iti
nirdiṣṭa kāraṇa abhāve pi upalambhāt upalabdhisamaḥ
nirdiṣṭasya prayatna ānantarīyaka tvasya anitya tva kāraṇasya abhāve pi vāyu nodanāt vṛkṣa śākhā bhaṅga jasya śabdasya anitya tvam upalabhyate
nirdiṣṭasya sādhanasya abhāve pi sādhya dharma upalabdhyā pratyavasthānam upalabdhisamaḥ
asya uttaram
kāraṇa antarāt api tad dharma upapatteḥ apratiṣedhaḥ

original: prayatnānantarīyakatvāditi bruvatā kāraṇata utpattirabhidhīyate. na ( tu )
analyzed: prayatna ānantarīyaka tvāt iti bruvatā kāraṇataḥ utpattiḥ abhidhīyate na tu
kāryasya kāraṇa niyamaḥ

original: yida ca kāraṇāntarādapyupapadyamānasya śabdasya tad anityatvamupapadyate ?
analyzed: ca kāraṇa antarāt api upapadyamānasya śabdasya tat anitya tvam upapadyate
kim atra pratiṣidhyate iti
na prāk uccāraṇāt vidyamānasya śabdasya anupalabdhiḥ kasmāt

āvaraṇa ādi anupalabdheḥ u yathā vidyamānasya udaka ādeḥ arthasya āvāraṇa ādeḥ anupalabdhiḥ na evam śabdasya agrahaṇa kāraṇena āvaraṇa ādinā anupalabdhiḥ u gṛhyeta ca etat asya agrahaṇa kāraṇam udaka ādi vat
na ca
gṛhyate tasmāt udaka ādi viparītaḥ śabdaḥ n upalabhyamānaḥ iti
tad anupalabdheḥ anupalambhāt abhāva siddhau tad viparīta upapatteḥ anupalabdhisamaḥ
teṣām āvaraṇa ādīnām anupalabdhiḥ nā upalabhyate anupalambhāt na asti iti syāḥ sidhyati
abhāva siddhau hetu abhāvāt tad viparītam astitvam āvaraṇa ādīnām avadhāryate tad viparīta upapatteḥ yat
pratijñātam na prāk uccāraṇāt vidyamānasya śabdasya anupalabdhiḥ iti etat na sidhyati

original: so 'yaṃ hetuḥ-- āvaraṇādyanupalabdheriti āvaraṇādiṣu cāvaraṇādyanupalabdhau ca samatayānupaladhyā
analyzed: saḥ yam hetuḥ āvaraṇa ādi anupalabdheḥ iti āvaraṇa ādiṣu ca āvaraṇa ādi anupalabdhau ca sama tayā anupaladhyā
pratyavasthitaḥ n upalabdhi samaḥ bhavati
asya uttaram
anupalambha ātmaka tvāt anupalabdheḥ ahetuḥ
āvaraṇa ādi anupalabdhiḥ na asti anupalambhāt iti ahetuḥ kasmāt
anupalambha ātmaka tvāt anupalabdheḥ upalambha abhāva mātra tvāt anupalabdheḥ yat asti

original: tadupalabdherviṣayaḥ = upalabdhyā tadastīti pratijñāyate. yannāsti tadanupalabdherviṣayaḥ
analyzed: tad upalabdheḥ viṣayaḥ upalabdhyā tat asti iti pratijñāyate yat na asti tat anupalabdheḥ viṣayaḥ
anupalabhyamānam na asti iti pratijñāyate

original: soyamāvaraṇādyanupalabdheranupalambho 'nupalabdhau svaviṣaye pravartamāno na svaviṣayaṃ pratiṣedhati,
analyzed: saḥ uyam āvaraṇa ādi anupalabdheḥ anupalambhaḥ nupalabdhau sva viṣaye pravartamānaḥ na sva viṣayam pratiṣedhati
apratiṣiddhā ca āvaraṇa ādi anupalabdhiḥ hetu tvāya kalpayate

original: āvaraṇādīni tu vidyamānatvādupalabdherviṣayāḥ teṣāmupalabdhyā bhavitavyaṃ yattāni
analyzed: āvaraṇa ādīni tu vidyamāna tvāt upalabdheḥ viṣayāḥ teṣām upalabdhyā bhavitavyam yat tāni

original: nopalabhyante tad upalabdheḥ svaviṣayapratipādikāyā abhāvād = anuṣalambhādanupalabdherviṣayo
analyzed: na upalabhyante tat upalabdheḥ sva viṣaya pratipādikāyāḥ abhāvāt anuṣalambhāt anupalabdheḥ viṣayaḥ
gamyate na santi āvaraṇa ādīni śabdasya agrahaṇa kāraṇāni iti
anupalambhāt anupalabdhiḥ sidhyati viṣayaḥ sa tasya iti
jñāna vikalpānām ca bhāva abhāva saṃvedanāt adhyātmam
ahetuḥ iti vartate

original: śarīre śarīriṇāṃ jñānavikalpānāṃ bhāvābhāvau saṃvedanīyau-- 'asti me saṃśayajñānam nāsti me saṃśayajñānam' iti. evaṃ pratyakṣānumānāgamasmṛtijñāneṣu.  #
analyzed: śarīre śarīriṇām jñāna vikalpānām bhāva abhāvau saṃvedanīyau asti me saṃśaya jñānam na asti me saṃśaya jñānam iti evam pratyakṣa anumāna āgama smṛti jñāneṣu
sā iyam āvaraṇa ādi anupalabdhiḥ

original: upalabdhyabhāvaḥ svasaṃvedyaḥ-- nāsti me śabdasyāvaraṇādyupalabdhiḥ iti = '
analyzed: upalabdhi abhāvaḥ sva saṃvedyaḥ na asti me śabdasya āvaraṇa ādi upalabdhiḥ iti
na upalabhyante śabdasya a grahaṇa kāraṇāni āvaraṇa ādīni iti
tatra yat uktam tad anupalabdheḥ anupalambhāt abhāva siddhiḥ iti etat na upapadyate  /
sādharmyāt tulya dharma upapatteḥ sarva anitya tva prasaṅgāt anityasamaḥ
anityena ghaṭena sādharmyāt anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti bruvataḥ
asti ghaṭena anityena sarva bhāvānām sādharmyam
iti sarvasya anitya tvam aniṣṭam saṃpadyate
saḥ uyam anitya tvena pratyavasthānāt anityasamaḥ iti
asya uttaram
sādharmyāt asiddheḥ pratiṣedha asiddhiḥ pratiṣedhya sādharmyāt
pratijñā ādi avayava yuktam vākyam pakṣa nivartakam pratipakṣa lakṣaṇam pratiṣedhaḥ
tasya pakṣeṇa pratiṣedhyena sādharmyam pratijñā ādi yogaḥ
tat yadi anitya sādharmyāt anitya tvasya asiddhiḥ
sādharmyāt asiddheḥ
pratiṣedhasya api asiddhiḥ pratiṣedhyena sādharmyāt iti

original: NyS_5,1.34: dṛṣṭānte ca sādhyasādhanabhāvena prajñātasya dharmasya hetutvāttasya cobhayathā bhāvānnāviśeṣaḥ //
analyzed: dṛṣṭānte ca sādhya sādhana bhāvena prajñātasya dharmasya hetu tvāt tasya ca ubhayathā bhāvāt na aviśeṣaḥ

original: dṛṣṭānte yaḥ khalu dharmaḥ sādhyasādhanabhāvena prajñāyate sa hetutvenābhidhīyate.
analyzed: dṛṣṭānte yaḥ khalu dharmaḥ sādhya sādhana bhāvena prajñāyate sa hetu tvena abhidhīyate

original: sa cobhayathā bhavati-- kena citsamānaḥ kutaścidviśiṣṭaḥ. sāmānyāt sādharmya viśeṣācca
analyzed: sa ca ubhayathā bhavati kena cit samānaḥ kutaścid viśiṣṭaḥ sāmānyāt sādharmya viśeṣāt ca

original: vaidharmyam. ekaṃ sādharmyaviśeṣo hetuḥ nāviśeṣeṇa sādharmyamātraṃ vaidharmyamātraṃ
analyzed: vaidharmyam ekam sādharmya viśeṣaḥ hetuḥ na aviśeṣeṇa sādharmya mātram vaidharmya mātram
vā sādharmya mātram vaidharmya mātram ca āśritya bhāvān āha
sādharmyāt tulya dharma upapatteḥ sarva anitya tva prasaṅgāt anityasamaḥ
iti etat ayuktam iti
aviśeṣa sama pratiṣedhe ca yat uktam tat api veditavyam
nityam anitya bhāvāt anitye nitya tva upapatteḥ nityasamaḥ

original: 'anityaḥ śabdaḥ' iti pratijñāyate. tadanityatvaṃ kiṃ śabde nityam ?
analyzed: anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti pratijñāyate tat anitya tvam kim śabde nityam
atha anityam
yadi tāvat sarvadā bhavati

original: dharmasya sadā bhāvād dharmiṇopi sadā bhāva iti 'nityaḥ śabdaḥ' iti,
analyzed: dharmasya sadā bhāvāt dharmiṇaḥ api sadā bhāvaḥ iti nityaḥ śabdaḥ iti
atha na sarvadā bhavati
anitya tvasya abhāvāt nityaḥ śabdaḥ
evam nitya tvena pratyavasthrānāt nityasamaḥ
asya uttaram
pratiṣedhye nityam anitya bhāvāt anitye nitya tva upapatteḥ pratiṣedha abhāvaḥ

original: pratiṣedhye śabde 'nityamanityatvasya bhāvāt' ityucyamāne 'nujñātaṃ śabdasyānityatvam. anityatvopapatteśca 'nānityaḥ śabdaḥ' iti pratiṣedho
analyzed: pratiṣedhye śabde nityam anitya tvasya bhāvāt iti ucyamāne nujñātam śabdasya anitya tvam anitya tva upapatteḥ ca na anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti
atha na abhyupagamyate
nityam anitya tvasya bhāvāt iti hetuḥ na bhavati iti hetu abhāvāt pratiṣedha anupapattiḥ iti

original: utpannasya nirodhād abhāvaḥ śabdasyānityatvaṃ tatra paripraśnānupapattiḥ /
analyzed: utpannasya nirodhāt abhāvaḥ śabdasya anitya tvam tatra paripraśna anupapattiḥ

original: soyaṃ praśnaḥ-- 'tadanityatvaṃ kiṃ śabde sarvadā bhavati ?
analyzed: saḥ uyam praśnaḥ tad anitya tvam kim śabde sarvadā bhavati
atha na
iti anupapannaḥ kasmāt

original: utpannasyayo nirodhād abhāvaḥ śabdasya tad anityatvam. evaṃ ca saty adhikaraṇādheyavibhāgo vyāghātānnāstīti/
analyzed: nirodhāt abhāvaḥ śabdasya tat anitya tvam evam ca sati adhikaraṇa ādheya vibhāgaḥ vyāghātāt na asti iti

original: nityānityatvavirodhācca nityatvamanityatvaṃ caikasya dharmiṇo dharmāviti virudhyete /

na saṃbhavataḥ

original: tatra yaduktam-- 'nityamanityatvasya bhāvād nitya eva' tad avartamānārthamuktamiti // 36 //
analyzed: tatra yat uktam nityam anitya tvasya bhāvāt nityaḥ eva tat avartamāna artham uktam iti
prayatna kārya aneka tvāt kāryasamaḥ
prayatna ānantarīyaka tavāt anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti

original: yasya prayatnānantaramātmalābhaḥ tatkhalu abhūtvā bhavati yathā ghaṭādi kāryam. anityamiti ca 'bhūtvā na bhavatītyetadvijñāyate,
analyzed: yasya prayatna anantaram ātmalābhaḥ tat khalu a bhūtvā bhavati yathā ghaṭa ādi kāryam anityam iti ca bhūtvā na bhavati iti etat vijñāyate
evam avasthite
prayatna kārya aneka tvāt
iti pratiṣedhaḥ ucyate
prayatna anantaram ātma lābhaḥ ca dṛṣṭaḥ ghaṭa ādīnām vyavadhāna apohāt ca abhivyaktiḥ vyavahitānām
tat kim prayatna anantaram ātma alābhaḥ śabdasya
āho abhivyaktiḥ
iti viśeṣaḥ na asti
kārya aviśeṣeṇa pratyavasthānam kāryasamaḥ
asya uttaram
kārya anya tve prayatna ahetu tvam anupalabdhi kāraṇa upapatteḥ
sati kārya anya tve anupalabdhi kāraṇa anupapatteḥ prayatnasya ahetu tvam śabdasya abhivyaktau
yatra prayatna anantaram abhivyaktiḥ tatra anupalabdhi kāraṇam vyavadhānam upapadyate vyavadhāna apohāt ca
prayatna anantara bhāvinoḥ rtha sayā upalabdhi lakṣaṇa abhivyaktiḥ bhavati iti na tu śabdasya anupalabdhi kāraṇam
kim cit upapadyate yasya prayatna anantaram apohāt śabdasya upalabdhi lakṣaṇa abhivyaktiḥ bhavati iti
tasmāt utpadyate śabdaḥ na abhivyajyate iti
hetoḥ ced anaikāntika tvam upapādyate anaikāntika tvāt asādhakaḥ syāt iti
yadi ca anaikāntika tvāt asādhaktvam
pratiṣedhe ḥpi samānaḥ doṣaḥ

original: pratiṣedhopyanaikāntikaḥ-- kiñcit pratiṣedhati kiñcinneti. anaikāntikatvād asādhaka iti/
analyzed: pratiṣedhaḥ upi anaikāntikaḥ kiñcid pratiṣedhati kiñcid na iti anaikāntika tvāt asādhakaḥ iti

original: atha vā śabdasyānityatvapekṣe prayatnānantaramutpādo nābhivyaktiriti viśeṣahetvabhāvaḥ,
analyzed: atha vā śabdasya anitya tva apekṣe prayatna anantaram utpādaḥ na abhivyaktiḥ iti viśeṣa hetu abhāvaḥ
nitya tva pakṣe api prayatna anantaram abhivyaktiḥ na utpādaḥ iti viśeṣa hetu abhāvaḥ
saḥ uyam ubhaya pakṣa samaḥ viśeṣa hetu abhāvaḥ iti ubhayam api anaikāntikam iti

original: sarveṣu sādharmyaprabhatiṣu pratiṣedhahetuṣu yatra yatrāviśeṣo dṛśyate tatrobhayoḥ pakṣayoḥ samaḥ prasajyate iti // 40 //
analyzed: sarveṣu sādharmya prabhatiṣu pratiṣedha hetuṣu yatra yatra aviśeṣaḥ dṛśyate tatra ubhayoḥ pakṣayoḥ samaḥ prasajyate iti
pratiṣedha vipratiṣedhe pratiṣedha doṣavat doṣaḥ

original: iti dūṣaṇavādinaḥ pratiṣedhahetunā dvitīyaḥ pakṣaḥ sa ca pratiṣedha ityucyate,
analyzed: iti dūṣaṇa vādinaḥ pratiṣedha hetunā dvitīyaḥ pakṣaḥ sa ca pratiṣedhaḥ iti ucyate

original: tasyāsya pratiṣedhepi samāno doṣa iti tṛtīyaḥ pakṣaḥ ( sa ca )
analyzed: tasya asya pratiṣedhe api samānaḥ doṣaḥ iti tṛtīyaḥ pakṣaḥ sa ca

original: tasmin pratiṣedhavipratiṣedhepi samāno doṣaḥ anaikāntikatvaṃ caturthaḥ pakṣaḥ // 4 //
analyzed: tasmin pratiṣedha vipratiṣedhe api samānaḥ doṣaḥ anaikāntika tvam caturthaḥ pakṣaḥ  /

original: NyS_5,1.42: pratiṣedhaṃ sadoṣamabhyupetya pratiṣedhavipratiṣedhe samāno doṣaprasaṅgo matānujñā //
analyzed: pratiṣedham sa doṣam abhyupetya pratiṣedha vipratiṣedhe samānaḥ doṣa prasaṅgaḥ matānujñā
pratiṣedham
dvitīyam pakṣam sa doṣam abhyupetya
tad uddhāram an uktvā anujñāya pratiṣedha vipratiṣedhe

original: tṛtīyapakṣe samānam anaikāntikatvamiti samānaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ prasajato dūṣaṇavādino matānujñā prasajyate iti pañcamaḥ pakṣaḥ // 42 //
analyzed: tṛtīya pakṣe samānam anaikāntika tvam iti samānam dūṣaṇam prasajataḥ dūṣaṇa vādinaḥ matānujñā prasajyate iti pañcamaḥ pakṣaḥ  /

original: NyS_5,1.43: svapakṣalakṣaṇāpekṣopapattyupasaṃhāre hetunirdeśe parapakṣadoṣābhyupagamāt samāno doṣaḥ //
analyzed: sva pakṣa lakṣaṇa apekṣā upapatti upasaṃhāre hetu nirdeśe para pakṣa doṣa abhyupagamāt samānaḥ doṣaḥ
sthāpana apekṣe prayatna kārya aneka tvāt
iti doṣaḥ pratiṣedha hetuvādinaḥ sva pakṣa lakṣaṇaḥ bhavati kasmāt
sva pakṣa samuttha tvāt
saḥ uyam sva pakṣa lakṣaṇam doṣam apekṣamāṇaḥ na uddhṛtya
anujñāya pratiṣedhe api samānaḥ doṣaḥ
iti upapadyamānam doṣam parapakṣe upasaṃharati

original: itthaṃ cānaikāntikaḥ pratiṣedha iti hetuṃ nirdiśati,
analyzed: ittham ca anaikāntikaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ iti hetum nirdiśati

original: tatra svapakṣalakṣaṇāpekṣayopapadyamānadoṣopasaṃhāre hetunirdeśe ca sati anena parapakṣo 'bhyupagato bhavati/

katham kṛtvā
yaḥ pareṇa prayatna kārya aneka tvāt
ityādinā anaikāntika tva doṣaḥ uktaḥ tam an uddhṛtya
pratiṣedhe api samānaḥ doṣaḥ

original: ityāha, evaṃ sthāpanāṃ sadoṣāmabhyupetya pratiṣedhepi samānaṃ doṣaṃ prasajataḥ parapakṣābhyupagamāt
analyzed: iti āha evam sthāpanām sa doṣām abhyupetya pratiṣedhe api samānam doṣam prasajataḥ parapakṣa abhyupagamāt

original: samāno doṣo bhavati. yathā parasya pratiṣedhaṃ sadoṣamabhyupetya pratiṣedhavipratiṣedhepi
analyzed: samānaḥ doṣaḥ bhavati yathā parasya pratiṣedham sa doṣam abhyupetya pratiṣedha vipratiṣedhe api

original: samāno doṣaprasaṅgo matānujñā prasajyate iti tathāsyāpi sthāpanāṃ sadoṣāmabhyupetya
analyzed: samānaḥ doṣa prasaṅgaḥ mata anujñā prasajyate iti tathā asya api sthāpanām sa doṣām abhyupetya

original: pratiṣedhepi samānaṃ doṣaṃ prasajato matānujñā prasajyate iti,
analyzed: pratiṣedhe api samānam doṣam prasajataḥ matānujñā prasajyate iti
sa khalu ayam ṣaṣṭhaḥ pakṣaḥ
tatra khalu sthāpanā hetuvādinaḥ prathama tṛtīya pañcama pakṣāḥ
pratiṣedha hetuvādinaḥ dvitīya caturtha ṣaṣṭha pakṣāḥ

original: teṣāṃ sādhv asādhutāyāṃ mīmāṃsyamānāyāṃ caturthaṣaṣṭhayoraviśeṣāt punaruktadoṣaprasaṅgaḥ /
analyzed: teṣām sādhu asādhu tāyām mīmāṃsyamānāyām caturtha ṣaṣṭhayoḥ aviśeṣāt punarukta doṣa prasaṅgaḥ
caturtha pakṣe samāna doṣa tvam parasya ucyate
pratiṣedha vipratiṣedhe pratiṣedha doṣa vat doṣaḥ iti
ṣaṣṭhe api parapakṣa abhyupagamāt samānaḥ doṣaḥ
iti samāna doṣa tvam eva ucyate na artha viśeṣaḥ kaścid asti
samānaḥ tṛtīya pañcamayoḥ punar ukta doṣa prasaṅga
tṛtīya pakṣe api pratiṣedhe api samānaḥ doṣaḥ

original: iti samānatvamabhyupagamyate. pañcamapakṣepi pratiṣedhavipratiṣedhe samāno doṣaprasaṅgo 'bhyupagamyate nārthaviśeṣaḥ kaściducyate iti/
analyzed: iti samāna tvam abhyupagamyate pañcama pakṣe api pratiṣedha vipratiṣedhe samānaḥ doṣa prasaṅgaḥ bhyupagamyate na artha viśeṣaḥ kaścid ucyate iti
tatra pañcama ṣaṣṭha pakṣayoḥ artha aviśeṣāt punarukta doṣaḥ
tṛtīya caturthayoḥ matānujñā
prathama dvitīyayoḥ viśeṣa hetu abhāvaḥ iti ṣaṭpakṣyām ubhayoḥ asiddhiḥ
kadā ṣaṣ pakṣī
yadā pratiṣedhe api sāmānaḥ doṣaḥ

original: ityevaṃ pravartate tadobhayoḥ pakṣayorasiddhiḥ, yadā tu
analyzed: iti evam pravartate tadā ubhayoḥ pakṣayoḥ asiddhiḥ yadā tu
kārya anya tve prayatna ahetu tvam anupalabdhi kāraṇa upapatteḥ

original: ityanena tṛtīyapakṣo yujyate tadā viśeṣahetuvacanāt prayatnānantaramāramalābhaḥ śabdasya nābhivyaktiriti siddhaḥ prathamapakṣo na ṣaṭpakṣī  #
analyzed: iti anena tṛtīya pakṣaḥ yujyate tadā viśeṣa hetu vacanāt prayatna anantaram āram alābhaḥ śabdasya na abhivyaktiḥ iti siddhaḥ prathama pakṣaḥ na ṣaṭpakṣī
pravartate iti

original: // iti vātsyāyanaviracite nyāyabhāṣye pañcamādhyāyasya prathamamāhnikaṃ samāptam //
analyzed: iti vātsyāyana viracite nyāya bhāṣye pañcama adhyāyasya prathamam āhnikam samāptam
atha nyāya bhāṣya pañcama adhyāyasya dvitīyam āhnikam
vipratipatti apratipattyoḥ vikalpāt nigrahasthāna bahu tvam iti saṃkṣepeṇa uktam tat idānīm virbhajanīyam

original: nigrahasthānāni khalu parājayavastūny aparādhādhikaraṇāni prāyeṇa pratijñādyavayavāśrayāṇi tattvavādinam atattvavādinaṃ cābhisaṃplavante,
analyzed: nigrahasthānāni khalu parājaya vastūni aparādha adhikaraṇāni prāyeṇa pratijñā ādi avayava āśrayāṇi tattvavādinam atattvavādinam ca abhisaṃplavante
teṣām vibhāgaḥ

original: NyS_5,2.1: pratijñāhāniḥ pratijñāntaraṃ pratijñāvirodhaḥ pratijñāsaṃnyāso hetvantaramarthāntaraṃ
analyzed: pratijñāhāniḥ pratijñāntaram pratijñāvirodhaḥ pratijñāsaṃnyāsaḥ hetvantaram arthāntaram

original: nirarthakam avijñātārtham apārthakam aprāptakālaṃ nyūnamadhikaṃ punaruktam ananubhāṣaṇam
analyzed: nirarthakam a vijñāta artham apārthakam a prāpta kālam nyūnam adhikam punaruktam ananubhāṣaṇam

original: ajñānam apratibhā vikṣepo matānujñā paryanuyojyopekṣaṇaṃ niranuyojyānuyogopasiddhānto
analyzed: ajñānam apratibhā vikṣepaḥ mata anujñā paryanuyojyopekṣaṇam niranuyojyānuyoga upasiddhāntaḥ
hetvābhāsāḥ ca nigrahasthānāni
tāni imāni dvāviśatidhā vibhajya lakṣyante

original: sādhyadharmapratyanīkena dharmeṇa pratyavasthite pratidṛṣṭāntadharmaṃ svadṛṣṭānte 'bhyanujānan pratijñāṃ jahātīti pratijñāhāniḥ,
analyzed: sādhya dharma pratyanīkena dharmeṇa pratyavasthite pratidṛṣṭānta dharmam sva dṛṣṭānte bhyanujānan pratijñām jahāti iti pratijñāhāniḥ

original: nidarśanam-- 'aindriyakatvādanityaḥ śabdo ghaṭavat' itikṛte. apara āha-- 'dṛṣṭamaindriyakatvaṃ sāmānye nitye kasmānna tathā śabdaḥ ?' iti.  #
analyzed: nidarśanam aindriyaka tvāt anityaḥ śabdaḥ ghaṭa vat iti kṛte aparaḥ āha dṛṣṭam aindriyaka tvam sāmānye nitye kasmāt na tathā śabdaḥ iti
evam
pratyavasthite idam āha yadi aindriyakam sāmānyam nityam
kāmam ghaṭaḥ nityaḥ ustu iti

original: sa khalvayaṃ sādhakasya dṛṣṭāntasya nityatvaṃ prasañjayan nigamanāntameva pakṣaṃ jahāti. pakṣaṃ jahat pratijñā jahātītyucyate-- pratijñāśrayatvāt  #
analyzed: sa khalu ayam sādhakasya dṛṣṭāntasya nitya tvam prasañjayan nigamana antam eva pakṣam jahāti pakṣam jahat pratijñā jahāti iti ucyate pratijñā āśraya tvāt
pakṣasya iti
pratijñāta artha pratiṣedhe dharma vikalpāt tad artha nirdeśaḥ pratijñāntaram

original: pratijñātārthaḥ-- 'anityaḥ śabda aindriyakatvād ghaṭavat' ityukte yo 'sya pratiṣedhaḥ /
analyzed: pratijñāta arthaḥ anityaḥ śabdaḥ aindriyaka tvāt ghaṭa vat iti ukte yaḥ sya pratiṣedhaḥ

original: pratidṛṣṭāntena hetuvyabhicāraḥ-- 'sāmānyamaindriyakaṃ nityam' iti tasmiṃśca pratijñātārthapratiṣedhe dharmavikalpāditi /
analyzed: pratidṛṣṭāntena hetu vyabhicāraḥ sāmānyam aindriyakam nityam iti tasmin ca pratijñāta artha pratiṣedhe dharma vikalpāt iti
dṛṣṭānta pratidṛṣṭāntayoḥ sādharmya yoge dharma bhedāt

original: sāmānyamaindriyakaṃ sarvagatam aindriyakastv asarvagato ghaṭa iti dharmavikalpāt. tadarthaṃ nirdeśa iti sādhyasiddhyartham/
analyzed: sāmānyam aindriyakam sarva gatam aindriyakaḥ tu a sarva gataḥ ghaṭaḥ iti dharma vikalpāt tad artham nirdeśaḥ iti sādhya siddhi artham

original: katham ? yathā ghaṭo 'sarvagata evaṃ śabdopyasarvagato ghaṭavadevānitya iti,
analyzed: katham yathā ghaṭaḥ sarva gataḥ evam śabdaḥ api asarva gataḥ ghaṭa vat eva anityaḥ iti

original: tatra-- 'anityaḥ śabdaḥ' iti pūrvā pratijñā. 'asarvagataḥ' iti dvitīyā pratijñā pratijñāntaram/
analyzed: tatra anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti pūrvā pratijñā asarvagataḥ iti dvitīyā pratijñā pratijñāntaram
tat katham nigrahasthānam iti

original: , na pratijñāyāḥ sādhanaṃ pratijñāntaraṃ kiṃ tu hetudṛṣṭāntau sādhanaṃ pratijñāyāḥ,
analyzed: na pratijñāyāḥ sādhanam pratijñāntaram kiṃ tu hetu dṛṣṭāntau sādhanam pratijñāyāḥ
tat etat asādhana upādānam anarthakam iti ānarthakyāt nigrahasthānam iti
pratijñā hetvoḥ virodhaḥ pratijñāvirodhaḥ

original: 'guṇavyatiriktaṃ dravyam' iti pratijñā. 'rūpādito 'rthāntarasyānupalabdheḥ' iti hetuḥ. soyaṃ pratijñāhetvorvirodhaḥ/
analyzed: guṇa vyatiriktam dravyam iti pratijñā rūpāt itas rtha antarasya anupalabdheḥ iti hetuḥ saḥ ayam pratijñā hetvoḥ virodhaḥ
katham yadi guṇa vyatiriktam dravyam
rūpa ādibhyaḥ rtha antarasya anupalabdheḥ iti
na upapadyate
atha rūpa ādibhyaḥ ṛtha antarasya anupalabdhiḥ
guṇa vyatiriktam dravyam iti
na upapadyate
guṇa vyatiriktam ca dravyam rūpa ādibhyaḥ ṛtha antarasya anupalabdhiḥ iti virudhyate
vyāhanyate
na saṃbhavati iti
pakṣa pratiṣedhe pratijñāta artha apanayanam pratijñāsaṃnyāsaḥ

original: 'anityaḥ śabda aindriyakatvāt' ityukte paro brūyāt-- 'sāmānyamaindriyakaṃ na cānityamevaṃ
analyzed: anityaḥ śabdaḥ aindriyaka tvāt iti ukte paraḥ brūyāt sāmānyam aindriyakam na ca anityam evam

original: śabdopyaindriyako na cānityaḥ' iti. evaṃ pratiṣiddhe pakṣe yadi brūyāt-- 'kaḥ punarāha
analyzed: śabdaḥ api aindriyakaḥ na ca anityaḥ iti evam pratiṣiddhe pakṣe yadi brūyāt kaḥ punar āha
anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti
iti sā uyam pratijñāta artha nihnavaḥ pratijñā saṃnyāsaḥ iti

original: NyS_5,2.6: aviśeṣokte hetau pratiṣiddhe viśeṣamicchato hetvantaram //
analyzed: aviśeṣa ukte hetau pratiṣiddhe viśeṣam icchataḥ hetvantaram

original: nidarśanam-- 'ekaprakṛtīdaṃ vyaktam' iti pratijñā. kasmād hetoḥ ?
analyzed: nidarśanam eka prakṛti idam vyaktam iti pratijñā kasmāt hetoḥ

original: 'ekaprakṛtīnāṃ vikārāṇāṃ parimāṇāt' 'mṛtpūrvakāṇāṃ śarāvādīnāṃ dṛṣṭaṃ parimāṇaṃ yāvān
analyzed: eka prakṛtīnām vikārāṇām parimāṇāt mṛd pūrvakāṇām śarāva ādīnām dṛṣṭam parimāṇam yāvān

original: prakṛtervyūho bhavati tāvān vikāraḥ' iti. dṛṣṭaṃ ca prativikāraṃ parimāṇam. asti
analyzed: prakṛteḥ vyūhaḥ bhavati tāvān vikāraḥ iti dṛṣṭam ca prati vikāram parimāṇam asti
ca idam parimāṇam prativyaktam
tad eka prakṛtīnām vikārāṇām parimāṇāt paśyāmaḥ vyaktam idam eka prakṛti iti

original: asya vyabhicāreṇa pratyavasthānam-- nānāprakṛtīnāmekaprakṛtīnāṃ ca vikārāṇāṃ dṛṣṭaṃ parimāṇamiti/
analyzed: asya vyabhicāreṇa pratyavasthānam nānā prakṛtīnām eka prakṛtīnām ca vikārāṇām dṛṣṭam parimāṇam iti

original: evaṃ pratayavasthite āha-- ekaprakṛtisamanvaye sati śarāvādivikārāṇāṃ parimāṇadarśanāt.
analyzed: evam āha eka prakṛti samanvaye sati śarāva ādi vikārāṇām parimāṇa darśanāt

original: sukhaduḥkhamohasamanvitaṃ hīdaṃ vyaktaṃ parimitaṃ gṛhyate. tatra prakṛtyantararūpasamanvayābhāve
analyzed: sukha duḥkha moha samanvitam hi idam vyaktam parimitam gṛhyate tatra prakṛti antara rūpa samanvaya abhāve
sati eka prakṛti tvam iti

original: tadidamaviśeṣokte hetau pratiṣiddhe viśeṣaṃ bruvato hetvantaraṃ bhavati,
analyzed: tat idam aviśeṣa ukte hetau pratiṣiddhe viśeṣam bruvataḥ hetvantaram bhavati
sati ca hetu antara bhāve pūrvasya hetoḥ asādhaka tvāt nigaha sthānam

original: hetvantara vacane sati yadi hetvarthanidarśano dṛṣṭānta upādīyate ?
analyzed: vacane sati yadi hetu artha nidarśanaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ upādīyate
na idam vyaktam eka prakṛti bhavati prakṛti antara upādānāt
atha na upādīyate

original: . dṛṣṭānte hetvarthasyānidarśitasya sādhakabhāvānupapatteḥ ānarthakyād hetoranivṛttaṃ nigrahasthānamiti // 6 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭānte hetvarthasya anidarśitasya sādhaka bhāva anupapatteḥ ānarthakyāt hetoḥ anivṛttam nigrahasthānam iti
prakṛtāt arthāt apratisaṃbaddha artham arthāntaram

original: yathoktalakṣaṇe pakṣapratipakṣaparigrahe hetutaḥ sādhyasiddhau prakṛtāyāṃ brūyāt--
analyzed: yathā ukta lakṣaṇe pakṣa pratipakṣa parigrahe hetutaḥ sādhya siddhau prakṛtāyām brūyāt

original: 'nityaḥ śabdaḥ asparśatvāditi hetuḥ' heturnāma hinoterdhātostuni pratyaye kṛdantapadam.
analyzed: nityaḥ śabdaḥ asparśa tvāt iti hetuḥ hetuḥ nāma hinoteḥ dhātoḥ tuni pratyaye kṛt anta padam
padam ca nāma ākhyāta upasarga nipātāḥ
abhidheyasya kriyā antara yogāt viśiṣyamāṇa rūpaḥ śabdaḥ nāma

original: kriyākārakasamudāyaḥ. kārakasaṃkhyāviśiṣṭakriyākālayogābhidhāyi ākhyātam. dhātvarthamātraṃ ca kālābhidhānaviśiṣṭam,
analyzed: kriyā kāraka samudāyaḥ kāraka saṃkhyā viśiṣṭa kriyā kāla yoga abhidhāyi ākhyātam dhātvartha mātram ca kāla abhidhāna viśiṣṭam
prayogeṣu arthāt abhidyamāna rūpāḥ nipātāḥ
upasṛjyamānāḥ kriyā avadyotakāḥ upasargāḥ
iti evamādi tat artha antaram veditavyam

original: yathānityaḥ śabdaḥ kacaṭatapānāṃ jabagaḍadaśatvāt jhabhañghaḍhadhaṣavat' iti,
analyzed: yathā anityaḥ śabdaḥ ka ca ṭa ta pānām ja ba gaḍa daśa tvāt jha bhañ ghaḍha dhaṣa vat iti

original: evaṃprakāraṃ nirarthakam-- abhidhānābhidheyabhāvānupapattau arthagaterabhāvād varṇāḥ krameṇa nirdiśyante iti // 8 //
analyzed: evaṃprakāram nirarthakam abhidhāna abhidheya bhāva anupapattau artha gateḥ abhāvāt varṇāḥ krameṇa nirdiśyante iti
pariṣad prativādibhyām tris abhihitam api avijñātam avijñātārtham

original: yad vākyaṃ pariṣadā prativādinā ca trirabhihitamapi na vijñāyate śliṣṭaśabdam apratītaprayogam atidrutoccāritamityevamādinā kāraṇena tadavijñātārtham,
analyzed: yat vākyam pariṣadā prativādinā ca tris abhihitam api na vijñāyate śliṣṭa śabdam apratīta prayogam atidruta uccāritam iti evamādinā kāraṇena tat avijñāta artham
a vijñāta artham a sāmarthya saṃvaraṇāya prayuktam iti nigrahasthānam iti
paurvāparya ayogāt apratisaṃbaddha artham apārthakam

original: yatrānekasya padasya vākyasya vā paurvāpayeṇānvayayogo nāsti ity asaṃbaddhārthatvaṃ
analyzed: yatra anekasya padasya vākyasya vā paurvāpayeṇa anvaya yogaḥ na asti iti asaṃbaddha ārtha tvam

original: gṛhyate tatsamudāyārthasyāpāyādapārthakaṃ yathā-- 'daśa dāḍimāni. ṣaḍapūpāḥ. kuṇḍamajājinam.
analyzed: gṛhyate tat samudāya arthasya apāyāt apārthakam yathā daśa dāḍimāni ṣaṭ apūpāḥ kuṇḍam aja ajinam

original: palalapiṇḍaḥ. adharaurukametat. kumāryāḥ prāyyaṃ tasyāḥ pitā apratiśīnaḥ' iti // 10 //
analyzed: palala piṇḍaḥ adharaurukam etat kumāryāḥ prāyyam tasyāḥ pitā apratiśīnaḥ iti
avayava viparyāsa vacanam aprāpta kālam

original: pratijñādīnāmakyavānāṃ yathālakṣaṇamarthavaśāt kramaḥ tatrāvayavaviparyāsena vacanam aprāptakālam asaṃbaddhārthaṃ nigrahasthānamiti // 11 //
analyzed: pratijñā ādīnām akyavānām yathālakṣaṇam artha vaśāt kramaḥ tatra avayava viparyāsena vacanam aprāpta kālam asaṃbaddha artham nigrahasthānam iti
hīnam anyatamena api avayavena nyūnam
pratijñā ādīnām avayavānām anyatamā eva api avayavena hīnam nyūnam nigrahasthānam sādhana abhāve sādhya asiddhiḥ iti
hetu udāharaṇa adhikam adhikam
ekena kṛta tvāt anyatarasya ānarthakyam iti
tat etat niyama abhyupagame veditavyam iti
śabda arthayoḥ punarvacanam punaruktam anyatra anuvādāt

original: anyatrānuvādāt śabdapunaruktam arthapunaruktaṃ vā-- 'nityaḥ śabdaḥ nityaḥ śabdaḥ' iti śabdapunaruktam. arthapunaruktam-- 'anityaḥ śabdaḥ. nirodhadharmako  #
analyzed: anyatra anuvādāt śabda punaruktam artha punaruktam vā nityaḥ śabdaḥ nityaḥ śabdaḥ iti śabda punaruktam artha punaruktam anityaḥ śabdaḥ nirodha dharmakaḥ
dhvānaḥ iti
anuvāde tu apunaruktam śabda abhyāsāt artha viśeṣa upapatteḥ yathā
hetu apadeśāt pratijñāyāḥ punarvacanam nigamanam
iti
arthāt āpannasya sva śabdena punarvacanam
punar uktam iti prakṛtam
nidarśanam utpatti dharmaka tvāt anityam
iti aktvā arthāt āpannasya yaḥ abhidhāyakaḥ śabdaḥ tena
sva śabdena brūyāt anutpatti dharmakam nityam
iti tat ca punar uktam veditavyam artha saṃpratyaya arthe
śabda prayoge pratītaḥ saḥ rthaḥ rthāpattyā iti

original: NyS_5,2.16: vijñātasya pariṣadā trirabhihitasyāpy apratyuccāraṇam ananubhāṣaṇam //
analyzed: vijñātasya pariṣadā tris abhihitasya api a pratyuccāraṇam ananubhāṣaṇam
vijñātasya vākya arthasya pariṣadā prativādinā
tris abhihitasya yat a pratyuccāraṇam tat ananubhāṣaṇam
nāma nigrahasthānām iti
a pratyuccārayan kimāśrayam
parapakṣa pratiṣedham brūyāt
a vijñātam ca ajñānam
vijñāta arthasya pariṣadā prativādinā tris abhihitasya yat avijñāna
tat ajñānam nigrahasthānam iti
ayam khalu a vijñāya
kasya pratiṣedham brūyāt iti
uttarasya apratipattiḥ apratibhā

original: parapakṣapratiṣedhaḥ uttaraṃ tad yadā na pratipadyate ?
analyzed: parapakṣa pratiṣedhaḥ uttaram tat yadā na pratipadyate
tadā nigṛhītaḥ bhavati
kārya vyāsaṅgāt kathā vicchedaḥ vikṣepaḥ
yatra kartavyam vyāsajya kathām vyavacchinatti

original: 'idaṃ me karaṇīyaṃ vidyate tasminn avasite paścāt kathayiṣyāmīti (tat)
analyzed: idam me karaṇīyam vidyate tasmin avasite paścāt kathayiṣyāmi iti tat
vikṣepaḥ nāma nigrahasthānam

original: ekanigrahāvasānāyāṃ kathāyāṃ svayameva kathāntaraṃ pratipadyate iti // 19 //
analyzed: eka nigraha avasānāyām kathāyām svayam eva kathā antaram pratipadyate iti

original: NyS_5,2.20: svapakṣe doṣābhyupagamāt parapakṣe doṣaprasaṅgo matānujñā //
analyzed: sva pakṣe doṣa abhyupagamāt para pakṣe doṣa prasaṅgaḥ matānujñā
yaḥ pareṇa coditam doṣam sva pakṣe bhyupagamya
an uddhṛtya vadati bhavat pakṣe api samānaḥ doṣaḥ
iti sa sva pakṣe doṣa abhyupagamāt para pakṣe
doṣam prasañjayan para matam anujānāti iti
matānujñā nāma nigrahasthānam āpadyate iti
nigrahasthāna prāptasya anigrahaḥ paryanuyojyopekṣaṇam

original: paryanuyojyo nāma nigrahopapattyā codanīyaḥ. tasyopekṣaṇam = 'nigrahasthānaṃ prāpto 'sīty ananuyogaḥ/
analyzed: paryanuyojyaḥ nāma nigraha upapattyā codanīyaḥ tasya upekṣaṇam nigrahasthānam ananuyogaḥ
etat ca kasya parājayaḥ
iti anuktayā pariṣadā

original: vacanīyam-- na khalu nigrahaṃ prāptaḥ svakaupīnaṃ
analyzed: vacanīyam na khalu nigraham prāptaḥ sva kaupīnam
vivṛṇuyāt iti
nigrahasthāna lakṣaṇasya mithyā adhyavasāyāt anigrahasthāne
nigṛhītaḥ asi iti param bruvan niravanuga ūjya anuyogāt
niranugaḥ ūjya anuyogāt nigṛhītaḥ veditavya
iti
siddhāntam abhyupetya aniyamāt kathā prasaṅgaḥ upasiddhāntaḥ
kasyacid arthasya tathābhāvam pratijñāya pratijñāta artha viparyayāt
aniyamāt kathām prasañjayataḥ pasiddhāntaḥ
veditavyaḥ yathā na sat ātmānam jahāti
na sataḥ vināśaḥ

original: nāsad ātmānaṃ labhate = nāsadutpadyate' iti siddhāntamabhyupetya
analyzed: na asat ātmānam labhate na asat utpadyate iti siddhāntam abhyupetya
sva pakṣam vyavasthāpayati eka prakṛti idam vyaktam
vikārāṇām anvaya darśanāt mṛd anvitānām
śarāva ādīnām dṛṣṭam eka prakṛti tvam tathā ca ayam
vyakta bhedaḥ sukha duḥkha moha samanvitaḥ dṛśyate
tasmāt samanvaya darśanāt sukha ādibhiḥ eka prakṛti idam viśvam iti
evam uktavān anuyujyate atha prakṛtiḥ vikāra
iti katham lakṣitavyam
iti yasya avasthitasya
dharma antara nivṛttau dharma antaram pravartate sā

original: prakṛtiḥ. yacca dharmāntaraṃ pravartate sa vikāra iti/
analyzed: prakṛtiḥ yat ca dharma antaram pravartate sa vikāraḥ iti
saḥ yam pratijñāta artha viparyayāt
aniyamāt kathām prasañjayati
pratijñātam khalu anena na asat āvirbhavati na
sat tiras bhavati iti
sat asatoḥ ca tirobhāva āvirbhāvam antareṇa
na kasyacid pravṛttiḥ pravṛtti uparamaḥ ca bhavati
mṛdi khalu a sthitāyām bhaviṣyati śarāva ādi lakṣaṇam
dharma antaram iti pravṛttiḥ bhavati abhūt iti
ca pravṛtti uparamaḥ tat etat mṛd dharmāṇām api

original: na syāt, evaṃ pratyavasthito yadi sataścātmahānam asataścātmalābhamabhyupaiti ?
analyzed: na syāt evam pratyavasthitaḥ yadi sataḥ ca ātma hānam asataḥ ca ātma lābham abhyupaiti
tat asya apasiddhāntaḥ nigrahasthānam bhavati
atha na abhyupaiti
prakṣo sya na sidhyati
hetvābhāsāḥ ca yathā uktāḥ
hetvābhāsāḥ ca nigrahasthānāni
kim punar lakṣaṇa antara yogāt hetvābhāsā
nigrahasthāna tvam āpannāḥ yathā pramāṇāni prameya tvam
iti atas āha yathā uktāḥ iti
hetvābhāsa lakṣaṇena eva nigrahasthāna bhāvaḥ iti
te ime pramāṇa ādayaḥ padārthāḥ uddiṣṭā
lakṣitāḥ parīkṣitāḥ ca iti
yaḥ kṣapādam ṛṣim nyāyaḥ pratyabhāt vadatām varam
tasya vātsyāyanaḥ idam bhāṣya jātam avartayat
iti vidvat vara vātsyāyana viracite nyāya bhāṣye pañcamaḥ dhyāyaḥ samāptaḥ
nyāya darśanam ca idam samāptam
